anya-e0101n0:5_0: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:6_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. ;
anya-e0101n0:7_2: bhagavantaṃ kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharantaṃ rattibhāge aññataro devaputto upasaṅkamitvā attano saṃsayasamugghāṭatthaṃ –
anya-e0101n0:9_0: Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmi, ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n0:10_3: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhena veḷugumbādīnaṃ sākhājālasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭā,
anya-e0101n0:10_4: sā panesā sakaparikkhāraparaparikkhāresu sakaattabhāvaparaattabhāvesu ajjhattikāyatanabāhirāyatanesu ca uppajjanato antojaṭā bahijaṭāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:10_5: Tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā.
anya-e0101n0:10_7: evaṃ tāya taṇhājaṭāya sabbāpi ayaṃ sattanikāyasaṅkhātā pajā jaṭitā vinaddhā,
anya-e0101n0:10_10: Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmīti tasmā taṃ pucchāmi.
anya-e0101n0:10_12: Ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti imaṃ evaṃ tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭaṃ ko vijaṭeyya,
anya-e0101n0:11_0: Evaṃ puṭṭho panassa sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā catuvesārajjavisārado
anya-e0101n0:11_1: dasabaladharo anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhu bhagavā tamatthaṃ vissajjento –
anya-e0101n0:12_0: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:13_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n0:24_0: Visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissaṃ, taṃ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0101n0:26_1: Tattha visuddhīti sabbamalavirahitaṃ accantaparisuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:27_0: So panāyaṃ visuddhimaggo katthaci vipassanāmattavaseneva desito. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:29_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:31_0: “Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:33_0: “Kammaṃ vijjā ca dhammo ca, sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:34_0: Etena maccā sujjhanti, na gottena dhanena vā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:40_0: Sammappadhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ pana pañhābyākaraṇe sīlādivasena desito.
anya-e0101n0:41_3: sīlaṃ paripūrayamānoyeva cettha sīle ṭhitoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:41_4: Tasmā sīlaparipūraṇena sīle patiṭṭhahitvāti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0101n0:41_7: Cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno,
anya-e0101n0:41_21: So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti so iminā ca sīlena iminā ca cittasīsena niddiṭṭhasamādhinā imāya ca tividhāya
anya-e0101n0:41_22: paññāya iminā ca ātāpenāti chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu.
anya-e0101n0:41_23: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya sunisitaṃ satthaṃ ukkhipitvā mahantaṃ veḷugumbaṃ vijaṭeyya,
anya-e0101n0:41_24: evameva sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsatthaṃ vīriyabalapaggahitena
anya-e0101n0:41_25: pārihārikapaññāhatthena ukkhipitvā sabbampi taṃ attano santāne patitaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭeyya sañchindeyya
anya-e0101n0:41_27: Maggakkhaṇe panesa taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:41_28: Phalakkhaṇe vijaṭitajaṭo sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:42_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:43_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti. ;
anya-e0101n0:44_4: Ātāpī nipakoti ettha vuttavīriyavasena pana tena sātaccakārinā paññāvasena ca sampajānakārinā hutvā sīle
anya-e0101n0:44_5: patiṭṭhāya cittapaññāvasena vuttā samathavipassanā bhāvetabbāti imamatra bhagavā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena
anya-e0101n0:46_1: Ettha hi sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:47_0: Sīlena ca sāsanassa ādikalyāṇatā pakāsitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:47_3: “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ādivacanato ca sīlaṃ sāsanassa ādi,
anya-e0101n0:47_7: “Kusalassa upasampadā”ti ādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe,
anya-e0101n0:51_0: Tathā sīlena tevijjatāya upanissayo pakāsito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:52_0: Sīlena ca kāmasukhallikānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa vajjanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:52_2: Paññāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā sevanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:54_0: Sīlena ca tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesappahānaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:55_0: Tathā sīlena kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkho pakāsito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:57_0: Tathā sīlena sotāpannasakadāgāmibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:58_9: aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā pakāsitā hontīti.
anya-e0101n0:61_1: Evaṃ anekaguṇasaṅgāhakena sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi panesa visuddhimaggo atisaṅkhepadesitoyeva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:61_2: Tasmā nālaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārāyāti vitthāramassa dassetuṃ sīlaṃ tāva ārabbha idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:63_1: Kiṃ sīlanti pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā.
anya-e0101n0:63_6: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā.
anya-e0101n0:63_7: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati.
anya-e0101n0:63_8: Apica cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa satta kammapathacetanā.
anya-e0101n0:63_9: Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”ti ādinā nayena vuttā anabhijjhābyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
anya-e0101n0:63_10: Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo pātimokkhasaṃvaro,
anya-e0101n0:63_15: Tattha iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupetoti ayaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro.
anya-e0101n0:67_2: Yo panāyaṃ khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassātiādinā nayena āgato,
anya-e0101n0:67_4: Yo cāyaṃ uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetītiādinā nayena āgato,
anya-e0101n0:67_8: yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sampattavatthuto virati,
anya-e0101n0:67_11: Idaṃ tāva kiṃ sīlanti pañhassa vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:68_9: sītalaṭṭho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
anya-e0101n0:72_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:72_2: Tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena kusalānañca dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ sīlanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:75_0: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:75_2: Lakkhaṇādīsu hi kiccameva sampatti vā rasoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:78_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyyanti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:78_4: Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati ceva tiṭṭhati ca.
anya-e0101n0:81_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
anya-e0101n0:81_2: Idha gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati,
anya-e0101n0:81_4: Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati,
anya-e0101n0:81_6: Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi
anya-e0101n0:81_10: Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:81_12: Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0101n0:82_2: bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti,
anya-e0101n0:82_3: sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”tiādinā nayena piyamanāpatādayo āsavakkhayapariyosānā anekā sīlānisaṃsā vuttā.
anya-e0101n0:83_0: Sāsane kulaputtānaṃ, patiṭṭhā natthi yaṃ vinā;
anya-e0101n0:85_0: Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
anya-e0101n0:87_0: Sakkuṇanti visodhetuṃ, taṃ malaṃ idha pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:88_0: Visodhayati sattānaṃ, yaṃ ve sīlajalaṃ malaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:89_0: Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:90_0: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
anya-e0101n0:92_0: Yaṃ sameti idaṃ ariyaṃ, sīlaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:94_0: Yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati.
anya-e0101n0:96_0: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
anya-e0101n0:104_1: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ katividhaṃ cetaṃ sīlanti,
anya-e0101n0:104_3: Sabbameva tāva idaṃ sīlaṃ attano sīlanalakkhaṇena ekavidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:109_7: Caranti tasmiṃ sīlesu paripūrakāritāya pavattantīti cārittaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:110_8: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:110_17: bhikkhu ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ aparipūretvā ādibrahmacariyakaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:111_1: Sesaṃ cetanādi aviratisīlanti evaṃ viratiavirativasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:112_0: Catutthaduke nissayoti dve nissayā taṇhānissayo ca diṭṭhinissayo ca.
anya-e0101n0:112_1: Tattha yaṃ “imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti evaṃ bhavasampattiṃ ākaṅkhamānena pavattitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:112_5: Yaṃ pana lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca tasseva sambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:113_0: Pañcamaduke kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samādinnaṃ sīlaṃ kālapariyantaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:113_1: Yāvajīvaṃ samādiyitvā tatheva pavattitaṃ āpāṇakoṭikanti evaṃ kālapariyantaāpāṇakoṭikavasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:114_2: Vuttampi cetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ sapariyantaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:114_9: Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati,
anya-e0101n0:114_12: Apariyantavissajjanepi vuttaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ na lābhapariyantaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:114_13: Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti,
anya-e0101n0:115_2: Tattha lokiyaṃ bhavavisesāvahaṃ hoti bhavanissaraṇassa ca sambhāro. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:115_21: Lokuttaraṃ bhavanissaraṇāvahaṃ hoti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca bhūmīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:116_1: Tikesu paṭhamattike hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāya vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:116_8: ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaparavambhanādīhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā hīnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:116_13: Sabbasattānaṃ vimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ pāramitāsīlaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:117_0: Dutiyattike attano ananurūpaṃ pajahitukāmena attagarunā attanigāravena pavattitaṃ attādhipateyyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:117_1: Lokāpavādaṃ pariharitukāmena lokagarunā loke gāravena pavattitaṃ lokādhipateyyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:117_2: Dhammamahattaṃ pūjetukāmena dhammagarunā dhammagāravena pavattitaṃ dhammādhipateyyanti evaṃ attādhipateyyādivasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:118_3: Sekkhāsekkhānaṃ phalasampayuttaṃ paṭippassaddhanti evaṃ parāmaṭṭhādivasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:119_4: Vatthumhi vā āpattiyā vā ajjhācāre vā vematikassa sīlaṃ vematikasīlaṃ nāma.
anya-e0101n0:119_6: vematike vatthujjhācāraṃ akatvā vimati paṭivinetabbā “iccassa phāsu bhavissatī”ti evaṃ visuddhādivasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:120_0: Pañcamattike catūhi ariyamaggehi tīhi ca sāmaññaphalehi sampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ sekkhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:121_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ pana yasmā loke tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ pakatipi sīlanti vuccati,
anya-e0101n0:121_8: Tattha akusalaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetassa sīlassa lakkhaṇādīsu ekenapi na sametīti idha na upanītaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:123_0: Yodha sevati dussīle, sīlavante na sevati;
anya-e0101n0:130_0: Tassa taṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ, sīlaṃ bhavati bhikkhuno.
anya-e0101n0:136_1: yāni ca nesaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paññattito rakkhitabbāni,
anya-e0101n0:136_4: yāni ca tāsaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paññattito rakkhitabbāni,
anya-e0101n0:136_9: uposathaṅgavasena aṭṭhāti idaṃ gahaṭṭhasīlanti evaṃ bhikkhusīlādivasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:137_3: yadā bodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkanto hoti na bodhisattamātu purisesu mānasaṃ uppajji kāmaguṇūpasaṃhita”nti
anya-e0101n0:137_6: bodhisattassa ca tāsu tāsu jātīsu sīlaṃ pubbahetukasīlanti evaṃ pakatisīlādivasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:138_0: Catutthacatukke yaṃ bhagavatā “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu
anya-e0101n0:138_1: vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti vaṃ vuttaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:138_3: Yaṃ pana “so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī,
anya-e0101n0:138_4: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:138_15: Yā pana ājīvahetupaññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamassa,
anya-e0101n0:138_16: “kuhanā lapanā nemittikatā nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti evamādīnañca pāpadhammānaṃ vasena pavattā micchājīvā virati,
anya-e0101n0:138_19: yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti ādinā nayena vutto paṭisaṅkhānaparisuddho catupaccayaparibhogo paccayasannissitasīlaṃ nāma.
anya-e0101n0:140_1: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya anupubbapadavaṇṇanāya saddhiṃ vinicchayakathā.
anya-e0101n0:140_3: Bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇatāya vā bhinnapaṭadharāditāya vā evaṃ laddhavohāro saddhāpabbajito kulaputto.

anya-e0101n0:142_5: vā pāribhaṭyatāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti,

anya-e0101n0:143_5: vā na muggasūpyatāya vā na pāribhaṭyatāya vā na jaṅghapesanikena vā na aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena
anya-e0101n0:145_5: saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena,

anya-e0101n0:145_7: aphāsukakāmāni ayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:146_5: yāni vā pana tāni kulāni saddhāni pasannāni opānabhūtāni kāsāvapajjotāni isivātapaṭivātāni atthakāmāni…pe…
anya-e0101n0:146_10: Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno sampanno samannāgato,
anya-e0101n0:147_0: Api cettha imināpi nayena ācāragocarā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:147_1: Duvidho hi anācāro kāyiko vācasiko ca.
anya-e0101n0:147_3: Idhekacco saṅghagatopi acittīkārakato there bhikkhū ghaṭṭayantopi tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:147_11: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupāhanānaṃ caṅkamantānaṃ saupāhano caṅkamati,
anya-e0101n0:147_12: nīce caṅkame caṅkamantānaṃ ucce caṅkame caṅkamati,
anya-e0101n0:147_17: jantāgharepi there bhikkhū anāpucchā kaṭṭhaṃ pakkhipati,
anya-e0101n0:147_25: antaragharaṃ pavisantopi there bhikkhū ghaṭṭayantopi gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:147_27: vokkamma ca therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ purato purato gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:147_28: yānipi tāni honti kulānaṃ ovarakāni gūḷhāni ca paṭicchannāni ca yattha kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo nisīdanti,
anya-e0101n0:148_1: Idhekacco saṅghagatopi acittīkārakato there bhikkhū anāpucchā dhammaṃ bhaṇati.
anya-e0101n0:148_6: antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhopi itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā evamāha –
anya-e0101n0:149_0: Apica bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena
anya-e0101n0:149_1: ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane
anya-e0101n0:149_2: mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo ābhisamācārikesu
anya-e0101n0:150_0: Gocaro pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti.
anya-e0101n0:150_8: Yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
anya-e0101n0:151_1: Idha bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī susaṃvuto gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:152_7: Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena upeto…pe…
anya-e0101n0:153_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo.
anya-e0101n0:153_1: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:153_3: Ettha ca “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti ettāvatā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:153_4: “Ācāragocarasampanno”tiādi pana sabbaṃ yathāpaṭipannassa taṃ sīlaṃ sampajjati,
anya-e0101n0:155_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ tadanantaraṃ “so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādinā nayena dassitaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:155_3: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
anya-e0101n0:155_9: Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n0:155_10: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho”ti.
anya-e0101n0:155_11: Na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:155_13: Nānubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anuanubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjananti laddhavohāraṃ hatthapādasitahasitakathitavilokitādibhedaṃ
anya-e0101n0:156_0: Theraṃ kira cetiyapabbatā anurādhapuraṃ piṇḍacāratthāya āgacchantaṃ aññatarā kulasuṇhā sāmikena saddhiṃ
anya-e0101n0:156_1: bhaṇḍitvā sumaṇḍitapasādhitā devakaññā viya kālasseva anurādhapurato nikkhamitvā ñātigharaṃ gacchantī
anya-e0101n0:156_3: Thero kimetanti olokento tassā dantaṭṭhike asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n0:158_0: Tattheva so ṭhito thero, arahattaṃ apāpuṇī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:159_0: Sāmikopi kho panassā anumaggaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā “kiñci, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:160_0: “Nābhijānāmi itthī vā, puriso vā ito gato;
anya-e0101n0:162_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0101n0:162_1: asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anubandheyyuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:162_2: Tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n0:162_5: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
anya-e0101n0:162_6: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:162_7: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
anya-e0101n0:162_8: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati.
anya-e0101n0:162_12: Tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
anya-e0101n0:163_1: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi.
anya-e0101n0:163_2: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:163_4: Evaṃ honto pana so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:163_5: Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:163_8: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā honti,
anya-e0101n0:163_9: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:163_12: evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:164_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:164_3: Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti,
anya-e0101n0:164_4: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:164_5: Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi,
anya-e0101n0:164_6: evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:164_8: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
anya-e0101n0:167_1: Idāni indriyasaṃvarasīlānantaraṃ vutte ājīvapārisuddhisīle ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānanti
anya-e0101n0:167_2: yāni tāni “ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
anya-e0101n0:167_6: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā ‘yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā’ti bhaṇati,
anya-e0101n0:167_8: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:167_10: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:167_12: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:167_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni,
anya-e0101n0:168_2: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena
anya-e0101n0:168_3: vā iriyāpathassa vā aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:169_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paresaṃ ālapanā lapanā sallapanā ullapanā
anya-e0101n0:169_2: samullapanā unnahanā samunnahanā ukkācanā samukkācanā anuppiyabhāṇitā cāṭukamyatā muggasūpyatā pāribhaṭyatā,
anya-e0101n0:170_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yaṃ paresaṃ nimittaṃ nimittakammaṃ obhāso obhāsakammaṃ sāmantajappā parikathā,
anya-e0101n0:171_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa yā paresaṃ akkosanā vambhanā garahanā ukkhepanā
anya-e0101n0:171_2: samukkhepanā khipanā saṃkhipanā pāpanā sampāpanā avaṇṇahārikā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā,
anya-e0101n0:172_1: Lābhasakkārasilokasannissito pāpiccho icchāpakato ito laddhaṃ āmisaṃ amutra harati,
anya-e0101n0:172_2: amutra vā laddhaṃ āmisaṃ idha āharati.
anya-e0101n0:172_3: Yā evarūpā āmisena āmisassa eṭṭhi gaveṭṭhi pariyeṭṭhi esanā gavesanā pariyesanā,
anya-e0101n0:173_2: Kuhananiddese tāva lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassāti lābhañca sakkārañca kittisaddañca sannissitassa,
anya-e0101n0:174_0: Ito paraṃ yasmā paccayapaṭisevanasāmantajappanairiyāpathasannissitavasena mahāniddese tividhaṃ kuhanavatthu āgataṃ.
anya-e0101n0:174_1: Tasmā tividhampetaṃ dassetuṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vāti evamādi āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:174_2: Tattha cīvarādīhi nimantitassa tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ nissāya paṭikkhipanena,
anya-e0101n0:174_3: te ca gahapatike attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe ñatvā puna tesaṃ “aho ayyo appiccho na kiñci paṭiggaṇhituṃ icchati,
anya-e0101n0:174_4: suladdhaṃ vata no assa sace appamattakampi kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvarādīni
anya-e0101n0:174_5: upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva āvikatvā paṭiggahaṇena ca tato pabhuti api sakaṭabhārehi upanāmanahetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n0:175_9: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo susānā vā saṅkārakūṭā vā pāpaṇikā vā nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāreyya.
anya-e0101n0:175_10: Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena piṇḍapātena etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo uñchācariyāya piṇḍiyālopena jīvikaṃ kappeyya.
anya-e0101n0:175_12: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo rukkhamūliko vā assa abbhokāsiko vā.
anya-e0101n0:175_14: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo pūtimuttena vā hariṭakīkhaṇḍena vā osadhaṃ kareyyā’ti.
anya-e0101n0:175_19: tamenaṃ gahapatikā evaṃ jānanti ‘ayaṃ samaṇo appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo dhutavādo’ti.
anya-e0101n0:175_23: ‘tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati.
anya-e0101n0:175_24: Saddhāya sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati.
anya-e0101n0:175_37: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:176_0: Pāpicchasseva pana sato uttarimanussadhammādhigamaparidīpanavācāya tathā tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:177_1: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti ariyadhammasannissitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati ‘yo evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti,
anya-e0101n0:177_9: Yo evarūpe vihāre vasati aḍḍhayoge pāsāde hammiye guhāyaṃ leṇe kuṭiyā kūṭāgāre aṭṭe māḷe uddaṇḍe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ maṇḍape rukkhamūle vasati,
anya-e0101n0:177_11: Atha vā ‘korajikakorajiko bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko kuhakakuhako lapakalapako mukhasambhāviko,
anya-e0101n0:177_12: ayaṃ samaṇo imāsaṃ evarūpānaṃ santānaṃ vihārasamāpattīnaṃ lābhī’ti tādisaṃ gambhīraṃ gūḷhaṃ nipuṇaṃ paṭicchannaṃ
anya-e0101n0:177_14: Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:178_0: Pāpicchasseva pana sato sambhāvanādhippāyakatena iriyāpathena vimhāpanaṃ iriyāpathasannissitaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:178_2: Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti gamanaṃ saṇṭhapeti,
anya-e0101n0:178_14: yā evarūpā iriyāpathassa aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:179_0: Tattha paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti paccayapaṭisevananti evaṃ saṅkhātena paccayapaṭisevanena vā saṅkhātena.
anya-e0101n0:180_0: Lapanāniddese ālapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā,
anya-e0101n0:180_3: ahaṃ pacchato pattaṃ gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti evaṃ āditova lapanā.
anya-e0101n0:180_6: mayi asuko ca asuko ca rājamahāmatto pasanno”ti evaṃ attupanāyikā lapanā ālapanā.
anya-e0101n0:180_8: Sallapanāti gahapatikānaṃ ukkaṇṭhane bhītassa okāsaṃ datvā datvā suṭṭhu lapanā.
anya-e0101n0:180_9: Ullapanāti mahākuṭumbiko mahānāviko mahādānapatīti evaṃ uddhaṃ katvā lapanā.
anya-e0101n0:181_0: Unnahanāti “upāsakā pubbe īdise kāle navadānaṃ detha,
anya-e0101n0:181_1: idāni kiṃ na dethā”ti evaṃ yāva “dassāma, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:181_5: Atha vā ucchuhatthaṃ disvā “kuto ābhataṃ upāsakā”ti pucchati.
anya-e0101n0:181_7: Kiṃ tattha ucchu madhuranti. Khāditvā, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:182_2: mayhameva detī”ti evaṃ ukkhipitvā kācanā ukkācanā,
anya-e0101n0:183_0: Anuppiyabhāṇitāti saccānurūpaṃ dhammānurūpaṃ vā anapaloketvā punappunaṃ piyabhaṇanameva.
anya-e0101n0:183_1: Cāṭukamyatāti nīcavuttitā attānaṃ heṭṭhato heṭṭhato ṭhapetvā vattanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:183_3: Yathā hi muggesu paccamānesu kocideva na paccati,
anya-e0101n0:183_5: evaṃ yassa puggalassa vacane kiñcideva saccaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:183_10: Yo hi kuladārake dhāti viya aṅkena vā khandhena vā paribhaṭati,
anya-e0101n0:184_0: Nemittikatāniddese nimittanti yaṃkiñci paresaṃ paccayadānasaññājanakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:184_1: Nimittakammanti khādanīyaṃ gahetvā gacchante disvā “kiṃ khādanīyaṃ labhitthā”tiādinā nayena nimittakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:184_3: Obhāsakammanti vacchapālake disvā “kiṃ ime vacchā khīragovacchā udāhu takkagovacchā”ti pucchitvā “khīragovacchā,
anya-e0101n0:184_6: bhikkhūpi khīraṃ labheyyu”nti evamādinā nayena tesaṃ dārakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ nivedetvā khīradāpanādikaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:185_0: Kulūpako kira bhikkhu bhuñjitukāmo gehaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0101n0:185_1: Taṃ disvā adātukāmā gharaṇī “taṇḍulā natthī”ti bhaṇantī taṇḍule āharitukāmā viya paṭivissakagharaṃ gatā.
anya-e0101n0:185_2: Bhikkhupi antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā olokento kavāṭakoṇe ucchuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:185_8: Bhikkhu “upāsike ‘ajja bhikkhā na sampajjissatī’ti paṭikacceva nimittaṃ addasa”nti āha. Kiṃ, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n0:185_9: Kavāṭakoṇe nikkhittaṃ ucchuṃ viya sappaṃ addasaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:185_10: ‘taṃ paharissāmī’ti olokento bhājane ṭhapitaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pāsāṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:185_11: leḍḍukena pahaṭena sappena kataṃ piṭake nikkhittaloṇamacchaphālasadisaṃ phaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:185_12: tassa taṃ leḍḍuṃ ḍaṃsitukāmassa kumbhiyā taṇḍulasadise dante,
anya-e0101n0:185_13: athassa kupitassa ghaṭe pakkhittaghatasadisaṃ mukhato nikkhamantaṃ visamissakaṃ kheḷanti.
anya-e0101n0:185_14: Sā “na sakkā muṇḍakaṃ vañcetu”nti ucchuṃ datvā odanaṃ pacitvā ghataguḷamacchehi saddhiṃ sabbaṃ adāsīti.
anya-e0101n0:185_15: Evaṃ samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:185_16: Parikathāti yathā taṃ labhati tassa parivattetvā kathananti.
anya-e0101n0:186_3: Ukkhepanāti mā etaṃ ettha kathethāti vācāya ukkhipanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:186_4: Sabbatobhāgena savatthukaṃ sahetukaṃ katvā ukkhepanā samukkhepanā.
anya-e0101n0:186_5: Atha vā adentaṃ disvā “aho dānapatī”ti evaṃ ukkhipanaṃ ukkhepanā.
anya-e0101n0:186_7: Khipanāti kiṃ imassa jīvitaṃ bījabhojinoti evaṃ uppaṇḍanā.
anya-e0101n0:186_9: yo niccakālaṃ sabbesampi natthīti vacanaṃ detīti suṭṭhutaraṃ uppaṇḍanā.
anya-e0101n0:186_12: Avaṇṇahārikāti evaṃ me avaṇṇabhayāpi dassatīti gehato gehaṃ gāmato gāmaṃ janapadato janapadaṃ avaṇṇaharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:186_13: Parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti purato madhuraṃ bhaṇitvā parammukhe avaṇṇabhāsitā.
anya-e0101n0:186_14: Esā hi abhimukhaṃ oloketuṃ asakkontassa parammukhānaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ khādanamiva hoti,
anya-e0101n0:186_16: Ayaṃ vuccati nippesikatāti ayaṃ yasmā veḷupesikāya viya abbhaṅgaṃ parassa guṇaṃ nippeseti nipuñchati,
anya-e0101n0:186_17: yasmā vā gandhajātaṃ nipisitvā gandhamagganā viya paraguṇe nipisitvā vicuṇṇetvā esā lābhamagganā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:187_6: Ādito paṭṭhāya laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ tatra tatra kuladārakānaṃ datvā ante khīrayāguṃ labhitvā gatabhikkhuvatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:188_0: Idāni evamādīnañca pāpadhammānanti ettha ādisaddena “yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni
anya-e0101n0:188_1: bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappenti.
anya-e0101n0:188_6: dabbihoma”nti ādinā nayena brahmajāle vuttānaṃ anekesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:188_7: Iti yvāyaṃ imesaṃ ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamavasena,
anya-e0101n0:188_8: imesañca “kuhanā lapanā nemittikatā nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti evamādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vasena pavatto micchājīvo,
anya-e0101n0:188_12: Etaṃ āgamma jīvantīti ājīvo. Ko so,
anya-e0101n0:190_2: tattha paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā,
anya-e0101n0:190_4: Ettha ca sītassa paṭighātāyātiādinā nayena vuttapaccavekkhaṇameva “yoniso paṭisaṅkhā”ti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:190_9: ettakameva hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ yadidaṃ sītassa paṭighātāyātiādi,
anya-e0101n0:190_11: Sītassāti ajjhattadhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhāutupariṇāmanavasena vā uppannassa yassa kassaci sītassa.
anya-e0101n0:190_15: Sītabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:190_16: tasmā sītassa paṭighātāya cīvaraṃ paṭisevitabbanti bhagavā anuññāsi.
anya-e0101n0:190_25: Sarīsapāti ye keci sarantā gacchanti dīghajātikā sappādayo,
anya-e0101n0:190_26: tesaṃ daṭṭhasamphasso ca phuṭṭhasamphasso cāti duvidho samphasso,
anya-e0101n0:190_27: sopi cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinnaṃ na bādhati,
anya-e0101n0:190_28: tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya paṭisevati.
anya-e0101n0:190_33: Yasmiṃ yasmiñhi aṅge vivariyamāne hirī kuppati vinassati,
anya-e0101n0:190_34: taṃ taṃ hiriṃ kopanato hirikopīnanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:191_1: Yo hi koci āhāro bhikkhuno piṇḍolyena patte patitattā piṇḍapātoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:191_3: tattha tattha laddhānaṃ bhikkhānaṃ sannipāto samūhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:191_4: Neva davāyāti na gāmadārakādayo viya davatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:191_6: Na madāyāti na muṭṭhikamallādayo viya madatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:191_8: Na maṇḍanāyāti na antepurikavesiyādayo viya maṇḍanatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:191_10: Na vibhūsanāyāti na naṭanaccakādayo viya vibhūsanatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:191_12: Ettha ca neva davāyāti etaṃ mohūpanissayappahānatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:191_14: Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti etaṃ rāgūpanissayappahānatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:191_15: Neva davāya na madāyāti cetaṃ attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:191_16: Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti etaṃ parassapi saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:191_17: Catūhipi cetehi ayoniso paṭipattiyā kāmasukhallikānuyogassa ca pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:192_6: akkhabbhañjanamiva ca sākaṭiko kāyassa ṭhitatthaṃ yāpanatthañcesa piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n0:192_9: tasmā imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti ettāvatā etassa kāyassa jīvitindriyapavattāpanatthantipi vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:192_13: Brahmacariyānuggahāyāti sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ca maggabrahmacariyassa ca anuggahatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:192_14: Ayañhi piṇḍapātapaṭisevanapaccayā kāyabalaṃ nissāya sikkhattayānuyogavasena bhavakantāranittharaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0101n0:193_0: Itipurāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti etaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
anya-e0101n0:193_4: Atha vā yā adhunā asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ nissāya purāṇakammapaccayavasena uppajjanato purāṇavedanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:193_5: Sappāyaparimitabhojanena tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi.
anya-e0101n0:193_6: Yā cāyaṃ adhunā kataṃ ayuttaparibhogakammūpacayaṃ nissāya āyatiṃ uppajjanato navavedanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:193_7: Yuttaparibhogavasena tassā mūlaṃ anibbattento taṃ navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:193_8: Ettāvatā yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho attakilamathānuyogappahānaṃ dhammikasukhāpariccāgo ca dīpito hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:194_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti parimitaparibhogena jīvitindriyupacchedakassa iriyāpathabhañjakassa vā parissayassa
anya-e0101n0:194_1: abhāvato cirakālagamanasaṅkhātā yātrā ca me bhavissati imassa paccayāyattavuttino kāyassātipi paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n0:194_9: catupañcālopamattaūnabhojanena catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanato phāsuvihāro ca me bhavissatītipi paṭisevati.
anya-e0101n0:197_0: Ettāvatā ca payojanapariggaho majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:198_1: Yattha yattha hi seti vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā,
anya-e0101n0:198_8: Yo sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro asappāyo utu senāsanapaṭisevanena vinodetabbo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:198_13: evamidhāpi niyataṃ utuparissayavinodanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:198_14: Atha vā ayaṃ vuttappakāro utu utuyeva.
anya-e0101n0:198_19: Ye yattha apariguttiyā ca asappāyarūpadassanādinā ca ābādhaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0101n0:198_20: taṃ senāsanaṃ evaṃ jānitvā paccavekkhitvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso senāsanaṃ utuparissayavinodanatthaṃ paṭisevatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:199_5: yaṃkiñci gilānassa sappāyaṃ bhisakkakammaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:199_6: Parikkhāroti pana “sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhataṃ hotī”ti ādīsu parivāro vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:199_9: “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”ti ādīsu sambhāro.
anya-e0101n0:199_16: Evaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjañca taṃ parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro.
anya-e0101n0:199_18: Gilānassa yaṃkiñci sappāyaṃ bhisakkānuññātaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādi jīvitaparikkhāranti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:199_26: Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti tāvāti attho.
anya-e0101n0:200_0: Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato paṭisaṅkhā yoniso paccayaparibhogalakkhaṇaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:200_2: cīvarādayo hi yasmā te paṭicca nissāya paribhuñjamānā pāṇino ayanti pavattanti,
anya-e0101n0:202_1: Evametasmiṃ catubbidhe sīle saddhāya pātimokkhasaṃvaro sampādetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:202_5: Tasmā yathā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ anavasesaṃ saddhāya samādiyitvā jīvitepi apekkhaṃ akarontena sādhukaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:207_1: “evameva kho pahārāda yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:207_3: Imasmiṃ ca panatthe aṭaviyaṃ corehi baddhatherānaṃ vatthūni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:208_0: Mahāvattaniaṭaviyaṃ kira theraṃ corā kāḷavallīhi bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:208_1: Thero yathānipannova sattadivasāni vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇitvā tattheva kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
anya-e0101n0:209_0: Aparampi theraṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe pūtilatāya bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:209_1: So vanadāhe āgacchante valliṃ acchinditvāva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n0:209_2: Dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ āgacchanto disvā therassa sarīraṃ jhāpetvā cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0101n0:212_6: tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ sampalimaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:212_7: na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”ti ādinā nayena ādittapariyāyaṃ samanussaritvā
anya-e0101n0:212_8: rūpādīsu visayesu cakkhudvārādipavattassa viññāṇassa abhijjhādīhi anvāssavanīyaṃ nimittādiggāhaṃ asammuṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n0:212_10: Evaṃ asampādite hi etasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi anaddhaniyaṃ hoti aciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:219_0: Sampādite pana tasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi addhaniyaṃ hoti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:225_0: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:227_1: tasmā uppannaṃ rāgaṃ asubhamanasikārena vinodetvā indriyasaṃvaro sampādetabbo,
anya-e0101n0:228_0: Therassa kira adhunāpabbajitassa piṇḍāya carato ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā rāgo uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:235_0: “Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato no ca attato;
anya-e0101n0:237_1: Apica indriyasaṃvarapūrakena bhikkhunā kuraṇḍakamahāleṇavāsinā cittaguttattherena viya corakamahāvihāravāsinā mahāmittattherena viya ca bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:237_2: Kuraṇḍakamahāleṇe kira sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ abhinikkhamanacittakammaṃ manoramaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0101n0:237_3: sambahulā bhikkhū senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā cittakammaṃ disvā “manoramaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:237_6: vassāni leṇe vasantassa cittakammaṃ atthītipi na jānāmi,
anya-e0101n0:237_8: Therena kira ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vasantena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā leṇaṃ na ullokitapubbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:237_11: Anusaṃvaccharaṃ bhūmiyaṃ kesaranipātaṃ disvāvassa pupphitabhāvaṃ jānāti.
anya-e0101n0:238_0: Rājā therassa guṇasampattiṃ sutvā vanditukāmo tikkhattuṃ pesetvā anāgacchante there tasmiṃ gāme taruṇaputtānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:238_1: itthīnaṃ thane bandhāpetvā lañjāpesi “tāva dārakā thaññaṃ mā labhiṃsu,
anya-e0101n0:238_5: theraṃ pavesetha sīlāni gaṇhissāmī”ti antepuraṃ abhiharāpetvā vanditvā bhojetvā “ajja, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:238_7: sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmīti therassa pattaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ anugantvā deviyā saddhiṃ vanditvā nivatti.
anya-e0101n0:238_8: Thero rājā vā vandatu devī vā,
anya-e0101n0:238_13: tumhe raññepi vandamāne deviyāpi vandamānāya “sukhī hotu,
anya-e0101n0:238_16: rājāti vā devīti vā vavatthānaṃ karomī”ti vatvā sattāhātikkamena “therassa idha vāso dukkho”ti raññā
anya-e0101n0:238_17: vissajjito kuraṇḍakamahāleṇaṃ gantvā rattibhāge caṅkamaṃ ārūhi.
anya-e0101n0:238_18: Nāgarukkhe adhivatthā devatā daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:238_20: Thero “kiṃ nu me ajja kammaṭṭhānaṃ ativiya pakāsatī”ti attamano majjhimayāmasamanantaraṃ sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n0:240_0: Bālo viya ca utrasto, na bhave lolalocano.
anya-e0101n0:243_4: bhātu santikaṃ gantvā mama aphāsukabhāvaṃ ārocetvā bhesajjamāharā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:243_10: tato paṭṭhāya na mayā lobhasahagatena cittena indriyāni bhinditvā visabhāgarūpaṃ olokitapubbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:243_11: iminā saccavacanena mātuyā me phāsu hotu,
anya-e0101n0:243_12: gaccha idaṃ vatvā upāsikāya sarīraṃ parimajjā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:243_13: Sā gantvā imamatthaṃ ārocetvā tathā akāsi.
anya-e0101n0:243_14: Upāsikāya taṃkhaṇaṃyeva gaṇḍo pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyitvā antaradhāyi,
anya-e0101n0:243_16: kasmā mama puttasadisassa bhikkhuno jālavicitrena hatthena sīsaṃ na parāmaseyyā”ti attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi. Tasmā –
anya-e0101n0:246_4: Tasmā anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ pahāya vīriyena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi sammā esanāhi esā sampādetabbā parisuddhuppādeyeva
anya-e0101n0:246_5: paccaye paṭisevamānena aparisuddhuppāde āsīvise viya parivajjayatā.
anya-e0101n0:246_7: dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannānaṃ gihīnaṃ santikā uppannā paccayā parisuddhuppādā nāma.
anya-e0101n0:246_9: Pariggahitadhutaṅgassa piṇḍapātacariyādīhi dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānaṃ santikā dhutaṅganiyamānulomena uppannā parisuddhuppādā nāma.
anya-e0101n0:246_10: Ekabyādhivūpasamatthañcassa pūtihariṭakīcatumadhuresu uppannesu “catumadhuraṃ aññepi sabrahmacārino paribhuñjissantī”ti
anya-e0101n0:246_11: cintetvā hariṭakīkhaṇḍameva paribhuñjamānassa dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ patirūpaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:246_14: tesu yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ājīvaṃ parisodhentassa cīvare ca piṇḍapāte ca nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo na vaṭṭanti.
anya-e0101n0:246_16: Tattha nimittaṃ nāma senāsanatthaṃ bhūmiparikammādīni karontassa “kiṃ, bhante, kariyati,
anya-e0101n0:246_17: ko kārāpetī”ti gihīhi vutte “na koci”ti paṭivacanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:246_19: Obhāso nāma “upāsakā tumhe kuhiṃ vasathā”ti. Pāsāde, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n0:246_20: “Bhikkhūnaṃ pana upāsakā pāsādo na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:246_25: Tathā uppannaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ roge vūpasante paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n0:248_0: Yo pana bhagavatā anuññātāpi nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo akaronto appicchatādiguṇeyeva nissāya jīvitakkhayepi
anya-e0101n0:249_0: So kirāyasmā ekasmiṃ samaye pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ aññatarasmiṃ araññe viharati,
anya-e0101n0:249_1: athassa ekasmiṃ divase udaravātābādho uppajjitvā atidukkhaṃ janesi.
anya-e0101n0:249_2: Mahāmoggallānatthero sāyanhasamaye tassāyasmato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato theraṃ nipannaṃ disvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā “pubbe te, āvuso,
anya-e0101n0:249_9: sace mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā puññaṃ atthi,
anya-e0101n0:250_0: Imaṃ pana nesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā sutvā “sve ayyassa pāyāsaṃ uppādessāmī”ti
anya-e0101n0:250_1: tāvadeva therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā jeṭṭhaputtassa sarīraṃ āvisitvā pīḷaṃ janesi.
anya-e0101n0:250_3: “sace sve therassa evarūpaṃ nāma pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetha,
anya-e0101n0:250_5: Te “tayā avuttepi mayaṃ therānaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ demā”ti vatvā dutiyadivase tathārūpaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādiyiṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:251_2: tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n0:251_3: Te manussā paccuggantvā therassa pattaṃ gahetvā vuttappakārassa pāyāsassa pūretvā adaṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:251_6: aparampi dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:251_10: kathaṃ nu kho uppanno”ti cintento tassa uppattimūlaṃ disvā āha –
anya-e0101n0:251_13: Sopāyasmā “mādisena nāma ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ na paribhuñjatī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā ekavacaneneva pattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā ekamante nikujjesi.
anya-e0101n0:251_14: Pāyāsassa saha bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhānā therassa ābādho antaradhāyi,
anya-e0101n0:251_15: tato paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsa vassāni na puna uppajji.
anya-e0101n0:251_17: vacīviññattiṃ nissāya uppanno pāyāso antesu nikkhamitvā bhūmiyaṃ carantesupi paribhuñjituṃ ayuttarūpo”ti.
anya-e0101n0:253_0: Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ, sājīvo garahito mama.
anya-e0101n0:261_4: Tasmā pahāya paccayagedhaṃ dhammena samena uppanne paccaye yathāvuttena vidhinā paññāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantena sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:262_2: Paṭilābhakālepi hi dhātuvasena vā paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhitvā ṭhapitāni cīvarādīni tato uttari paribhuñjantassa anavajjova paribhogo,
anya-e0101n0:263_4: Tatra saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma.
anya-e0101n0:263_13: Evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti,
anya-e0101n0:263_14: paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
anya-e0101n0:264_7: Tañhi “na puna evaṃ karissāmī”ti cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato saṃvarasuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:264_9: Tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa pariyesanāya suddhattā pariyeṭṭhisuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:264_11: Tañhi vuttappakārena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato paccavekkhaṇasuddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:264_12: Tena vuttaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:265_2: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0101n0:265_5: Gihīhi dinnāpi bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti,
anya-e0101n0:266_1: Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0101n0:267_0: Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:267_4: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:267_6: Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:267_7: Imesu pana paribhogesu yasmā sāmiparibhogo aggo,
anya-e0101n0:267_8: tasmā taṃ patthayamānena bhikkhunā vuttappakārāya paccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantena paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:282_0: Imassa ca paccayasannissitasīlassa paripūrakāritāya bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:282_1: So hi sammā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñji. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:284_0: Mā heva tvaṃ sāmaṇera, jivhaṃ jhāpesi asaññato.
anya-e0101n0:294_7: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ kusaladhamme yuttānaṃ sekkhapariyante paripūrakārīnaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ pariccattajīvitānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:294_13: Tathāgatasāvakānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:295_0: Tattha anupasampannānaṃ sīlaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā pariyantapārisuddhisīlanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:300_0: Evaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi anavasesavasena samādānabhāvañca lābhayasañātiaṅgajīvitavasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvañca
anya-e0101n0:301_0: “Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
anya-e0101n0:302_0: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti. –
anya-e0101n0:303_0: Imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto jīvitasaṃsayepi sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamma tadeva apariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ
anya-e0101n0:303_1: nissāya upāsakassa piṭṭhigatova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:304_0: “Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0101n0:308_0: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ sīlaṃ upasampadato paṭṭhāya sudhotajātimaṇi viya suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya
anya-e0101n0:308_1: ca atiparisuddhattā cittuppādamattakenapi malena virahitaṃ arahattasseva padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:309_0: Mahāsaṅgharakkhitattheraṃ kira atikkantasaṭṭhivassaṃ maraṇamañce nipannaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho lokuttarādhigamaṃ pucchi.
anya-e0101n0:309_3: tumhe parinibbutāti samantā dvādasayojanā manussā sannipatitā,
anya-e0101n0:309_4: tumhākaṃ puthujjanakālakiriyāya mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatī”ti. Āvuso,
anya-e0101n0:309_5: ahaṃ “metteyyaṃ bhagavantaṃ passissāmī”ti na vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ.
anya-e0101n0:309_6: Tena hi maṃ nisīdāpetvā okāsaṃ karohīti.
anya-e0101n0:309_8: Thero tassa saha nikkhamanāva arahattaṃ patvā accharikāya saññaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0101n0:309_10: evarūpe maraṇakāle lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentā dukkaraṃ karitthā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:309_13: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya asatiyā aññāṇapakataṃ kammaṃ nāma na passāmī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:311_0: Ubhayena naṃ garahanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n0:313_0: Sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti, tassa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:315_0: Sīlato naṃ garahanti, nāssa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:317_0: Ubhayena naṃ pasaṃsanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n0:321_1: puthujjanānaṃ vā pana rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhasīlaṃ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhīti veditabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:321_3: So hi āyasmā tathārūpaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya arahatte patiṭṭhātukāmo verike āha –
anya-e0101n0:326_0: Aññataropi mahāthero bāḷhagilāno sahatthā āhārampi paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto sake muttakarīse palipanno samparivattati,
anya-e0101n0:326_1: taṃ disvā aññataro daharo “aho dukkhā jīvitasaṅkhārā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n0:326_5: imaṃ pana sīlaṃ bhinditvā laddhasampatti nāma sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭiladdhagihibhāvasadisī”ti vatvā
anya-e0101n0:326_6: “sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmī”ti tattheva nipanno tameva rogaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0101n0:333_0: “Dhiratthu maṃ āturaṃ pūtikāyaṃ, duggandhiyaṃ asuci byādhidhammaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:334_0: Yatthappamattā adhimucchitā pajā, hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:335_0: Arahantādīnaṃ pana sīlaṃ sabbadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā parisuddhattā paṭippassaddhipārisuddhīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:337_0: Dutiyapañcake pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pahānādivasena attho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
anya-e0101n0:338_50: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ, veramaṇī, cetanā, saṃvaro,
anya-e0101n0:338_64: ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:339_0: Ettha ca pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ anuppādamattato.
anya-e0101n0:339_1: Yasmā pana taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena upadhāraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:339_3: Tasmā pubbe vutteneva upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:339_4: Itare cattāro dhammā tato tato veramaṇivasena,
anya-e0101n0:339_7: taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassa avītikkamanavasena ca cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
anya-e0101n0:342_6: So pana khaṇḍādibhāvo lābhayasādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca saṅgahito.
anya-e0101n0:343_0: Tathā hi yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:343_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n0:343_3: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n0:343_5: tassa piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n0:343_7: tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n0:343_8: Evaṃ tāva lābhādihetukena bhedena khaṇḍādibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:345_1: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:345_2: apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ parimaddanaṃ nhāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati,
anya-e0101n0:345_9: aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena,
anya-e0101n0:346_2: paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0101n0:346_4: Apica kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati,
anya-e0101n0:347_2: na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati.
anya-e0101n0:347_4: Napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati.
anya-e0101n0:347_5: Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
anya-e0101n0:348_6: Apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭā vā tiropākārā vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
anya-e0101n0:349_7: Apica kho yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
anya-e0101n0:350_4: napi yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
anya-e0101n0:350_6: Apica kho passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:351_3: napi passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0101n0:351_5: Apica kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā
anya-e0101n0:351_6: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
anya-e0101n0:352_0: Evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca khaṇḍādibhāvo saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:353_3: aparāya ca “kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sātheyyaṃ thambho sārambho māno atimāno mado pamādo”tiādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ anuppattiyā,
anya-e0101n0:354_0: Yāni hi sīlāni lābhādīnampi atthāya abhinnāni,
anya-e0101n0:354_2: methunasaṃyogehi vā kodhupanāhādīhi vā pāpadhammehi anupahatāni,
anya-e0101n0:354_3: tāni sabbaso akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0101n0:354_7: upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni ca honti.
anya-e0101n0:355_0: Taṃ panetaṃ vodānaṃ dvīhākārehi sampajjati sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena,
anya-e0101n0:355_4: ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā”ti evamādisuttanayena sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:356_0: Apica dussīlo puggalo dussīlyahetu amanāpo hoti devamanussānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:356_4: tāya ca pana dussīlyatāya sāṇasāṭako viya dubbaṇṇo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:356_11: Bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantopi abhikkhuyeva gogaṇaṃ anubandhagadrabho viya.
anya-e0101n0:356_14: Sutādiguṇayuttopi sabrahmacārīnaṃ apūjāraho susānaggi viya brāhmaṇānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:357_1: hadayasantāpaṃ janayitvā uṇhalohituggārappavattanasamatthaṃ atikaṭukaṃ dukkhaṃ dassento sabbākārena paccakkhakammavipāko
anya-e0101n0:358_2: amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūta’nti? Evaṃ, bhanteti.
anya-e0101n0:358_5: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
anya-e0101n0:358_6: yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ vā brāhmaṇakaññaṃ vā gahapatikaññaṃ vā mudutalunahatthapādaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vāti. Etadeva, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:358_16: yathā etadeva tassa varaṃ dussīlassa pāpadhammassa asucisaṅkassarasamācārassa paṭicchannakammantassa
anya-e0101n0:358_17: assamaṇassa samaṇapaṭiññassa abrahmacārissa brahmacāripaṭiññassa antopūtikassa avassutassa kasambujātassa
anya-e0101n0:358_23: maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:358_24: na tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:359_0: Evaṃ aggikkhandhupamāya itthipaṭibaddhapañcakāmaguṇaparibhogapaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā eteneva upāyena –
anya-e0101n0:360_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso daḷhāya vāḷarajjuyā ubho jaṅghā veṭhetvā ghaṃseyya,
anya-e0101n0:360_9: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā abhivādanaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n0:361_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tiṇhāya sattiyā teladhotāya paccorasmiṃ pahareyya,
anya-e0101n0:361_3: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā añjalikammaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n0:362_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayopaṭṭena ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena kāyaṃ sampaliveṭheyya,
anya-e0101n0:362_3: yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n0:363_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayosaṅkunā ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena mukhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:363_3: vivaritvā tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ mukhe pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n0:363_4: taṃ tassa oṭṭhampi ḍaheyya, mukhampi, jivhampi,
anya-e0101n0:363_9: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n0:364_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso sīse vā gahetvā khandhe vā gahetvā tattaṃ ayomañcaṃ vā ayopīṭhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:364_3: vā ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ abhinisīdāpeyya vā abhinipajjāpeyya vā,
anya-e0101n0:364_5: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n0:365_2: katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya ayokumbhiyā pakkhipeyya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya,
anya-e0101n0:365_3: so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:365_7: gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ vihāraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti cāti.
anya-e0101n0:379_0: Dussīlassa vihāre, saddhādeyyamhi kā nivāsa rati;
anya-e0101n0:382_0: Antopūtīti ca yaṃ, nindanto āha lokagaru.
anya-e0101n0:385_0: Gūthaṃ viya kuṇapaṃ viya, maṇḍanakāmā vivajjayantīdha;
anya-e0101n0:386_0: Yaṃ nāma sīlavanto, santo kiṃ jīvitaṃ tassa.
anya-e0101n0:389_0: Karuṇāya vatthubhūto, kāruṇikajanassa nāma ko añño;
anya-e0101n0:390_0: Dussīlasamo dussī, latāya iti bahuvidhā dosāti.
anya-e0101n0:391_0: Evamādinā paccavekkhaṇena sīlavipattiyaṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ vuttappakāraviparītato sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsadassanañca veditabbaṃ. Apica –
anya-e0101n0:393_0: Pabbajjā saphalā tassa, yassa sīlaṃ sunimmalaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:399_0: Karoti api devānaṃ, sīlagandhe kathāva kā.
anya-e0101n0:406_0: Yā manussesu sampatti, yā ca devesu sampadā;
anya-e0101n0:407_0: Na sā sampannasīlassa, icchato hoti dullabhā.
anya-e0101n0:412_0: Evañhi vibhāvayato sīlavipattito ubbijjitvā sīlasampattininnaṃ mānasaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:412_1: Tasmā yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ imañca sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ disvā sabbādarena sīlaṃ vodāpetabbanti.
anya-e0101n0:413_0: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sīlaṃ tāva paridīpitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:417_1: Idāni yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:417_2: te guṇe sampādetuṃ yasmā samādinnasīlena yoginā dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:417_5: Iti anavajjasīlabbataguṇaparisuddhasabbasamācāro porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhāya catutthassa bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātassa
anya-e0101n0:418_0: Bhagavatā hi pariccattalokāmisānaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃyeva ārādhetukāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ terasadhutaṅgāni anuññātāni.
anya-e0101n0:423_1: Tattha atthatoti tāva rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṃ yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:423_2: atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulatīti paṃsukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:423_8: Tasmā yena samādānena so paṃsukūliko hoti,
anya-e0101n0:424_0: Eteneva nayena saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātaṃ ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti tecīvariko.
anya-e0101n0:425_1: parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte nipatananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:425_2: Taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko.
anya-e0101n0:427_0: Ekāsane bhojanaṃ ekāsanaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti ekāsaniko. Tassa aṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:428_0: Dutiyabhājanassa paṭikkhittattā kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte piṇḍo pattapiṇḍo.
anya-e0101n0:428_1: Idāni pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā pattapiṇḍo sīlamassāti pattapiṇḍiko.
anya-e0101n0:429_1: Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ nāma,
anya-e0101n0:429_3: tasmiṃ pacchābhattabhojane pacchābhattasaññaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ sīlamassāti pacchābhattiko.
anya-e0101n0:429_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ khalūti eko sakuṇo.
anya-e0101n0:429_7: So mukhena phalaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ patite puna aññaṃ na khādati.
anya-e0101n0:430_0: Araññe nivāso sīlamassāti āraññiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ āraññikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:432_1: idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:433_0: Sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṃ sīlamassāti nesajjiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ nesajjikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:434_0: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n0:434_1: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesanti dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n0:434_2: Atha vā dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n0:436_0: Samādānavidhānatotiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbāneva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavatova santike samādātabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:436_12: tasmimpi asati cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena viya samādātabbāni,
anya-e0101n0:436_14: Ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve bhātikattherānaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthu kathetabbaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:440_5: Tissāmaccamātā kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamalaṃ puñchāpetvā paṃsukūlikā gaṇhissantīti tālaveḷimagge chaḍḍāpesi.
anya-e0101n0:440_7: Nhānacoḷanti yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sasīsaṃ nhāpitā kāḷakaṇṇicoḷanti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti.
anya-e0101n0:441_1: Gatapaccāgatanti yaṃ manussā susānaṃ gantvā paccāgatā nhatvā chaḍḍenti.
anya-e0101n0:441_6: Dhajāhaṭanti nāvaṃ ārohantā dhajaṃ bandhitvā ārūhanti.
anya-e0101n0:441_9: taṃ dvinnampi senānaṃ gatakāle gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:442_8: taṃ pana sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:443_3: Bhikkhudattiyepi yaṃ vassaggena gāhetvā vā dīyati,
anya-e0101n0:443_7: Tatrapi yaṃ dāyakehi bhikkhussa pādamūle nikkhittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:443_8: tena pana bhikkhunā paṃsukūlikassa hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:443_19: Iti imaṃ paṃsukūlabhedaṃ ñatvā paṃsukūlikena cīvaraṃ paribhuñjitabbanti idamettha vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:445_0: Tesu yassa kassaci attano ruciyā gihidinnakaṃ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.

anya-e0101n0:450_0: Yaṃ lokagarunā ko taṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ na dhāraye.
anya-e0101n0:451_0: Tasmā hi attano bhikkhu, paṭiññaṃ samanussaraṃ;
anya-e0101n0:455_2: tecīvarikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:456_0: Tena pana tecīvarikena cīvaradussaṃ labhitvā yāva aphāsukabhāvena kātuṃ vā na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:456_5: Rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n0:457_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭhena rajanakāle paṭhamaṃ antaravāsakaṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā rajitvā taṃ nivāsetvā itaraṃ rajitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:457_5: Āraññake pana dve ekato dhovitvā rajituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:457_6: Yathā pana kañci disvā sakkoti kāsāvaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā uparikātuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:457_9: taṃ nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:457_10: Mudukassa sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarāni nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.

anya-e0101n0:458_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi catutthakacīvaraṃ sāditakkhaṇeyeva dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.

anya-e0101n0:468_4: taṃ divasaṃ pana nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhati.
anya-e0101n0:468_19: Itaro pātova piṇḍāya caritvā gantvā dhammarasaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
anya-e0101n0:469_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṃ sāditakkhaṇeva dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:470_4: “appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjānī”ti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitapaccayatā,
anya-e0101n0:482_2: sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:483_0: Tena pana sapadānacārikena gāmadvāre ṭhatvā parissayābhāvo sallakkhetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:483_1: Yassā racchāya vā gāme vā parissayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:483_3: Yasmiṃ gharadvāre vā racchāya vā gāme vā kiñci na labhati,
anya-e0101n0:483_8: evañhi aphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0101n0:483_9: Sace panassa vihāre dānaṃ dentā antarāmagge vā āgacchantā manussā pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ denti vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:483_10: Iminā ca maggaṃ gacchantenāpi bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ sampattagāmaṃ anatikkamitvā caritabbameva.
anya-e0101n0:483_11: Tattha alabhitvā vā thokaṃ labhitvā vā gāmapaṭipāṭiyā caritabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:484_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭho purato āhaṭabhikkhampi pacchato āhaṭabhikkhampi paṭikkamanaṃ āharitvā diyyamānampi na gaṇhati,
anya-e0101n0:484_3: Imasmiñhi dhutaṅge mahākassapattherena sadiso nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:484_5: Majjhimo purato vā pacchato vā āhaṭampi paṭikkamanaṃ āhaṭampi gaṇhati,
anya-e0101n0:485_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi loluppacāre uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:497_2: ekāsanikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:498_0: Tena pana ekāsanikena āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdantena therāsane anisīditvā “idaṃ mayhaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ sallakkhetvā nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:498_1: Sacassa vippakate bhojane ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā āgacchati,
anya-e0101n0:498_3: Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero panāha “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā,
anya-e0101n0:499_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭho appaṃ vā hotu bahu vā,
anya-e0101n0:499_4: Sacepi manussā “therena na kiñci bhutta”nti sappiādīni āharanti,
anya-e0101n0:499_7: Majjhimo yāva patte bhattaṃ na khīyati,
anya-e0101n0:499_10: Muduko yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjituṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:499_11: So hi udakapariyantiko vā hoti yāva pattadhovanaṃ na gaṇhāti tāva bhuñjanato,
anya-e0101n0:499_12: āsanapariyantiko vā yāva na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjanato.
anya-e0101n0:500_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi nānāsanabhojanaṃ bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:512_2: pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:513_0: Tena pana pattapiṇḍikena yāgupānakāle bhājane ṭhapetvā byañjane laddhe byañjanaṃ vā paṭhamaṃ khāditabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:513_3: pūtimacchakādimhi byañjane pakkhitte yāgu paṭikūlā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:513_5: Tasmā tathārūpaṃ byañjanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:513_11: Dutiyakabhājanassa pana paṭikkhittattā aññaṃ rukkhapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭatīti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:514_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa aññatra ucchukhādanakālā kacavarampi chaḍḍetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:514_3: Majjhimassa ekena hatthena bhinditvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n0:514_6: tassa yaṃ sakkā hoti patte pakkhipituṃ,
anya-e0101n0:514_7: taṃ sabbaṃ hatthena vā dantehi vā bhinditvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:515_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi dutiyakabhājanaṃ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:523_2: khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:524_0: Tena pana khalupacchābhattikena pavāretvā puna bhojanaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:525_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭho yasmā paṭhamapiṇḍe pavāraṇā nāma natthi,
anya-e0101n0:525_2: tasmiṃ pana ajjhohariyamāne aññaṃ paṭikkhipato hoti,
anya-e0101n0:525_3: tasmā evaṃ pavārito paṭhamapiṇḍaṃ ajjhoharitvā dutiyapiṇḍaṃ na bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n0:525_6: Muduko pana yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n0:526_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi pavāritānaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:528_0: Pariyesanāya khedaṃ, na yāti na karoti sannidhiṃ dhīro;
anya-e0101n0:534_2: āraññikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:535_0: Tena pana āraññikena gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:536_0: Gāmo nāma yo koci ekakuṭiko vā anekakuṭiko vā parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā samanusso vā amanusso vā
anya-e0101n0:537_0: Gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa sace anurādhapurasseva dve indakhīlā honti,
anya-e0101n0:537_1: abbhantarime indakhīle ṭhitassa thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto.
anya-e0101n0:537_2: Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṃ dassentā bāhaṃ pasāretvā leḍḍuṃ khipanti,
anya-e0101n0:537_5: Aparikkhittagāme yaṃ sabbapaccantimassa gharassa dvāre ṭhito mātugāmo bhājanena udakaṃ chaḍḍeti,
anya-e0101n0:538_0: Araññaṃ pana vinayapariyāye tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:538_3: Imasmiṃ pana suttantikapariyāye “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:538_4: Taṃ āropitena ācariyadhanunā parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato aparikkhittassa paṭhamaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n0:539_1: yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ senāsanaṃ vā bhattasālā vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā bodhi vā cetiyaṃ vā dūre cepi senāsanato hoti,
anya-e0101n0:539_2: taṃ paricchedaṃ katvā minitabbanti vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:539_3: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārassapi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabbanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:540_2: pabbatanadīādīhi pana antaritattā na sakkā ujuṃ gantuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:540_6: Yo pana āsannagāmassa aṅgasampādanatthaṃ tato tato maggaṃ pidahati,
anya-e0101n0:541_0: Sace pana āraññikassa bhikkhuno upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā gilāno hoti,
anya-e0101n0:541_1: tena araññe sappāyaṃ alabhantena gāmantasenāsanaṃ netvā upaṭṭhātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:541_2: Kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā aṅgayuttaṭṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:542_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭhena sabbakālaṃ araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:542_2: Majjhimo cattāro vassike māse gāmante vasituṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:543_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi yathā paricchinne kāle araññato āgantvā gāmantasenāsane dhammassavanaṃ suṇantānaṃ aruṇe uṭṭhitepi dhutaṅgaṃ na bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:543_1: Sutvā gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge uṭṭhitepi na bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:543_2: Sace pana uṭṭhitepi dhammakathike muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā gamissāmāti niddāyantānaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahati,
anya-e0101n0:543_3: attano vā ruciyā gāmantasenāsane aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapenti,
anya-e0101n0:544_1: āraññiko bhikkhu araññasaññaṃ manasikaronto bhabbo aladdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ paṭiladdhuṃ laddhaṃ vā rakkhituṃ,
anya-e0101n0:544_4: Pantasenāsanavāsino cassa asappāyarūpādayo cittaṃ na vikkhipanti,
anya-e0101n0:547_0: Eko araññe nivasaṃ, yaṃ sukhaṃ labhate yati;
anya-e0101n0:548_0: Rasaṃ tassa na vindanti, api devā saindakā.
anya-e0101n0:555_2: rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:556_6: vihāramajjhe ṭhitarukkhanti ime rukkhe vivajjetvā vihārapaccante ṭhitarukkho gahetabboti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:557_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭho yathārucitaṃ rukkhaṃ gahetvā paṭijaggāpetuṃ na labhati.
anya-e0101n0:557_3: Majjhimo taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattehiyeva paṭijaggāpetuṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:557_4: Mudukena ārāmikasamaṇuddese pakkositvā sodhāpetvā samaṃ kārāpetvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ kārāpetvā dvāraṃ yojāpetvā vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:557_5: Mahadivase pana rukkhamūlikena tattha anisīditvā aññattha paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:558_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi channe vāsaṃ kappitakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:559_2: appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjānīti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitapaccayatā,
anya-e0101n0:570_2: abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:571_0: Tassa pana abbhokāsikassa dhammassavanāya vā uposathatthāya vā uposathāgāraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:571_3: Bhojanasālaṃ vā aggisālaṃ vā pavisitvā vattaṃ kātuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:571_5: uddisantena vā uddisāpentena vā channaṃ pavisituṃ,
anya-e0101n0:571_6: bahi dunnikkhittāni mañcapīṭhādīni anto pavesetuñca vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:571_7: Sace maggaṃ gacchantena vuḍḍhatarānaṃ parikkhāro gahito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:571_8: deve vassante maggamajjhe ṭhitaṃ sālaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:571_10: sālāya ṭhassāmīti vegena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:571_11: Pakatigatiyā gantvā paviṭṭhena pana yāva vassūparamā ṭhatvā gantabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:572_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa rukkhaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā gehaṃ vā upanissāya vasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:572_3: Majjhimassa rukkhapabbatagehāni upanissāya anto appavisitvā vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:572_4: Mudukassa acchannamariyādaṃ pabbhārampi sākhāmaṇḍapopi pīṭhapaṭopi khettarakkhakādīhi chaḍḍitā tatraṭṭhakakuṭikāpi vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n0:573_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi vāsatthāya channaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:580_0: Yasmā tasmā hi sappañño, abbhokāsarato siyāti.
anya-e0101n0:583_2: sosānikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:584_0: Tena pana sosānikena yaṃ manussā gāmaṃ nivesantā “idaṃ susāna”nti vavatthapenti,
anya-e0101n0:584_2: Na hi matasarīre ajjhāpite taṃ susānaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n0:584_3: jhāpitakālato pana paṭṭhāya sacepi dvādasavassāni chaḍḍitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:585_0: Tasmiṃ pana vasantena caṅkamamaṇḍapādīni kāretvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammaṃ vācentena na vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:585_2: tasmā uppannaparissayavighātatthāya saṅghattheraṃ vā rājayuttakaṃ vā jānāpetvā appamattena vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:586_0: Susānaṃ gacchantenāpi mahāpathā ukkamma uppathamaggena gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:586_2: Evañhissa taṃ rattiṃ bhayānakaṃ na bhavissati,
anya-e0101n0:586_3: amanussā rattiṃ viravitvā viravitvā āhiṇḍantāpi na kenaci paharitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:586_5: Majjhimayāmaṃ susāne khepetvā pacchimayāme paṭikkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti aṅguttarabhāṇakā.
anya-e0101n0:588_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi na susānamhi vāsaṃ kappanena dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:600_2: yathāsanthatikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:601_0: Tena pana yathāsanthatikena yadassa senāsanaṃ “idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti gāhitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:602_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭho attano pattasenāsanaṃ dūreti vā accāsanneti vā amanussadīghajātikādīhi upaddutanti vā uṇhanti vā sītalanti vā pucchituṃ na labhati.
anya-e0101n0:602_4: Muduko gantvā oloketvā sacassa taṃ na ruccati,
anya-e0101n0:603_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi senāsanaloluppe uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:605_0: Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena santuṭṭho, yathāsanthatiko yati;
anya-e0101n0:607_0: Na so rajjati seṭṭhamhi, hīnaṃ laddhā na kuppati;
anya-e0101n0:613_2: nesajjikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:614_0: Tena pana nesajjikena rattiyā tīsu yāmesu ekaṃ yāmaṃ uṭṭhāya caṅkamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:615_5: Mudukassa apassenampi dussapallatthikāpi āyogapaṭṭopi bibbohanampi pañcaṅgopi sattaṅgopi vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:615_7: Sattaṅgo nāma piṭṭhiapassayena ca ubhatopassesu apassayehi ca saddhiṃ kato.
anya-e0101n0:616_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi seyyaṃ kappitamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:617_1: “seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharatī”ti vuttassa cetaso vinibandhassa upacchedanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:630_0: Tattha kusalattikatoti sabbāneva hi dhutaṅgāni sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ vasena siyā kusalāni,
anya-e0101n0:631_0: Yo pana vadeyya “pāpiccho icchāpakato āraññiko hotīti ādivacanato akusalampi dhutaṅga”nti.
anya-e0101n0:631_2: na mayaṃ “akusalacittena araññe na vasatī”ti vadāma.
anya-e0101n0:631_5: So ca pāpiccho vā bhaveyya appiccho vā.
anya-e0101n0:631_6: Imāni pana tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n0:631_7: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgametesanti dhutaṅgāni.
anya-e0101n0:631_8: Atha vā dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:631_9: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n0:631_13: Nāpi akusalaṃ cīvaraloluppādīni ceva niddhunāti paṭipattiyā ca aṅgaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:632_2: Asantaṃ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṃ nāma bhavissati.
anya-e0101n0:632_3: Dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:632_4: tasmā taṃ na gahetabba”nti ayaṃ tāva kusalattikato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:634_0: Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
anya-e0101n0:635_0: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo,
anya-e0101n0:636_0: Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni,
anya-e0101n0:636_5: Yo pana na dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni,
anya-e0101n0:636_6: kevalaṃ aññe dhutaṅgena ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero viya,
anya-e0101n0:636_8: “tayidaṃ āyasmā upanando sakyaputto na dhuto dhutavādo”ti.
anya-e0101n0:636_10: ayaṃ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n0:636_11: “tayidaṃ āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo”ti.
anya-e0101n0:636_13: ayaṃ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n0:636_14: “tayidaṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhuto ceva dhutavādo cāti.
anya-e0101n0:637_4: idamatthitāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārakā pañca dhammā “appicchataṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma,
anya-e0101n0:637_5: tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho.
anya-e0101n0:637_6: Sallekhatā ca pavivekatā ca dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ca amohe ca.
anya-e0101n0:637_10: Alobhena ca anuññātānaṃ paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṃ kāmasukhānuyogaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:637_11: amohena dhutaṅgesu atisallekhamukhena pavattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dhunāti.
anya-e0101n0:638_0: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n0:639_0: Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti rāgacaritassa ceva mohacaritassa ca. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:639_1: Dhutaṅgasevanā hi dukkhāpaṭipadā ceva sallekhavihāro ca.
anya-e0101n0:639_5: Tattha hissa asaṅghaṭṭiyamānassa viharato dosopi vūpasammatīti ayaṃ dhutādīnaṃ vibhāgato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:640_0: Samāsabyāsatoti imāni pana dhutaṅgāni samāsato tīṇi sīsaṅgāni,
anya-e0101n0:640_7: Abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ rakkhantassa kiṃ atthi rukkhamūlikaṅgayathāsanthatikaṅgesu rakkhitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0101n0:640_13: sosānikaṅganti imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni cāti aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0101n0:642_0: Puna sabbāneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitāni dvādasa,
anya-e0101n0:642_3: Yassa hi dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n0:643_0: Evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavasena duvidhānipi sabbāneva cetanāvasena ekavidhāni honti.
anya-e0101n0:644_5: Sace pana abbhokāse āraññikaṅgasampannaṃ susānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:644_6: ekopi bhikkhu ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n0:644_7: Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana āraññikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgañca dvepi sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittāni,
anya-e0101n0:644_11: Bhikkhuniyā hi dutiyikaṃ vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:644_12: Evarūpe ca ṭhāne samānacchandā dutiyikā dullabhā.
anya-e0101n0:644_16: Evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pañca hāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭheva hontīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:644_17: Yathāvuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ sesāni dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:644_20: pattapiṇḍikaṅganti imāni dve patirūpāni ceva sakkā ca paribhuñjitunti dve dhutaṅgānīti evaṃ byāsato dvecattālīsa hontīti ayaṃ samāsabyāsato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:645_0: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge
anya-e0101n0:645_1: yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:649_1: Idāni yasmā evaṃ dhutaṅgapariharaṇasampāditehi appicchatādīhi guṇehi pariyodāte imasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitena “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño,
anya-e0101n0:649_2: cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti vacanato cittasīsena niddiṭṭho samādhi bhāvetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:649_3: So ca atisaṅkhepadesitattā viññātumpi tāva na sukaro,
anya-e0101n0:649_5: tasmā tassa vitthārañca bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:651_2: Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ ārabbhamānaṃ vissajjanaṃ adhippetañceva atthaṃ na sādheyya,
anya-e0101n0:652_2: Ekārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā ca ādhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:652_4: Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0101n0:653_0: Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha pana avikkhepalakkhaṇo samādhi,
anya-e0101n0:653_3: “Sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato pana sukhamassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:654_7: tathā parittaparittārammaṇādivasena catujhānaṅgavasena hānabhāgiyādivasena kāmāvacarādivasena adhipativasena ca.
anya-e0101n0:656_1: Duvidhakoṭṭhāse channaṃ anussatiṭṭhānānaṃ maraṇassatiyā upasamānussatiyā āhāre paṭikūlasaññāya catudhātuvavatthānassāti
anya-e0101n0:656_5: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti ādivacanato pana yā parikammānantarā ekaggatā,
anya-e0101n0:657_0: Dutiyaduke tīsu bhūmīsu kusalacittekaggatā lokiyo samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:657_1: Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā lokuttaro samādhīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho.
anya-e0101n0:658_0: Tatiyaduke catukkanaye dvīsu pañcakanaye tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā sappītiko samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:658_1: Avasesesu dvīsu jhānesu ekaggatā nippītiko samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:659_0: Catutthaduke catukkanaye tīsu pañcakanaye catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:661_2: subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti evaṃ hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tividho.
anya-e0101n0:662_2: Yo hi vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ disvā vicāre adisvā kevalaṃ vitakkappahānamattaṃ ākaṅkhamāno paṭhamajjhānaṃ atikkamati,
anya-e0101n0:662_5: Catukkanaye pana dutiyādīsu pañcakanaye tatiyādīsu tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā avitakkāvicāro samādhīti evaṃ savitakkasavicārādivasena tividho.
anya-e0101n0:663_0: Tatiyattike catukkanaye ādito dvīsu pañcakanaye ca tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā pītisahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:663_1: Tesveva tatiye ca catutthe ca jhāne ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:663_3: Upacārasamādhi pana pītisukhasahagato vā hoti upekkhāsahagato vāti evaṃ pītisahagatādivasena tividho.
anya-e0101n0:664_2: Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā appamāṇo samādhīti evaṃ parittamahaggatappamāṇavasena tividho.
anya-e0101n0:666_0: Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke atthi samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño,
anya-e0101n0:667_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:667_4: Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:667_7: Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā hoti mandā asīghappavatti.
anya-e0101n0:668_0: Tattha yāni parato sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni ca vaṇṇayissāma,
anya-e0101n0:668_2: tassa dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:668_3: Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
anya-e0101n0:668_4: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
anya-e0101n0:668_5: pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī,
anya-e0101n0:668_7: Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanamanuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:668_9: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:669_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:669_12: Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā,
anya-e0101n0:669_14: Mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā.
anya-e0101n0:670_0: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya ca abhiññāya samādhiṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0101n0:670_1: tassa so samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiññoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:670_2: Esa nayo sesattayepīti evaṃ dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n0:671_4: Tattha yo samādhi appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:672_0: Tatiyacatukke vikkhambhitanīvaraṇānaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhasamādhīnaṃ vasena pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:672_3: tato pahīnasukhaṃ upekkhāvedanāsahitassa samādhino vasena duvaṅgikaṃ catutthaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:672_4: Iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī honti.
anya-e0101n0:673_8: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā.
anya-e0101n0:673_11: Nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhitā nibbedhabhāginī paññā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:673_12: Tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi cattāro hontīti.
anya-e0101n0:674_5: Tathā rūpāvacarādikusalacittekaggatā itare tayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n0:675_0: Chaṭṭhacatukke “chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0101n0:675_5: vīmaṃsaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ,
anya-e0101n0:675_7: ayaṃ vuccati vīmaṃsāsamādhī”ti evaṃ adhipativasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n0:676_0: Pañcake yaṃ catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:676_2: vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiyanti evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañca jhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:676_3: Tesaṃ aṅgabhūtā ca pañca samādhīti evaṃ pañcajhānaṅgavasena pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
