anya-e0101n0:677_1: Ko cassa saṃkileso kiṃ vodānanti ettha pana vissajjanaṃ vibhaṅge vuttameva.
anya-e0101n0:677_4: Tattha “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā”ti iminā nayena hānabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:677_5: “Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti visesabhāginī paññā”ti iminā nayena visesabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:679_1: Kathaṃ bhāvetabboti ettha pana yo tāva ayaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhotiādīsu ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto,
anya-e0101n0:679_3: Paññāya hi bhāvitāya so bhāvito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:679_4: Tasmā taṃ sandhāya evaṃ bhāvetabboti na kiñci visuṃ vadāma.
anya-e0101n0:680_1: so vuttanayena sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
anya-e0101n0:680_2: taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0101n0:680_3: aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena
anya-e0101n0:680_4: khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0101n0:681_1: yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi,
anya-e0101n0:682_0: Āvāso ca kulaṃ lābho, gaṇo kammañca pañcamaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:683_0: Addhānaṃ ñāti ābādho, gantho iddhīti te dasāti. –
anya-e0101n0:684_0: Ime dasa palibodhā nāma. Tattha āvāsoyeva āvāsapalibodho. Esa nayo kulādīsu.
anya-e0101n0:685_0: Tattha āvāsoti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi pariveṇaṃ sakalopi saṅghārāmo.
anya-e0101n0:685_2: Yo panettha navakammādīsu ussukkaṃ vā āpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:685_4: yena kenaci vā kāraṇena apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto,
anya-e0101n0:686_1: dve kira kulaputtā anurādhapurā nikkhamitvā anupubbena thūpārāme pabbajiṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:686_2: Tesu eko dve mātikā paguṇā katvā pañcavassiko hutvā pavāretvā pācinakhaṇḍarājiṃ nāma gato.
anya-e0101n0:686_4: Pācinakhaṇḍarājigato tattha ciraṃ vasitvā thero hutvā cintesi “paṭisallānasāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:686_7: Pavisantaṃyeva ca naṃ disvā samānavassikatthero paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā vattaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0101n0:686_8: Āgantukatthero senāsanaṃ pavisitvā cintesi “idāni me sahāyo sappiṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā pānakaṃ vā pesessati.
anya-e0101n0:686_10: So rattiṃ aladdhā pāto cintesi “idāni upaṭṭhākehi gahitaṃ yāgukhajjakaṃ pesessatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:686_12: paviṭṭhassa maññe dassatī”ti pātova tena saddhiṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n0:686_13: Te dve ekaṃ vīthiṃ caritvā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā piviṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:686_15: bhattakāle idāni manussā paṇītaṃ bhattaṃ dassantī”ti,
anya-e0101n0:686_16: tato bhattakālepi piṇḍāya caritvā laddhameva bhuñjitvā itaro āha – “kiṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:686_21: Thero nagarato dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamanto kumbhakāragāmamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
anya-e0101n0:686_26: pācinakhaṇḍarājiyā vaṇṇaṃ abhāsīti? Kiṃ pana, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:686_27: tumhākaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitaṭṭhāne na koci atirekaparikkhāro atthīti?
anya-e0101n0:686_32: kattaradaṇḍo telanāḷi upāhanatthavikā ca tatthevāti. Tayāvuso,
anya-e0101n0:686_33: ekadivasaṃ vasitvā ettakaṃ ṭhapitanti? Āma, bhante.
anya-e0101n0:686_37: lohapāsāde sappāyaṃ dhammassavanaṃ mahācetiyadassanaṃ theradassanañca labbhati,
anya-e0101n0:686_39: Idheva tumhe vasathā”ti dutiyadivase pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sayameva agamāsīti.
anya-e0101n0:687_1: Ekaccassa hi upaṭṭhākakulampi “sukhitesu sukhito”tiādinā nayena saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato palibodho hoti,
anya-e0101n0:687_2: so kulamānusakehi vinā dhammassavanāya sāmantavihārampi na gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:688_1: Therabhaginīpi upāsikā sadā theraṃ tassa pavattiṃ pucchati.
anya-e0101n0:688_2: Thero ekadivasaṃ daharaṃ ānessāmīti rohaṇābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0101n0:688_4: upajjhāyaṃ dāni passitvā upāsikāya ca pavattiṃ ñatvā āgamissāmī”ti rohaṇato nikkhami.
anya-e0101n0:688_6: So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle therassa vattaṃ katvā “kuhiṃ yāsī”ti pucchito tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
anya-e0101n0:688_11: ahaṃ pana idheva imaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmīti taṃ uyyojesi.
anya-e0101n0:689_1: amhākaṃ senāsanaṃ patta”nti pucchanto “āgantukassa daharassā”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha – “bhante,
anya-e0101n0:689_2: amhākaṃ senāsane vassaṃ upagatassa vattaṃ atthī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:689_4: Temāsaṃ amhākaṃyeva ghare bhikkhaṃ gahetvā pavāretvā gamanakāle āpucchitabbanti.
anya-e0101n0:689_6: Upāsakopi gharaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ āvāse eko āgantuko ayyo upagato sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo”ti āha.
anya-e0101n0:689_7: Upāsikā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādesi.
anya-e0101n0:690_0: So temāsampi tattha piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā vassaṃvuttho “ahaṃ gacchāmī”ti āpucchi.
anya-e0101n0:690_2: gacchathā”ti dutiyadivase ghareyeva bhojetvā telanāḷiṃ pūretvā ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ navahatthañca sāṭakaṃ datvā “gacchatha,
anya-e0101n0:691_0: Upajjhāyopissa pavāretvā paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto pubbe diṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva taṃ addasa.
anya-e0101n0:691_1: So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle therassa vattaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0101n0:691_5: bhante”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tena telena therassa pāde makkhetvā guḷena pānakaṃ katvā tampi sāṭakaṃ therasseva datvā theraṃ vanditvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:691_7: Theropi vihāraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase koraṇḍakagāmaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0101n0:692_0: Upāsikāpi “mayhaṃ bhātā mama puttaṃ gahetvā idāni āgacchatī”ti sadā maggaṃ olokayamānāva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:692_1: Sā taṃ ekakameva āgacchantaṃ disvā “mato me maññe putto,
anya-e0101n0:692_2: ayaṃ thero ekakova āgacchatī”ti therassa pādamūle nipatitvā paridevamānā rodi.
anya-e0101n0:692_3: Thero “nūna daharo appicchatāya attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva gato”ti taṃ samassāsetvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā pattatthavikato taṃ sāṭakaṃ nīharitvā dasseti.
anya-e0101n0:693_0: Upāsikā pasīditvā puttena gatadisābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā namassamānā āha –
anya-e0101n0:693_1: “mayhaṃ puttasadisaṃ vata maññe bhikkhuṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā bhagavā rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:693_5: Vijātamātuyā nāma gehe temāsaṃ bhuñjamānopi ‘ahaṃ putto tvaṃ mātā’ti na vakkhati,
anya-e0101n0:694_2: Puññavantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagataṭṭhāne manussā mahāparivāre paccaye denti.
anya-e0101n0:694_3: So tesaṃ anumodento dhammaṃ desento samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na okāsaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:694_7: asuko upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti,
anya-e0101n0:694_11: Tena gaṇaṃ pahāya yattha naṃ na jānanti,
anya-e0101n0:695_1: yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā dento samaṇadhammassa okāsaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n0:695_4: Sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu gahitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:695_9: yojanato paraṃ agantvā antoyojanaparicchede aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:695_12: tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni gacchathā”ti gaṇaṃ pahāya attano kammaṃ kattabbanti.
anya-e0101n0:696_2: katākate ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti sabbadā palibodho hoti.
anya-e0101n0:697_1: Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:697_3: Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:697_4: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodanīyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:697_5: tasmā gantvā taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbanti.
anya-e0101n0:698_3: tasmā so palibodho upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:699_0: Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:699_7: Sacepi hi te rajje ṭhitā honti,
anya-e0101n0:699_13: Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:699_14: Sace natthi attano santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ datvā pacchā labhantena gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:699_16: Aññātakassa bhaginisāmikassa bhesajjaṃ neva kātuṃ na dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:699_17: “Tuyhaṃ sāmikassa dehī”ti vatvā pana bhaginiyā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:699_19: Tesaṃ pana puttā imassa ñātakā evāti tesaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n0:700_3: Sace pana katipāhaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontassapi na vūpasammati,
anya-e0101n0:700_6: taṃyeva hi posento anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe dukkhaṃ pattoti attabhāvaṃ garahitvā samaṇadhammo kātabboti.
anya-e0101n0:702_0: Majjhimabhāṇakadevatthero kira malayavāsidevattherassa santikaṃ gantvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ yāci.
anya-e0101n0:702_8: tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekūnavīsativassāni sajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n0:702_9: akatvā vīsatime vasse arahattaṃ patvā sajjhāyatthāya āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “vīsati me, āvuso,
anya-e0101n0:702_11: apica kho kataparicayo ahamettha ārabhathā”ti vatvā ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ekabyañjanepissa kaṅkhā nāhosi.
anya-e0101n0:703_0: Karuḷiyagirivāsīnāgattheropi aṭṭhārasavassāni pariyattiṃ chaḍḍetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhātukathaṃ uddisi.
anya-e0101n0:703_1: Tesaṃ gāmavāsikattherehi saddhiṃ saṃsandentānaṃ ekapañhopi uppaṭipāṭiyā āgato nāhosi.
anya-e0101n0:704_0: Mahāvihārepi tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero nāma aṭṭhakathaṃ anuggahetvāva pañcanikāyamaṇḍale tīṇi piṭakāni parivattessāmīti suvaṇṇabheriṃ paharāpesi.
anya-e0101n0:704_13: Puna so aññena aññena pariyāyena evaṃ vadanti bhanteti tikkhattuṃ āha.
anya-e0101n0:704_16: ācariyamukhato pana anuggahitattā ‘evaṃ ācariyā vadantī’ti saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
anya-e0101n0:704_17: Gaccha attano ācariyānaṃ santike suṇāhī”ti. Kuhiṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:704_19: Gaṅgāya parato rohaṇajanapade tulādhārapabbatavihāre sabbapariyattiko mahādhammarakkhitatthero nāma vasati,
anya-e0101n0:704_21: bhanteti theraṃ vanditvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
anya-e0101n0:704_26: Avasesaṃ pana me tiṃsamattāni vassāni na olokitapubbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:704_27: Apica tvaṃ rattiṃ mama santike parivattehi.
anya-e0101n0:704_28: Ahaṃ te divā kathayissāmīti. So sādhu,
anya-e0101n0:704_30: Pariveṇadvāre mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā gāmavāsino divase divase dhammassavanatthāya āgacchanti.
anya-e0101n0:704_32: Taṃ divā kathayanto anupubbena desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā abhayattherassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā “āvuso,
anya-e0101n0:704_37: Tato naṃ thero añño esa, āvuso,
anya-e0101n0:704_40: Athassa so kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā āgantvā lohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento thero parinibbutoti assosi.
anya-e0101n0:704_46: So attano dhammantevāsikassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā ‘mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī’ti āha.
anya-e0101n0:705_1: Sā hi uttānaseyyakadārako viya taruṇasassaṃ viya ca dupparihārā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:705_7: itarena avasesāti ayaṃ tāva palibodhakathāya vitthāro.
anya-e0101n0:707_1: Kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha pana duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānañca.
anya-e0101n0:707_2: Tattha sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhikkhusaṅghādīsu mettā maraṇassati ca.
anya-e0101n0:708_0: Kammaṭṭhānikena hi bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ tāva paricchinditvā sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhusaṅghe sukhitā hontu abyāpajjāti mettā bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:708_4: So hi bhikkhusaṅghe mettāya sahavāsīnaṃ muducittataṃ janeti.
anya-e0101n0:708_6: Sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu mettāya mudukatacittāhi devatāhi dhammikāya rakkhāya susaṃvihitarakkho hoti.
anya-e0101n0:708_7: Gocaragāmamhi issarajane mettāya mudukatacittasantānehi issarehi dhammikāya rakkhāya surakkhitaparikkhāro hoti.
anya-e0101n0:708_8: Tattha manussesu mettāya pasāditacittehi tehi aparibhūto hutvā vicarati.
anya-e0101n0:708_10: Maraṇassatiyā pana avassaṃ mayā maritabbanti cintento anesanaṃ pahāya uparūpari vaḍḍhamānasaṃvego anolīnavuttiko hoti.
anya-e0101n0:708_11: Asubhasaññāparicitacittassa panassa dibbānipi ārammaṇāni lobhavasena cittaṃ na pariyādiyanti.
anya-e0101n0:709_0: Evaṃ bahūpakārattā sabbattha atthayitabbaṃ icchitabbanti ca adhippetassa yogānuyogakammassa ṭhānañcāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:710_0: Cattālīsāya pana kammaṭṭhānesu yaṃ yassa cariyānukūlaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:710_1: taṃ tassa niccaṃ pariharitabbattā uparimassa ca uparimassa bhāvanākammassa padaṭṭhānattā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:710_2: Iti imaṃ duvidhampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yo deti,
anya-e0101n0:712_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0101n0:713_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojakoti. ;
anya-e0101n0:714_0: Evamādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantena hitesiṃ vuddhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:715_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”ti ādivacanato pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0101n0:715_2: Tasmā tasmiṃ sati tasseva bhagavato santike gahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ sugahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:715_3: Parinibbute pana tasmiṃ asītiyā mahāsāvakesu yo dharati,
anya-e0101n0:715_5: Tasmiṃ asati yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:715_6: tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:716_0: Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavo ahaṃ khīṇāsavoti attānaṃ pakāsetīti?
anya-e0101n0:716_3: Nanu assaguttatthero āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa bhikkhuno “kammaṭṭhānakārako aya”nti jānitvā ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ
anya-e0101n0:716_4: paññāpetvā tattha pallaṅkena nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesīti.
anya-e0101n0:717_4: Ekapiṭakadharepi asati yassa ekasaṅgītipi aṭṭhakathāya saddhiṃ paguṇā,
anya-e0101n0:717_7: Evarūpo hi tantidharo vaṃsānurakkhako paveṇīpālako ācariyo ācariyamatikova hoti,
anya-e0101n0:717_9: Teneva porāṇakattherā “lajjī rakkhissati lajjī rakkhissatī”ti tikkhattuṃ āhaṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:718_0: Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo cettha attanā adhigatamaggameva ācikkhanti.
anya-e0101n0:718_1: Bahussuto pana taṃ taṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uggahaparipucchānaṃ visodhitattā ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca
anya-e0101n0:718_2: sallakkhetvā sappāyāsappāyaṃ yojetvā gahanaṭṭhāne gacchanto mahāhatthī viya mahāmaggaṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:718_4: Tasmā evarūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:719_5: Gacchantena ca na dhotamakkhitehi pādehi upāhanā ārūhitvā chattaṃ gahetvā telanāḷimadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā antevāsikaparivutena gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:719_6: Gamikavattaṃ pana pūretvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā antarāmagge yaṃ yaṃ vihāraṃ pavisati sabbattha
anya-e0101n0:719_7: vattapaṭipattiṃ kurumānena sallahukaparikkhārena paramasallekhavuttinā hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:720_0: Taṃ vihāraṃ pavisantena antarāmaggeyeva dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā gahetvā pavisitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:720_1: na ca “muhuttaṃ vissametvā pādadhovanamakkhanādīni katvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:720_2: Sace hissa tatra ācariyassa visabhāgā bhikkhū bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:720_3: te āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ācariyassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā “naṭṭhosi,
anya-e0101n0:720_4: sace tassa santikaṃ āgato”ti vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:720_6: tasmā ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā ujukaṃ tattheva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:721_7: “Pāde dhovāhī”ti vuttena na tāva pādā dhovitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:721_8: Sace hi ācariyena ābhataṃ udakaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n0:721_12: aññehi ābhata”nti vuttena pana yattha ācariyo na passati,
anya-e0101n0:721_14: abbhokāse vihārassāpi vā ekamante nisīditvā pādā dhovitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:722_0: Sace ācariyo telanāḷiṃ āharati uṭṭhahitvā ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:722_2: “ayaṃ bhikkhu ito eva paṭṭhāya sambhogaṃ kopetī”ti ācariyassa aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
anya-e0101n0:722_3: Gahetvā pana na āditova pādā makkhetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:722_4: Sace hi taṃ ācariyassa gattabbhañjanatelaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n0:722_8: pādepi makkhehī”ti vuttena pana thokaṃ sīse katvā pāde makkhetvā “imaṃ telanāḷiṃ ṭhapemi,
anya-e0101n0:723_2: Dutiyadivasato pana paṭṭhāya sace ācariyassa pakatiupaṭṭhāko atthi,
anya-e0101n0:723_7: Sītaṃ uṇhanti duvidhaṃ mukhadhovanaudakañca nhānodakañca paṭiyādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:723_8: Tato yaṃ ācariyo tīṇi divasāni paribhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:723_10: Niyamaṃ akatvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā paribhuñjantassa yathāladdhaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:723_16: kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:723_20: bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā”ti ādikaṃ khandhake sammāvattaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:724_0: Evaṃ vattasampattiyā garuṃ ārādhayamānena sāyaṃ vanditvā yāhīti vissajjitena gantabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:724_5: dasāhe vā pakkhe vā vītivatte ekadivasaṃ vissajjitenāpi agantvā okāsaṃ kāretvā āgamanakāraṇaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:724_6: Akāle vā gantvā kimatthamāgatosīti puṭṭhena ārocetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:725_0: Sace panassa tāya velāya pittābādhena vā kucchi pariḍayhati,
anya-e0101n0:725_3: taṃ yathābhūtaṃ āvikatvā attano sappāyavelaṃ ārocetvā tāya velāya upasaṅkamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:725_4: Asappāyavelāya hi vuccamānampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sakkā hoti manasikātunti.
anya-e0101n0:725_5: Ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n0:727_1: Idāni attano cariyānukūlanti ettha cariyāti cha cariyā rāgacariyā,
anya-e0101n0:727_7: Keci pana rāgādīnaṃ saṃsaggasannipātavasena aparāpi catasso,
anya-e0101n0:727_8: tathā saddhādīnanti imāhi aṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cuddasa icchanti.
anya-e0101n0:727_9: Evaṃ pana bhede vuccamāne rāgādīnaṃ saddhādīhipi saṃsaggaṃ katvā anekā cariyā honti,
anya-e0101n0:727_10: tasmā saṅkhepena chaḷeva cariyā veditabbā. Cariyā, pakati,
anya-e0101n0:727_12: Tāsaṃ vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti rāgacarito,
anya-e0101n0:728_0: Tattha yasmā rāgacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye saddhā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0101n0:728_2: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe rāgo siniddho nātilūkho,
anya-e0101n0:729_0: Yasmā pana dosacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye paññā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0101n0:729_2: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe doso nissineho na ārammaṇaṃ allīyati,
anya-e0101n0:729_4: Yathā ca doso abhūtampi dosameva pariyesati,
anya-e0101n0:730_0: Yasmā pana mohacaritassa anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya vāyamamānassa yebhuyyena antarāyakarā vitakkā uppajjanti,
anya-e0101n0:731_0: Apare taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena aparāpi tisso cariyā vadanti.
anya-e0101n0:731_2: māno ca taṃsampayuttoti tadubhayaṃ rāgacariyaṃ nātivattati.
anya-e0101n0:731_3: Mohanidānattā ca diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhicariyā mohacariyameva anupatati.
anya-e0101n0:733_0: Tatra purimā tāva tisso cariyā pubbāciṇṇanidānā,
anya-e0101n0:733_6: Pubbe majjapānabahulo sutaparipucchāvihīno ca mohacarito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:733_7: tiracchānayoniyā vā cavitvā idhūpapannoti evaṃ pubbāciṇṇanidānāti vadanti.
anya-e0101n0:733_8: Dvinnaṃ pana dhātūnaṃ ussannattā puggalo mohacarito hoti pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca.
anya-e0101n0:734_0: Tattha yasmā pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulāpi saggā cavitvā idhūpapannāpi ca na sabbe rāgacaritāyeva honti,
anya-e0101n0:734_2: Evaṃ dhātūnañca yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:734_5: Saddhācariyādīsu ca ekissāpi nidānaṃ na vuttameva.
anya-e0101n0:735_1: vuttañhetaṃ ussadakittane “ime sattā pubbahetuniyāmena lobhussadā dosussadā mohussadā alobhussadā adosussadā amohussadā ca honti.
anya-e0101n0:736_0: Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti alobho mando,
anya-e0101n0:736_2: tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
anya-e0101n0:736_3: Adosāmohā pana balavanto dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n0:736_4: Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto luddho hoti sukhasīlo akkodhano paññavā vajirūpamañāṇo.
anya-e0101n0:737_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti alobhādosā mandā,
anya-e0101n0:737_2: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca.
anya-e0101n0:737_3: Paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo dattābhayatthero viya.
anya-e0101n0:738_0: Yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n0:738_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca,
anya-e0101n0:739_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti alobhādayo mandā,
anya-e0101n0:739_1: so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
anya-e0101n0:740_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n0:740_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho appakileso hoti dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo,
anya-e0101n0:741_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n0:741_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti aduṭṭho sīlako ca,
anya-e0101n0:742_0: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā,
anya-e0101n0:742_1: so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca,
anya-e0101n0:743_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādosāmohā balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā,
anya-e0101n0:743_1: so purimanayeneva mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:744_5: Yathā vā amohaparivārena kammunā nibbatto buddhicarito,
anya-e0101n0:744_9: Evaṃ lobhādīsu aññataraññataraparivāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ cariyānaṃ nidānanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:745_0: 45. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ kathañca jānitabbaṃ ayaṃ puggalo rāgacaritotiādi. Tatrāyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0101n0:748_0: Tattha iriyāpathatoti rāgacarito hi pakatigamanena gacchanto cāturiyena gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:753_4: Rāgacarito ca ataramāno samaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
anya-e0101n0:753_5: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca sīghaṃ avuṭṭhāya saṅkito viya saṇikaṃ paṭivacanaṃ deti.
anya-e0101n0:753_6: Dosacarito taramāno yathā vā tathā vā seyyaṃ paññapetvā pakkhittakāyo bhākuṭiṃ katvā sayati,
anya-e0101n0:753_7: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca sīghaṃ vuṭṭhāya kupito viya paṭivacanaṃ deti.
anya-e0101n0:753_8: Mohacarito dussaṇṭhānaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā vikkhittakāyo bahulaṃ adhomukho sayati,
anya-e0101n0:753_9: vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca huṅkāraṃ karonto dandhaṃ vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:754_0: Kiccāti sammajjanādīsu ca kiccesu rāgacarito sādhukaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā ataramāno vālikaṃ avippakiranto
anya-e0101n0:754_2: Dosacarito gāḷhaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā taramānarūpo ubhato vālikaṃ ussārento kharena saddena asuddhaṃ visamaṃ sammajjati.
anya-e0101n0:754_3: Mohacarito sithilaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā samparivattakaṃ āḷolayamāno asuddhaṃ visamaṃ sammajjati.
anya-e0101n0:755_4: Cīvaradhāraṇampi ca rāgacaritassa nātigāḷhaṃ nātisithilaṃ hoti pāsādikaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:756_1: bhuñjamāno ca nātimahantaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopaṃ katvā rasapaṭisaṃvedī ataramāno bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:756_2: kiñcideva ca sāduṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0101n0:756_4: bhuñjamāno ca mukhapūrakaṃ ālopaṃ katvā arasapaṭisaṃvedī taramāno bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:756_5: kiñcideva ca asāduṃ labhitvā domanassaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0101n0:756_7: bhuñjamāno ca aparimaṇḍalaṃ parittaṃ ālopaṃ katvā bhājane chaḍḍento mukhaṃ makkhento vikkhittacitto taṃ taṃ vitakkento bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n0:757_0: Dassanāditoti rāgacarito īsakampi manoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā vimhayajāto viya ciraṃ oloketi,
anya-e0101n0:757_4: Dosacarito īsakampi amanoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā kilantarūpo viya na ciraṃ oloketi,
anya-e0101n0:757_8: Mohacarito yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ disvā parapaccayiko hoti,
anya-e0101n0:758_6: Dosacaritassa kodho, upanāho, makkho, paḷāso, issā,
anya-e0101n0:758_33: hurāhuraṃ dhāvanāti evamādayo dhammā bahulaṃ pavattantīti.
anya-e0101n0:759_0: Yasmā pana idaṃ cariyāvibhāvanavidhānaṃ sabbākārena neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ,
anya-e0101n0:759_3: Rāgacaritassa hi vuttāni iriyāpathādīni dosacaritādayopi appamādavihārino kātuṃ sakkonti.
anya-e0101n0:759_4: Saṃsaṭṭhacaritassa ca puggalassa ekasseva bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayo na upapajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:759_7: Vuttañhetaṃ “cetopariyañāṇassa lābhī ācariyo cariyaṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessati,
anya-e0101n0:759_9: Tasmā cetopariyañāṇena vā taṃ vā puggalaṃ pucchitvā jānitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:760_1: Kiṃ caritassa puggalassa kiṃ sappāyanti ettha pana senāsanaṃ tāva rāgacaritassa adhotavedikaṃ bhūmaṭṭhakaṃ
anya-e0101n0:760_2: akatapabbhārakaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ paṇṇasālādīnaṃ aññataraṃ rajokiṇṇaṃ jatukābharitaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ atiuccaṃ
anya-e0101n0:760_3: vā atinīcaṃ vā ujjaṅgalaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ asucivisamamaggaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:760_7: Nivāsanapārupanaṃ antacchinnaṃ olambavilambasuttakākiṇṇaṃ jālapūvasadisaṃ sāṇi viya kharasamphassaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ bhārikaṃ kicchapariharaṇaṃ sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:760_8: Pattopi dubbaṇṇo mattikāpatto vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato ayopatto vā garuko dussaṇṭhāno sīsakapālamiva jeguccho vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:760_10: Bhikkhācāragāmopi yattha manussā apassantā viya caranti,
anya-e0101n0:760_12: bhante”ti āsanasālaṃ pavesetvā yāgubhattaṃ datvā gacchantā gāvī viya vaje pavesetvā anapalokentā gacchanti,
anya-e0101n0:760_14: Parivisakamanussāpi dāsā vā kammakarā vā dubbaṇṇā duddasikā kiliṭṭhavasanā duggandhā jegucchā,
anya-e0101n0:760_15: ye acittīkārena yāgubhattaṃ chaḍḍentā viya parivisanti,
anya-e0101n0:760_17: Yāgubhattakhajjakampi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ sāmākakudrūsakakaṇājakādimayaṃ pūtitakkaṃ bilaṅgaṃ jiṇṇasākasūpeyyaṃ
anya-e0101n0:760_19: Iriyāpathopissa ṭhānaṃ vā caṅkamo vā vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:760_20: Ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci aparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:761_0: Dosacaritassa senāsanaṃ nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ suvibhattabhittithambhasopānaṃ supariniṭṭhitamālākammalatākammanānāvidhacittakammasamujjalasamasiniddhamudubhūmitalaṃ
anya-e0101n0:761_2: tattha tattha vāsatthāya nikkhittakusumavāsagandhasugandhaṃ yaṃ dassanamatteneva pītipāmojjaṃ janayati,
anya-e0101n0:761_4: Tassa pana senāsanassa maggopi sabbaparissayavimutto sucisamatalo alaṅkatapaṭiyattova vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:761_8: tena tena ekapaṭṭaṃ vā dupaṭṭaṃ vā sallahukaṃ samaṇasāruppena surattaṃ suddhavaṇṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:761_9: Patto udakapupphuḷamiva susaṇṭhāno maṇi viya sumaṭṭho nimmalo samaṇasāruppena suparisuddhavaṇṇo ayomayo vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:761_10: Bhikkhācāramaggo parissayavimutto samo manāpo nātidūranāccāsannagāmo vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:761_11: Bhikkhācāragāmopi yattha manussā “idāni ayyo āgamissatī”ti sittasammaṭṭhe padese āsanaṃ paññāpetvā paccuggantvā
anya-e0101n0:761_12: pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ sahatthā parivisanti,
anya-e0101n0:761_14: Parivesakā panassa ye honti abhirūpā pāsādikā sunhātā suvilittā dhūpavāsakusumagandhasurabhino nānāvirāgasucimanuññavatthābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā
anya-e0101n0:761_17: Yāgubhattakhajjakampi vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ ojavantaṃ manoramaṃ sabbākārapaṇītaṃ yāvadatthaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:761_18: Iriyāpathopissa seyyā vā nisajjā vā vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n0:761_19: ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci suparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ dosacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:762_3: Ārammaṇaṃ panassa parittaṃ suppamattaṃ sarāvamattaṃ vā (khuddakaṃ) na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:762_6: Sesaṃ dosacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:764_0: Buddhicaritassa senāsanādīsu idaṃ nāma asappāyanti natthi.
anya-e0101n0:765_0: Vitakkacaritassa senāsanaṃ vivaṭaṃ disāmukhaṃ yattha nisinnassa ārāmavanapokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakāni gāmanigamajanapadapaṭipāṭiyo
anya-e0101n0:765_4: tasmā gambhīre darīmukhe vanappaṭicchanne hatthikucchipabbhāramahindaguhāsadise senāsane vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:766_0: Sesaṃ rāgacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ vitakkacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:766_1: Ayaṃ attano cariyānukūlanti ettha āgatacariyānaṃ pabhedanidānavibhāvanasappāyaparicchedato vitthāro.
anya-e0101n0:766_2: Na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena āvikataṃ.
anya-e0101n0:766_3: Tañhi anantarassa mātikāpadassa vitthāre sayameva āvibhavissati.
anya-e0101n0:768_1: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha saṅkhātaniddesato,
anya-e0101n0:768_8: cariyānukūlatoti imehi tāva dasahākārehi kammaṭṭhānavinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:769_0: Tattha saṅkhātaniddesatoti cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesūti hi vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:773_0: Mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā.
anya-e0101n0:774_5: Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ saṅkhātaniddesato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:775_0: Upacārappanāvahatoti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiñca ānāpānassatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n0:776_0: Jhānappabhedatoti appanāvahesu cettha ānāpānassatiyā saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇā catukkajjhānikā honti.
anya-e0101n0:776_3: Catutthabrahmavihāro cattāro ca āruppā catutthajjhānikāti evaṃ jhānappabhedato.
anya-e0101n0:777_0: Samatikkamatoti dve samatikkamā aṅgasamatikkamo ca ārammaṇasamatikkamo ca.
anya-e0101n0:777_1: Tattha sabbesupi tikacatukkajjhānikesu kammaṭṭhānesu aṅgasamatikkamo hoti vitakkavicārādīni jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0101n0:777_4: Sopi hi mettādīnaṃyeva ārammaṇe somanassaṃ samatikkamitvā pattabboti.
anya-e0101n0:777_6: Purimesu hi navasu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:778_0: Vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanatoti imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:778_2: tadabbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sotuṃ dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni passituṃ parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0101n0:778_3: Kāyagatāsati pana asubhāni ca na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:778_5: Sā ca nesaṃ okāsena paricchinnatā bhāvanānaye āvibhavissati.
anya-e0101n0:778_10: Tatra hi nimittavaḍḍhanavasena rūpasaññā vibhūtāti vuttā.
anya-e0101n0:779_3: Yatheva hi dhammāsokakāle karavīkasakuṇo samantā ādāsabhittīsu attano chāyaṃ disvā sabbadisāsu karavīkasaññī hutvā madhuraṃ giraṃ nicchāresi,
anya-e0101n0:779_4: evaṃ theropi aṭṭhikasaññāya lābhittā sabbadisāsu upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ passanto kevalāpi pathavī aṭṭhikabharitāti cintesīti.
anya-e0101n0:780_0: Yadi evaṃ yā asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:780_3: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n0:780_5: Iminā pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:780_7: Yo vā etaṃ vaḍḍhane ādīnavaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0101n0:781_2: Tesu hi ānāpānanimittaṃ tāva vaḍḍhayato vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n0:781_4: Iti sādīnavattā okāsena ca paricchinnattā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:781_9: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”ti ādi,
anya-e0101n0:781_11: Ekāvāsadviāvāsādinā hi anukkamena ekissā disāya satte pariggahetvā bhāvento ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvāti vutto.
anya-e0101n0:781_18: Tato paraṃ vaḍḍhayatopi na kiñci hoti.
anya-e0101n0:781_26: tasmā taṃ na vaḍḍhetabbanti evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato.
anya-e0101n0:782_0: Ārammaṇatoti imesu ca cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasakasiṇā,
anya-e0101n0:782_5: Tathā dasasu anussatīsu ṭhapetvā ānāpānassatiñca kāyagatāsatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n0:782_22: yañca ālokakasiṇe sūriyādīnaṃ obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇanti imāni aṭṭha calitārammaṇāni,
anya-e0101n0:783_2: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imāni dvādasa devesu nappavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:783_4: ānāpānassati cāti imāni terasa brahmaloke nappavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:783_5: Arūpabhave pana ṭhapetvā cattāro āruppe aññaṃ nappavattati.
anya-e0101n0:784_1: Tatra ṭhapetvā vāyokasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā,
anya-e0101n0:784_2: dasa asubhāti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭhena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:784_3: Pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n0:784_5: sesaṃ sutenāti evaṃ tassā ārammaṇaṃ diṭṭhasutena gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:784_10: cattāro āruppāti imāni cettha na ādikammikena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:785_0: Paccayatoti imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā ākāsakasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā āruppānaṃ paccayā honti,
anya-e0101n0:787_0: Evamettha cariyānukūlato vinicchayo veditabboti sabbañcetaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena ca atisappāyavasena ca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:787_1: Rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārā kusalabhāvanā nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:789_1: bhāvanaṃ bhāvehī”tiādinā nayena ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni.
anya-e0101n0:789_2: Tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha kammaṭṭhānakathā vinicchayo.
anya-e0101n0:790_2: “Tena yoginā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā”ti ettha vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ
anya-e0101n0:790_3: upasaṅkamitvā buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā
anya-e0101n0:791_0: Tatra “imāhaṃ bhagavā attabhāvaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajāmī”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato attā niyyātetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:791_1: Evañhi aniyyātetvā pantesu senāsanesu viharanto bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgate santhambhituṃ asakkonto gāmantaṃ
anya-e0101n0:791_2: osaritvā gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho hutvā anesanaṃ āpajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0101n0:791_3: Niyyātitattabhāvassa panassa bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgatepi bhayaṃ na uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:791_5: purimameva attā buddhānaṃ niyyātito”ti paccavekkhato panassa somanassameva uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:791_6: Yathā hi purisassa uttamaṃ kāsikavatthaṃ bhaveyya,
anya-e0101n0:791_7: tassa tasmiṃ mūsikāya vā kīṭehi vā khādite uppajjeyya domanassaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:791_8: Sace pana taṃ acīvarakassa bhikkhuno dadeyya,
anya-e0101n0:791_9: athassa taṃ tena bhikkhunā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ kariyamānaṃ disvāpi somanassameva uppajjeyya.
anya-e0101n0:792_2: Evaṃ aniyyātitattabhāvo hi atajjanīyo vā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:792_6: tamenaṃ ācariyo āmisena vā dhammena vā na saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:792_8: So imaṃ duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ alabhanto sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n0:792_9: nacirasseva dussīlyaṃ vā gihibhāvaṃ vā pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n0:792_13: So ācariyato duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ labhanto sāsane vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa antevāsikā viya.
anya-e0101n0:793_0: Therassa kira santikaṃ tayo bhikkhū āgamaṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:793_2: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte sataporise papāte patituṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n0:793_4: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte imaṃ attabhāvaṃ paṇhito paṭṭhāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe ghaṃsento niravasesaṃ khepetuṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n0:793_6: tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte assāsapassāse uparundhitvā kālakiriyaṃ kātuṃ ussaheyyanti āha.
anya-e0101n0:793_8: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā tayopi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti ayamānisaṃso attaniyyātane.
anya-e0101n0:793_9: Tena vuttaṃ “buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:794_1: Sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā ca hutvāti ettha pana tena yoginā alobhādīnaṃ vasena chahākārehi sampannajjhāsayena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:794_2: Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayo hi tissannaṃ bodhīnaṃ aññataraṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n0:794_11: sabbe te imeheva chahākārehi attanā attanā pattabbaṃ visesaṃ pattā.
anya-e0101n0:794_15: nibbānādhimuttena nibbānagarukena nibbānapabbhārena ca bhavitabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n0:795_1: Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayādhimuttino panassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācato cetopariyañāṇalābhinā ācariyena cittācāraṃ oloketvā cariyā jānitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:795_3: Ke vā te dhammā bahulaṃ samudācaranti?
anya-e0101n0:795_4: Kiṃ vā te manasikaroto phāsu hoti?
anya-e0101n0:795_5: Katarasmiṃ vā te kammaṭṭhāne cittaṃ namatīti evamādīhi nayehi pucchitvā jānitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:796_1: Pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa ekaṃ dve nisajjāni sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:796_3: Uggahetvā aññatra gantukāmassa nātisaṃkhittaṃ nātivitthārikaṃ katvā kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:797_0: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ tāva kathentena cattāro kasiṇadosā,
anya-e0101n0:798_0: Evaṃ kathiyamāne pana kammaṭṭhāne tena yoginā nimittaṃ gahetvā sotabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:798_5: idamopammanti evaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ upanibandhitvāti attho.
anya-e0101n0:798_6: Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sakkaccaṃ suṇantena hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:798_8: na itarassāti ayaṃ gahetvāti imassa padassa atthaparidīpanā.
anya-e0101n0:799_0: Ettāvatā kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:799_1: gahetvāti imāni padāni sabbākārena vitthāritāni hontīti.
anya-e0101n0:805_1: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti ettha yassa
anya-e0101n0:805_2: tāvācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasato phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n0:805_5: yo añño gāvute vā aḍḍhayojane vā yojanamattepi vā sappāyo vihāro hoti,
anya-e0101n0:805_7: Evañhi sati kammaṭṭhānassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne sandehe vā satisammose vā jāte kālasseva vihāre vattaṃ
anya-e0101n0:805_8: katvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccapariyosāneyeva ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃdivasamācariyassa
anya-e0101n0:805_9: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā dutiyadivase ācariyaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā
anya-e0101n0:805_11: Yo pana yojanappamāṇepi phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n0:805_12: tena kammaṭṭhāne sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā suvisuddhaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā dūrampi
anya-e0101n0:805_13: gantvā samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:807_1: Tattha ananurūpo nāma aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato.
anya-e0101n0:807_14: kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena dosena samannāgato ananurūpo nāma.
anya-e0101n0:808_2: te aññamaññaṃ paṭiviruddhatāya vattaṃ na karonti.
anya-e0101n0:808_5: Tatrāyaṃ gocaragāme piṇḍāya carissāmīti pattacīvaramādāya nikkhanto sace passati vattaṃ vā akataṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā rittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:808_10: atidivā paviṭṭho niṭṭhitāya bhikkhāya kiñci na labhati.
anya-e0101n0:808_11: Paṭisallānagatopi sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ uccāsaddena saṅghakammehi ca vikkhipati.
anya-e0101n0:808_12: Yattha pana sabbaṃ vattaṃ katameva hoti,
anya-e0101n0:809_2: Yattha pana bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu,
anya-e0101n0:811_1: Vikāle āgatānaṃ attano senāsanaṃ datvā rukkhamūle vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vā vasitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:811_2: Punadivasepi evamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa okāso na hoti.
anya-e0101n0:811_3: Yattha pana evarūpo āgantukasambādho na hoti,
anya-e0101n0:812_3: tesaṃ bhājanadārudoṇikādīni pucchantānaṃ asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāneti dassetabbāni honti,
anya-e0101n0:813_1: tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassāpi santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo
anya-e0101n0:814_0: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
anya-e0101n0:815_4: sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti.
anya-e0101n0:816_1: ayamarahāti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti,
anya-e0101n0:816_4: tena divā aññatra gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:818_0: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi,
anya-e0101n0:818_1: tattha kaṭṭhahārikā pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsuṃ karonti,
anya-e0101n0:818_3: te chinditvā gharāni karissāmāti manussā āgantvā chindanti.
anya-e0101n0:818_4: Sace sāyanhasamayaṃ padhānagharā nikkhamitvā vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati,
anya-e0101n0:819_0: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito,
anya-e0101n0:819_1: tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti,
anya-e0101n0:819_7: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
anya-e0101n0:819_8: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:820_0: Visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitāti yattha aññamaññaṃ visabhāgaverī bhikkhū viharanti,
anya-e0101n0:820_2: evaṃ karothāti vāriyamānā etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmhāti vattāro bhavanti.
anya-e0101n0:821_0: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā nissito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:821_1: tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā okāsaṃ detha,
anya-e0101n0:822_0: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
anya-e0101n0:823_1: Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti paharati,
anya-e0101n0:823_3: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño vijite vicarati,
anya-e0101n0:823_5: Atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
anya-e0101n0:824_0: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
anya-e0101n0:824_3: Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā gāyi.
anya-e0101n0:824_9: Atha naṃ sā vegenāgantvā gahetvā “mayā, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:824_10: na eko na dve tumhādisā khāditā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n0:825_0: Kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā upajjhāyasamaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:825_1: Tattha so kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābho mahādosoyevāti imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato ananurūpoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:827_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
anya-e0101n0:833_1: Yo pana gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato,
anya-e0101n0:833_11: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasireneva uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
anya-e0101n0:833_12: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
anya-e0101n0:833_13: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:833_17: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
anya-e0101n0:834_0: Ayaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n0:836_1: Khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvāti evaṃ patirūpe vihāre viharantena yepissa te honti khuddakapalibodhā,
anya-e0101n0:836_5: Jiṇṇacīvaresu daḷhīkammaṃ vā tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:838_1: Idāni sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ettha ayaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakammaṭṭhānavasena vitthārakathā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:839_0: Evaṃ upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena hi bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā
anya-e0101n0:839_1: pavivitte okāse sukhanisinnena katāya vā akatāya vā pathaviyā nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:840_0: “Pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pathaviyaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti kate vā akate vā sāntake,
anya-e0101n0:840_11: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ānisaṃsadassāvī
anya-e0101n0:840_12: ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati ‘addhā imāya
anya-e0101n0:841_0: Tattha yena atītabhavepi sāsane vā isipabbajjāya vā pabbajitvā pathavīkasiṇe catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattitapubbāni,
anya-e0101n0:841_1: evarūpassa puññavato upanissayasampannassa akatāya pathaviyā kasitaṭṭhāne vā khalamaṇḍale vā nimittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:841_3: Tassa kirāyasmato kasitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentassa taṃṭhānappamāṇameva nimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n0:841_4: So taṃ vaḍḍhetvā pañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n0:842_1: tena ācariyasantike uggahitakammaṭṭhānavidhānaṃ avirādhetvā cattāro kasiṇadose pariharantena kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_3: Tasmā nīlādivaṇṇaṃ mattikaṃ aggahetvā gaṅgāvahe mattikāsadisāya aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_4: Tañca kho vihāramajjhe sāmaṇerādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne na kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_5: Vihārapaccante pana paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pabbhāre vā paṇṇasālāya vā saṃhārimaṃ vā tatraṭṭhakaṃ vā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_6: Tatra saṃhārimaṃ catūsu daṇḍakesu pilotikaṃ vā cammaṃ vā kaṭasārakaṃ vā bandhitvā tattha apanītatiṇamūlasakkharakathalikāya
anya-e0101n0:842_7: sumadditāya mattikāya vuttappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭaṃ limpetvā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_9: Tatraṭṭhakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ padumakaṇṇikākārena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā vallīhi vinandhitvā kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_11: adho aññaṃ pakkhipitvā uparibhāge suparisodhitāya aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:842_12: Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:843_1: Tasmā evaṃ vuttappamāṇaparicchedaṃ katvā rukkhapāṇikā visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti.
anya-e0101n0:843_2: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā pāsāṇapāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā samaṃ bherītalasadisaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā nhatvā
anya-e0101n0:843_3: āgantvā kasiṇamaṇḍalato aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese paññatte vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake suatthate pīṭhe
anya-e0101n0:843_5: Tato dūratare nisinnassa hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:843_7: Uccatare nisinnena gīvaṃ onamitvā oloketabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:843_9: Tasmā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā “appassādā kāmā”tiādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāmanissaraṇe
anya-e0101n0:843_11: janayitvā “ayaṃ dāni sā sabbabuddha paccekabuddha ariyasāvakehi paṭipannā nekkhammapaṭipadā”ti paṭipattiyā
anya-e0101n0:843_12: sañjātagāravena “addhā imāya paṭipadāya pavivekasukharasassa bhāgī bhavissāmī”ti ussāhaṃ janayitvā samena
anya-e0101n0:843_13: ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:844_6: Tasmā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viya samenākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:844_9: Apica vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:844_18: tāva kālasatampi kālasahassampi tato bhiyyopi eteneva nayena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:845_1: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato yadā nimīletvā āvajjantassa ummīlitakāle viya āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n0:845_3: Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:845_4: Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā tattha nisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:845_5: Pādadhovanapapañcaparihāratthaṃ panassa ekapaṭalikupāhanā ca kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo.
anya-e0101n0:845_6: Athānena sace taruṇo samādhi kenacideva asappāyakāraṇena nassati,
anya-e0101n0:845_7: upāhanā āruyha kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nimittaṃ ādāya āgantvā sukhanisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:846_0: Tatrāyaṃ purimassa ca uggahanimittassa imassa ca viseso,
anya-e0101n0:846_2: paṭibhāganimittaṃ thavikato nihatādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya sudhotasaṅkhathālaṃ viya valāhakantarā nikkhantacandamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0101n0:846_3: viya meghamukhe balākā viya uggahanimittaṃ padāletvā nikkhantamiva tato sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suparisuddhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:847_1: Uppannakālato ca panassa paṭṭhāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0101n0:848_0: Duvidho hi samādhi upacārasamādhi ca appanāsamādhi ca.
anya-e0101n0:848_1: Dvīhākārehi cittaṃ samādhiyati upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n0:848_2: Tattha upacārabhūmiyaṃ nīvaraṇappahānena cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:849_3: yathā nāma daharo kumārako ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati,
anya-e0101n0:849_4: evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ kālena nimittamārammaṇaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:849_8: yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
anya-e0101n0:849_9: evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:850_0: Tatra yadetaṃ upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppannaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:850_2: Tasmā sace teneva pallaṅkena taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkoti, sundaraṃ.
anya-e0101n0:850_4: athānena taṃ nimittaṃ appamattena cakkavattigabbho viya rakkhitabbaṃ. Evañhi –
anya-e0101n0:855_0: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
anya-e0101n0:859_0: Tatrassa yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:859_5: Yattha nimittaṃ uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti,
anya-e0101n0:859_9: Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti,
anya-e0101n0:859_10: tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:859_12: Āvāsasappāyatāya hi tambapaṇṇidīpamhi cūḷanāgaleṇe vasantā tattheva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:859_13: Sotāpannādīnaṃ pana aññattha ariyabhūmiṃ patvā tattha arahattappattānañca gaṇanā natthi.
anya-e0101n0:860_0: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho,
anya-e0101n0:862_1: yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n0:862_5: So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti,
anya-e0101n0:863_4: Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n0:863_7: taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu sappāyo.
anya-e0101n0:863_8: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ itaro ca utu asappāyo.
anya-e0101n0:864_2: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n0:865_0: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:865_1: Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi nimittāsevanabahulassa nacireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
anya-e0101n0:867_1: Yassa pana evampi paṭipajjato na hoti,
anya-e0101n0:867_8: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:867_9: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:867_10: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti,
anya-e0101n0:867_11: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0101n0:868_1: Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:868_5: Yadā panassa cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:868_8: Ajjhattikabāhire ca vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:868_9: aparisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
anya-e0101n0:868_10: Aparisuddhena ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti,
anya-e0101n0:868_11: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ na gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:868_12: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:868_13: parisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
anya-e0101n0:868_14: Parisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi vibhūtā honti,
anya-e0101n0:868_15: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:869_2: Sace hissa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti itarāni mandāni,
anya-e0101n0:869_7: tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:869_11: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:869_15: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:869_16: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
anya-e0101n0:869_22: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati.
anya-e0101n0:869_23: Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati.
anya-e0101n0:869_24: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati.
anya-e0101n0:869_25: Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati,
anya-e0101n0:869_30: Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:869_36: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato kosajjapakkhena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati,
anya-e0101n0:869_38: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā. Tenāha –
anya-e0101n0:869_43: na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:870_1: Nimittakosallaṃ nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:871_4: tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
anya-e0101n0:872_3: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n0:872_10: puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
anya-e0101n0:872_32: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n0:873_0: Ettha ca yathāsakamāhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n0:874_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā.
anya-e0101n0:874_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n0:875_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n0:876_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:877_0: Tattha sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena pavattamanasikāro kusalādīsu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n0:877_1: Ārambhadhātuādīnaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikāro ārambhadhātuādīsu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n0:877_4: Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
anya-e0101n0:877_5: Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammāti pana pītiyā eva etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:878_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā,
anya-e0101n0:879_3: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n0:879_6: so ca anatikkamanīyasāsano amhākañca bahūpakāro paṭipattiyā ca pūjiyamāno pūjito hoti na itarathā”ti evaṃ satthu mahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n0:879_8: tañca na sakkā kusītena gahetu”nti evaṃ dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n0:880_0: Ekādasadhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti buddhānussati, dhamma… saṅgha… sīla… cāga…
anya-e0101n0:880_7: Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:881_4: tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
anya-e0101n0:882_3: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
anya-e0101n0:882_7: puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? No hetaṃ, bhante.
anya-e0101n0:882_29: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
anya-e0101n0:883_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n0:884_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n0:885_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n0:886_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya
anya-e0101n0:887_1: taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikārova tīsupi padesu yoniso manasikāro nāma.
anya-e0101n0:888_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanasevanatā,
anya-e0101n0:889_0: Ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadatā,
anya-e0101n0:890_0: Pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā,
anya-e0101n0:890_5: Iti imehākārehi ete dhamme uppādento passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:890_6: Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n0:891_3: Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:892_2: Yadāssa evaṃ paṭipajjato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:893_0: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhapubbānaṃ anekakiccapasutānaṃ vikkhittahadayānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā pariccāgo.
anya-e0101n0:894_0: Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ samādhilābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:901_0: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
anya-e0101n0:902_0: Hitvā hi sammāvāyāmaṃ, visesaṃ nāma māṇavo;
anya-e0101n0:913_2: yathā hi acheko madhukaro asukasmiṃ rukkhe pupphaṃ pupphitanti ñatvā tikkhena vegena pakkhando taṃ atikkamitvā
anya-e0101n0:913_4: Aparo acheko mandena javena pakkhando khīṇeyeva sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n0:913_5: Cheko pana samena javena pakkhando sukhena puppharāsiṃ sampatvā yāvadicchakaṃ reṇuṃ ādāya madhuṃ sampādetvā madhurasamanubhavati.
anya-e0101n0:914_0: Yathā ca sallakattaantevāsikesu udakathālagate uppalapatte satthakammaṃ sikkhantesu eko acheko vegena
anya-e0101n0:914_1: satthaṃ pātento uppalapattaṃ dvidhā vā chindati,
anya-e0101n0:914_3: Aparo acheko chijjanapavesanabhayā satthakena phusitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n0:914_4: Cheko pana samena payogena tattha satthapahāraṃ dassetvā pariyodātasippo hutvā tathārūpesu ṭhānesu kammaṃ katvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:915_1: so cattāri sahassāni labhatīti raññā vutte eko achekapuriso vegena makkaṭasuttamākaḍḍhanto tahiṃ tahiṃ chindatiyeva.
anya-e0101n0:915_2: Aparo acheko chedanabhayā hatthena phusitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n0:915_3: Cheko pana koṭito paṭṭhāya samena payogena daṇḍake vedhetvā āharitvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:916_0: Yathā ca acheko niyāmako balavavāte laṅkāraṃ pūrento nāvaṃ videsaṃ pakkhandāpeti.
anya-e0101n0:916_1: Aparo acheko mandavāte laṅkāraṃ oropento nāvaṃ tattheva ṭhapeti.
anya-e0101n0:916_2: Cheko pana mandavāte laṅkāraṃ pūretvā balavavāte aḍḍhalaṅkāraṃ katvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n0:917_0: Yathā ca yo telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūreti,
anya-e0101n0:917_1: so lābhaṃ labhatīti ācariyena antevāsikānaṃ vutte eko acheko lābhaluddho vegena pūrento telaṃ chaḍḍeti.
anya-e0101n0:917_2: Aparo acheko telachaḍḍanabhayā āsiñcitumpi na visahati.
anya-e0101n0:917_3: Cheko pana samena payogena pūretvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:918_0: Evameva eko bhikkhu uppanne nimitte sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:918_3: Eko accāraddhavīriyatāya dosaṃ disvā kiṃ dānime appanāyāti vīriyaṃ hāpeti,
anya-e0101n0:918_6: Yo pana īsakampi līnaṃ līnabhāvato uddhataṃ uddhaccato mocetvā samena payogena nimittābhimukhaṃ pavatteti,
anya-e0101n0:924_1: Iti evaṃ nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādayato panassa idāni appanā ijjhissatīti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā
anya-e0101n0:924_2: pathavī pathavīti anuyogavasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanamuppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:924_3: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
anya-e0101n0:924_7: yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannapadeso gāmūpacāro nagarūpacāroti vuccati,
anya-e0101n0:924_8: evaṃ appanāya āsannattā samīpacārattā vā upacārānītipi,
anya-e0101n0:924_10: upari appanāya ca anulomato anulomānītipi vuccanti.
anya-e0101n0:925_0: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero pana “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:925_1: āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā āsevanapaccayena pacchimo pacchimo dhammo balavā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:925_2: tasmā chaṭṭhepi sattamepi appanā hotīti āha,
anya-e0101n0:925_3: taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “attano matimattaṃ therasseta”nti vatvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:925_7: Tameva vicāretvā vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ.
anya-e0101n0:925_8: Yathā hi puriso chinnapapātābhimukho dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi pariyante pādaṃ katvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti papāte eva patati,
anya-e0101n0:925_9: evaṃ chaṭṭhe vā sattame vā appetuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:926_1: Sattasu hi ṭhānesu addhānaparicchedo nāma natthi paṭhamappanāyaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:926_8: Ettha maggānantaraphalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti.
anya-e0101n0:926_9: Nirodhassa paccayo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnamupari na hoti.
anya-e0101n0:927_0: Ettāvatā ca panesa vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0101n0:927_1: Evamanena pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:928_1: Tattha vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apakkamitvā.
anya-e0101n0:928_5: tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa
anya-e0101n0:929_1: “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0101n0:929_2: nūna jhānassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ nappavattati,
anya-e0101n0:930_3: kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyāti?
anya-e0101n0:930_6: Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n0:930_10: idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro ānetvā vuccati,
anya-e0101n0:930_12: Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusaladhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
anya-e0101n0:930_13: Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:930_14: Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo,
anya-e0101n0:930_15: kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n0:930_16: tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0101n0:931_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā,
anya-e0101n0:931_2: ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo,
anya-e0101n0:931_8: ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:931_10: Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati,
anya-e0101n0:931_12: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati,
anya-e0101n0:931_14: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
anya-e0101n0:931_15: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:931_16: Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:931_22: Esa tāva nayo kāmehīti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
anya-e0101n0:932_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva kāmoti adhippeto.
anya-e0101n0:932_1: So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmo chando kāmo”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto.
anya-e0101n0:932_4: Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:933_0: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā,
anya-e0101n0:933_1: kāmacchando”tiādinā nayena vibhaṅge upari jhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato nīvaraṇāneva vuttāni.
anya-e0101n0:933_3: tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni viddhaṃsakāni vighātakānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:934_0: Evamettha vivicceva kāmehīti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
anya-e0101n0:934_1: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:934_4: Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassa lobhassa,
anya-e0101n0:934_11: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:934_12: Ayaṃ tāva vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti ettha atthappakāsanā.
anya-e0101n0:935_1: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:935_6: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:937_0: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇḍābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko.
anya-e0101n0:937_1: Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇḍānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro.
anya-e0101n0:937_2: Vipphāravā cettha vitakko paṭhamuppattikāle paripphandanabhūto cittassa ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino
anya-e0101n0:937_3: pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa.
anya-e0101n0:937_4: Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo cittassa ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya,
anya-e0101n0:937_5: paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
anya-e0101n0:937_6: Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā
anya-e0101n0:937_7: gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko.
anya-e0101n0:937_8: Vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:937_10: So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:938_0: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
anya-e0101n0:938_3: Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko,
anya-e0101n0:938_4: ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro.
anya-e0101n0:938_5: Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko,
anya-e0101n0:938_7: Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:938_8: Vibhaṅge pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā.
anya-e0101n0:940_11: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0101n0:940_13: Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ vīci viya kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati.
anya-e0101n0:940_14: Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā.
anya-e0101n0:940_15: Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho
anya-e0101n0:940_16: hutvā “imāya vata velāya catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ vandantī”ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n0:940_17: ubbegāpītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:940_18: Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi balavabuddhārammaṇāya ubbegāpītiyā ākāse laṅghesi.
anya-e0101n0:941_0: Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gacchantā “amma tvaṃ garubhārā akāle vicarituṃ na sakkosi,
anya-e0101n0:941_1: mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti agamaṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:941_2: Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī ghare ohīyitvā gharājire ṭhatvā candālokena girikaṇḍake
anya-e0101n0:941_4: catasso ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi.
anya-e0101n0:941_6: ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcarituṃ,
anya-e0101n0:941_7: evarūpañca madhuradhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī”ti muttarāsisadisaṃ cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi.
anya-e0101n0:941_8: Sā ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:941_9: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro āgantvā “amma tvaṃ katarena maggena āgatāsī”ti pucchiṃsu.
anya-e0101n0:941_11: na maggenā”ti vatvā “amma ākāsena nāma khīṇāsavā sañcaranti,
anya-e0101n0:941_13: “mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ ālokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajji.
anya-e0101n0:941_16: gahitanimitteneva pana ākāse laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitāmhī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:942_1: Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:943_0: Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca.
anya-e0101n0:943_1: Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhampi sukhaṃ paripūreti kāyikañca cetasikañca.
anya-e0101n0:943_2: Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanā samādhinti.
anya-e0101n0:943_3: Tāsu yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ gatā pharaṇāpīti,
anya-e0101n0:944_7: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti.
anya-e0101n0:944_17: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:944_18: Iti ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa,
anya-e0101n0:944_19: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:945_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:945_3: asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:945_8: Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:946_5: Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:946_7: Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyaṃ vuttiṃ
anya-e0101n0:946_8: pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti.
anya-e0101n0:946_9: Vuttañhetaṃ vibhaṅge “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati,
anya-e0101n0:948_5: vicikicchāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:948_6: Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:948_8: Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n0:948_10: Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayappalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati.
anya-e0101n0:948_11: Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā taṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n0:948_12: Byāpādena cārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na nirantaraṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n0:948_16: Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttānīti.
anya-e0101n0:949_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti,
anya-e0101n0:949_2: tehi avikkhepāya sampāditappayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīṇanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:949_4: Atha naṃ sasesasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānuppabandhanapīṇanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyati,
anya-e0101n0:949_5: tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:949_6: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0101n0:949_8: Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:949_12: evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva pañcaṅgikanti vā pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti vā vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:950_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi,
anya-e0101n0:950_3: Ettha hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:950_7: “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:950_8: Cittekaggatāpi heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇesu phusitā hutvā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:950_10: Tattha cittekaggatā kiñcāpi savitakkaṃ savicāranti imasmiṃ pāṭhe na niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0101n0:950_11: tathāpi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti evaṃ vuttattā aṅgameva.
anya-e0101n0:950_12: Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato,
anya-e0101n0:952_1: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tividhakalyāṇatā.
anya-e0101n0:952_2: Tesaṃyeva ca ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:954_11: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
anya-e0101n0:954_15: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti tilakkhaṇasampannañca.
anya-e0101n0:955_11: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva hoti tilakkhaṇasampannañca.
anya-e0101n0:956_9: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:957_3: Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:957_6: dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā ca veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:958_2: tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa jhānassa paribandho,
anya-e0101n0:958_4: Visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati.
anya-e0101n0:958_6: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattamupagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma,
anya-e0101n0:958_7: evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
anya-e0101n0:958_8: Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:959_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
anya-e0101n0:959_1: Samathabhāvupagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
anya-e0101n0:959_2: Samathapaṭipannabhāvato eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
anya-e0101n0:960_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā,
anya-e0101n0:960_1: yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni,
anya-e0101n0:960_2: yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati,
anya-e0101n0:960_3: yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
anya-e0101n0:960_4: sabbepi te ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā sampahaṃsitattā
anya-e0101n0:960_6: tasmā “dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:961_0: Tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:962_0: Idāni paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇanti ettha gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:962_6: Tatra imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:962_7: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇa”nti.
anya-e0101n0:964_1: Evamadhigate pana etasmiṃ tena yoginā vālavedhinā viya,
anya-e0101n0:964_3: Yathā hi sukusalo dhanuggaho vālavedhāya kammaṃ kurumāno yasmiṃ vāre vālaṃ vijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:964_4: tasmiṃ vāre akkantapadānañca dhanudaṇḍassa ca jiyāya ca sarassa ca ākāraṃ pariggaṇheyya.
anya-e0101n0:964_5: “Evaṃ me ṭhitena evaṃ dhanudaṇḍaṃ evaṃ jiyaṃ evaṃ saraṃ gahetvā vālo viddho”ti.
anya-e0101n0:964_6: So tato paṭṭhāya tatheva te ākāre sampādento avirādhetvā vālaṃ vijjheyya.
anya-e0101n0:964_7: Evameva yogināpi “imaṃ nāma me bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sevamānena evarūpe senāsane iminā
anya-e0101n0:964_8: nāma iriyāpathena imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ adhigata”nti ete bhojanasappāyādayo ākārā pariggahetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:964_9: Evañhi so naṭṭhe vā tasmiṃ te ākāre sampādetvā puna uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:964_10: appaguṇaṃ vā paguṇaṃ karonto punappunaṃ appetuṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0101n0:965_0: Yathā ca kusalo sūdo bhattāraṃ parivisanto tassa yaṃ yaṃ ruciyā bhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:965_1: taṃ taṃ sallakkhetvā tato paṭṭhāya tādisameva upanāmento lābhassa bhāgī hoti,
anya-e0101n0:965_2: evamayampi adhigatakkhaṇe bhojanādayo ākāre gahetvā te sampādento naṭṭhe naṭṭhe punappunaṃ appanāya lābhī hoti.
anya-e0101n0:965_3: Tasmā tena vālavedhinā viya sūdena viya ca ākārā pariggahetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:966_2: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattaṃ vā nānaccayehi sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa ambilaggehipi
anya-e0101n0:966_3: tittakaggehipi kaṭukaggehipi madhuraggehipi khārikehipi akhārikehipi loṇikehipi aloṇikehipi.
anya-e0101n0:966_6: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti ‘idaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0101n0:966_10: ambilaggaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0101n0:966_17: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo lābhī ceva hoti acchādanassa,
anya-e0101n0:966_23: paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n0:966_26: idhekacco paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe…
anya-e0101n0:966_29: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:966_30: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n0:966_35: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu lābhī ceva hoti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:966_40: paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:967_0: Nimittaggahaṇena cassa puna te ākāre sampādayato appanāmattameva ijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:967_2: Ciraṭṭhānaṃ pana samādhiparibandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ suvisodhitattā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:967_3: Yo hi bhikkhu kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandaṃ na suṭṭhu vikkhambhetvā,
anya-e0101n0:967_7: aññepi samādhiparibandhe dhamme na suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:967_8: so avisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya avisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca khippameva nikkhamati.
anya-e0101n0:967_9: Yo pana samādhiparibandhe dhamme suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:967_10: so suvisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya suparisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca sakalampi divasabhāgaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃyeva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:972_0: Tasmā ciraṭṭhitikāmena paribandhakadhamme visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:972_2: Tassa dve vaḍḍhanābhūmiyo upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n0:972_3: Upacāraṃ patvāpi hi taṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati appanaṃ patvāpi.
anya-e0101n0:974_3: yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantare kasati,
anya-e0101n0:974_4: yathā vā pana bhikkhū sīmaṃ bandhantā paṭhamaṃ nimittāni sallakkhetvā pacchā bandhanti,
anya-e0101n0:974_5: evameva tassa yathāladdhassa nimittassa anukkamena ekaṅguladvaṅgulativaṅgulacaturaṅgulamattaṃ manasā paricchinditvā yathāparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:974_8: vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedena vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:975_0: Yathā hi haṃsapotakā pakkhānaṃ uṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya parittaṃ parittaṃ padesaṃ uppatantā paricayaṃ katvā anukkamena candimasūriyasantikaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n0:975_1: evameva bhikkhu vuttanayena nimittaṃ paricchinditvā vaḍḍhento yāva cakkavāḷaparicchedā tato vā uttari vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0101n0:975_2: Athassa taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n0:976_0: Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena samāpajjanabahulena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:976_2: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
anya-e0101n0:976_3: Athassa tāni evaṃ upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:976_4: So appaguṇe jhāne ussukkamāno pattapaṭhamajjhānā ca parihāyati,
anya-e0101n0:977_2: gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate carituṃ.
anya-e0101n0:977_6: Sā purimaṃ pādaṃ na supatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchimaṃ pādaṃ uddhareyya,
anya-e0101n0:977_7: sā na ceva agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:977_16: gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate carituṃ,
anya-e0101n0:977_19: idhekacco bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
anya-e0101n0:977_36: seyyathāpi sā gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate caritu”nti.
anya-e0101n0:978_0: Tasmānena tasmiṃyeva tāva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:980_6: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ āvajjeti,
anya-e0101n0:981_1: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
anya-e0101n0:981_2: vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
anya-e0101n0:981_5: vuttanayāneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu yadā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:981_7: Ayaṃ pana matthakappattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye labbhati,
anya-e0101n0:981_9: Ito paraṃ sīghatarā āvajjanavasī nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:982_0: Āyasmato pana mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandanāgarājadamane viya sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n0:983_0: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n0:983_1: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n0:984_0: So hāyasmā upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:984_1: tiṃsamattānaṃ iddhimantasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno therassa yāguṃ paṭiggāhayamānaṃ upaṭṭhākanāgarājānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:984_2: gahessāmīti ākāsato pakkhandantaṃ supaṇṇarājānaṃ disvā tāvadeva pabbataṃ nimminitvā nāgarājānaṃ bāhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n0:987_1: Imāsu pana pañcasu vasīsu ciṇṇavasinā paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n0:987_2: vitakkavicārānaṃ oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikatvā paṭhamajjhāne
anya-e0101n0:987_4: Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vitakkavicārā oḷārikato upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n0:987_6: tadāssa oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n0:987_7: “idāni dutiyajjhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:987_9: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0101n0:988_0: Ettāvatā cesa vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ
anya-e0101n0:988_1: samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0101n0:988_2: Evamanena dvaṅgavippahīnaṃ tivaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:989_1: Tattha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā samatikkamā,
anya-e0101n0:989_3: Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi.
