anya-e0101n0:989_6: Oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti
anya-e0101n0:990_3: tasmā attani jātaṃ attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
anya-e0101n0:990_7: Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca cetaso sampasādayati,
anya-e0101n0:990_9: Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:990_10: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:991_2: vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho hutvā udetīti attho.
anya-e0101n0:991_4: Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko asahāyo hutvā itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:991_7: Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi,
anya-e0101n0:991_9: Iti imaṃ ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:992_2: atha kasmā idameva “sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti. Vuccate,
anya-e0101n0:992_3: aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:992_5: Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo,
anya-e0101n0:992_7: Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
anya-e0101n0:992_10: Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo.
anya-e0101n0:992_13: Evaṃ vuttena pana tena saddhiṃ ayamatthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati,
anya-e0101n0:993_4: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā
anya-e0101n0:994_0: Etthāha “nanu ca ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti imināpi ayamattho siddho,
anya-e0101n0:994_1: atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ ‘avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti”. Vuccate,
anya-e0101n0:994_4: Nanu avocumha “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n0:994_5: samadhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0101n0:995_4: paṭhamajjhānamiva ca na aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:995_5: Tathā vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ,
anya-e0101n0:995_6: na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
anya-e0101n0:996_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho.
anya-e0101n0:996_2: atha kho ayameva samādhi “samādhī”ti vattabbataṃ arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā,
anya-e0101n0:997_4: Yathā ca paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n0:997_6: Appanākkhaṇeyeva ca panetaṃ vinā tehi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:997_8: Pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ uppattivasena tivaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:997_9: Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti sampasādo pīti sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:997_10: taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:997_11: Ṭhapetvā pana sampasādanaṃ nippariyāyena upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tivaṅgikameva etaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:999_1: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n0:999_4: etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti vuttāya pītiyā oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyajjhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:999_5: santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya tatiyādhigamāya yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:999_6: Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato pīti oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:999_8: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n0:999_9: “idāni tatiyajjhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:999_11: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti,
anya-e0101n0:999_14: Ettāvatā ca panesa pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno,
anya-e0101n0:999_16: yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti,
anya-e0101n0:999_18: Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1000_1: Tattha pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
anya-e0101n0:1000_3: so vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n0:1000_5: tadā “pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā cā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1000_6: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1000_7: tasmā “pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1000_10: kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1000_11: Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1000_12: tasmā “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1001_1: imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1001_2: Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0101n0:1001_4: Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti
anya-e0101n0:1001_7: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1001_8: Tenāyamattho vutto “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1002_1: Upekkhako ca viharatīti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā.
anya-e0101n0:1002_4: Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī upekkhakoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1004_2: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1004_4: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
anya-e0101n0:1005_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1006_0: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1007_0: Yā pana “kālenakālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikarotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1008_3: Dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1009_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaññitā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1010_2: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1011_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1012_0: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1013_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n0:1014_0: Tatra chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā,
anya-e0101n0:1014_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0101n0:1014_3: Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya.
anya-e0101n0:1015_2: Paññā eva hi sā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā.
anya-e0101n0:1015_3: Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu kho,
anya-e0101n0:1015_6: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1015_8: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ tāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca
anya-e0101n0:1015_9: iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1015_10: Evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā,
anya-e0101n0:1015_12: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1015_13: Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti.
anya-e0101n0:1015_14: Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnā evāti.
anya-e0101n0:1016_7: Tasmā tatrāpi upekkhako ca viharatīti evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā,
anya-e0101n0:1016_10: Aparibyattañhi tassā tattha kiccaṃ vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā.
anya-e0101n0:1016_11: Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā,
anya-e0101n0:1019_1: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato.
anya-e0101n0:1020_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi.
anya-e0101n0:1020_1: Muṭṭhasatissa hi asampajānassa upacāramattampi na sampajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1020_3: Oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1020_5: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
anya-e0101n0:1020_6: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1020_8: yathā dhenupago vaccho dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1020_10: taṃ satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1020_16: no aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1021_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1021_1: Evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1021_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo,
anya-e0101n0:1021_4: yassa phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya.
anya-e0101n0:1021_5: Tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti āha.
anya-e0101n0:1022_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgipuggalaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1022_2: buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti,
anya-e0101n0:1022_5: Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1023_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti?
anya-e0101n0:1023_2: Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako,
anya-e0101n0:1023_6: Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti,
anya-e0101n0:1023_8: Iti pasaṃsārahato naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1024_4: Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n0:1024_6: Sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1024_7: Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1024_8: taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1024_9: Ṭhapetvā pana upekkhāsatisampajaññāni nippariyāyena upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:1026_1: Evamadhigate pana tasmiṃpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇatatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n0:1026_3: etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā
anya-e0101n0:1026_4: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikatvā tatiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya catutthādhigamāya yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1026_5: Athassa yadā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato cetasikasomanassasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1026_6: upekkhāvedanā ceva cittekaggatā ca santato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1026_7: tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n0:1026_8: “idāni catutthaṃ jhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
anya-e0101n0:1026_10: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti,
anya-e0101n0:1026_14: yasmā sukhavedanā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1026_18: Ettāvatā cesa sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1026_20: Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1027_1: Tattha sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
anya-e0101n0:1027_4: Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā,
anya-e0101n0:1028_4: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānampi indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva idhāpi vuttānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1029_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n0:1029_1: atha kasmā “kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
anya-e0101n0:1029_6: Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
anya-e0101n0:1029_10: ettha cuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti?
anya-e0101n0:1030_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_2: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_4: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_5: sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1030_7: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1030_11: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_14: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_16: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1030_17: Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
anya-e0101n0:1030_19: Tasmā eva ca etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
anya-e0101n0:1031_0: Etthāha “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
anya-e0101n0:1031_2: Yā hi ayaṃ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:1031_3: sā sukhumā duviññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1031_4: tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati,
anya-e0101n0:1031_5: athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so gaṇhatha na”nti tampi gāhayati,
anya-e0101n0:1031_6: evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari.
anya-e0101n0:1031_7: Evañhi samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1031_8: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1032_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1033_0: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:1033_1: evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1034_0: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānamatidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1034_5: Sukhādighātena cassa sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
anya-e0101n0:1036_7: Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā.
anya-e0101n0:1036_9: Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1037_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati.
anya-e0101n0:1037_1: Yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā
anya-e0101n0:1037_2: divā vijjamānāpi candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā,
anya-e0101n0:1037_3: evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā
anya-e0101n0:1037_5: Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti.
anya-e0101n0:1037_7: Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1037_9: Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā.
anya-e0101n0:1038_4: Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n0:1038_6: Upekkhāvedanā cittassekaggatāti imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1040_1: Pañcakajjhānaṃ pana nibbattentena paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n0:1040_2: vitakkassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā paṭhamajjhāne
anya-e0101n0:1040_4: Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vitakkamattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1040_6: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva dutiyajjhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1041_0: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannavitakkapaccatthikā,
anya-e0101n0:1041_1: vicārassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne
anya-e0101n0:1041_3: Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vicāramattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1041_5: Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1041_6: Tassa vicāramattameva pahānaṅgaṃ catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viya pītiādīni tīṇi samannāgataṅgāni.
anya-e0101n0:1042_1: taṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1049_3: evaṃ āpokasiṇampi bhāvetukāmena sukhanisinnena āpasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1049_4: kate vā akate vāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1049_7: Ito parañhi ettakampi avatvā visesamattameva vakkhāma.
anya-e0101n0:1050_0: Idhāpi pubbekatādhikārassa puññavato akate āpasmiṃ pokkharaṇiyā vā taḷāke vā loṇiyaṃ vā samudde vā nimittaṃ uppajjati cūḷasivattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n0:1050_1: Tassa kirāyasmato lābhasakkāraṃ pahāya vivittavāsaṃ vasissāmīti mahātitthe nāvamārūhitvā jambudīpaṃ gacchato
anya-e0101n0:1050_2: antarā mahāsamuddaṃ olokayato tappaṭibhāgaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n0:1051_0: Akatādhikārena cattāro kasiṇadose pariharantena nīlapītalohitodātavaṇṇānamaññataravaṇṇaṃ āpaṃ agahetvā
anya-e0101n0:1051_1: yaṃ pana bhūmiṃ asampattameva ākāse suddhavatthena gahitaṃ udakaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1051_3: tena pattaṃ vā kuṇḍikaṃ vā samatittikaṃ pūretvā vihārapaccante vuttappakāre paṭicchanne okāse ṭhapetvā sukhanisinnena na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1051_5: Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā ambu, udakaṃ, vāri,
anya-e0101n0:1052_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1052_1: Idha pana uggahanimittaṃ calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1052_5: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana nipparipphandaṃ ākāse ṭhapitamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ viya maṇimayādāsamaṇḍalamiva ca hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1054_2: Tattha katādhikārassa puññavato akate nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa dīpasikhāya vā uddhane vā pattapacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n0:1054_3: vā davadāhe vā yattha katthaci aggijālaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n0:1054_4: Tassa hāyasmato dhammassavanadivase uposathāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa dīpasikhaṃ olokentasseva nimittaṃ uppajji.
anya-e0101n0:1055_2: siniddhāni sāradārūni phāletvā sukkhāpetvā ghaṭikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ katvā patirūpaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1055_3: vā gantvā pattapacanākārena rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā kaṭasārake vā camme vā paṭe vā vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1055_5: Taṃ purato ṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā heṭṭhā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ vā upari dhūmasikhaṃ vā amanasikaritvā vemajjhe ghanajālāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1055_6: nīlanti vā pītanti vātiādivasena vaṇṇo na paccavekkhitabbo,
anya-e0101n0:1055_8: Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā pāvako,
anya-e0101n0:1056_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1056_1: Tattha uggahanimittaṃ jālaṃ chijjitvā chijjitvā patanasadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1056_3: alātakhaṇḍaṃ vā aṅgārapiṇḍo vā chārikā vā dhūmo vā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1056_4: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ niccalaṃ ākāse ṭhapitarattakambalakkhaṇḍaṃ viya suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭaṃ viya kañcanatthambho viya ca upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1058_2: Tañca kho diṭṭhavasena vā phuṭṭhavasena vā.
anya-e0101n0:1058_3: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “vāyokasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto vāyusmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1058_6: rukkhaggaṃ vā kesaggaṃ vā eritaṃ sameritaṃ upalakkheti,
anya-e0101n0:1058_8: Tasmā samasīsaṭṭhitaṃ ghanapattaṃ ucchuṃ vā veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ ghanakesassa purisassa
anya-e0101n0:1058_9: sīsaṃ vā vātena pahariyamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vāto etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatī”ti satiṃ ṭhapetvā,
anya-e0101n0:1058_10: yaṃ vā panassa vātapānantarikāya vā bhittichiddena vā pavisitvā vāto kāyappadesaṃ paharati,
anya-e0101n0:1058_11: tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvā vātamālutaanilādīsu vāyunāmesu pākaṭanāmavaseneva “vāto vāto”ti bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1058_12: Idha uggahanimittavaḍḍhanato otāritamattassa pāyāsassa usumavaṭṭisadisaṃ calaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1060_1: Tadanantaraṃ pana nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā
anya-e0101n0:1060_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa puññavato tāva tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā pūjāṭhānesu pupphasantharaṃ vā
anya-e0101n0:1060_3: nīlavatthamaṇīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1060_4: Itarena nīluppalagirikaṇṇikādīni pupphāni gahetvā yathā kesaraṃ vā vaṇṭaṃ vā na paññāyati,
anya-e0101n0:1060_5: evaṃ caṅgoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pattehiyeva samatittikaṃ pūretvā santharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1060_6: Nīlavaṇṇena vā vatthena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā pūretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1060_8: Kaṃsanīlapalāsanīlaañjananīlānaṃ vā aññatarena dhātunā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena saṃhārimaṃ vā bhittiyaṃyeva
anya-e0101n0:1060_10: Tato pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena “nīlaṃ nīla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1060_13: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalato muñcitvā ākāse maṇitālavaṇṭasadisaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1062_2: Vuttañhetaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pītakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti.
anya-e0101n0:1062_3: Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa puññavato tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā pītavatthadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1062_4: vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa viya.
anya-e0101n0:1062_5: Tassa kirāyasmato cittalapabbate pattaṅgapupphehi kataṃ āsanapūjaṃ passato saha dassaneneva āsanappamāṇaṃ nimittaṃ udapādi.
anya-e0101n0:1062_6: Itarena kaṇikārapupphādinā vā pītavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “pītakaṃ pītaka”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1064_2: Vuttañhetaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto lohitakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti.
anya-e0101n0:1064_3: Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa puññavato tathārūpaṃ bandhujīvakādimālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā lohitakavatthamaṇidhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1064_5: Itarena jayasumanabandhujīvakarattakoraṇḍakādipupphehi vā rattavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0101n0:1066_1: Odātakasiṇepi odātakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto odātasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā
anya-e0101n0:1066_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā vassikasumanādipupphasantharaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1066_3: vā kumudapadumarāsiṃ vā odātavatthadhātūnaṃ vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1066_5: Itarena vuttappakārehi odātapupphehi vā odātavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “odātaṃ odāta”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1068_1: Ālokakasiṇe pana ālokakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ālokasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde vā tāḷacchidde vā vātapānantarikāya
anya-e0101n0:1068_2: vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato yaṃ bhittichiddādīnaṃ aññatarena sūriyāloko vā candāloko
anya-e0101n0:1068_3: vā pavisitvā bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0101n0:1068_4: ghanapaṇṇarukkhasākhantarena vā ghanasākhāmaṇḍapantarena vā nikkhamitvā bhūmiyameva maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e0101n0:1068_6: Itarenāpi tadeva vuttappakāramobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ “obhāso obhāso”ti vā “āloko āloko”ti vā bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1068_7: Tathā asakkontena ghaṭe dīpaṃ jāletvā ghaṭamukhaṃ pidahitvā ghaṭe chiddaṃ katvā bhittimukhaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1068_8: Tena chiddena dīpāloko nikkhamitvā bhittiyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:1068_11: Idha uggahanimittaṃ bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitamaṇḍalasadisameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1070_1: Paricchinnākāsakasiṇepi ākāsakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ākāsasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde vā tāḷacchidde
anya-e0101n0:1070_2: vā vātapānantarikāya vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato bhittichiddādīsu aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1070_4: Itarena succhannamaṇḍape vā cammakaṭasārakādīnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1070_5: katvā tadeva vā bhittichiddādibhedaṃ chiddaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1070_6: Idha uggahanimittaṃ saddhiṃ bhittipariyantādīhi chiddasadisameva hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1079_1: Imesu hi pathavīkasiṇavasena ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādibhāvo,
anya-e0101n0:1079_2: ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1086_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthāya ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1087_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1089_0: Sabbāneva uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇanti imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1090_6: Tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti.
anya-e0101n0:1090_9: Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1090_10: Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti, na aññaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1090_16: Na ayamassa ādi idaṃ majjhanti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0101n0:1091_1: Ye ca te sattā kammāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā
anya-e0101n0:1091_2: asaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:1091_5: Kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatāti niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā ceva ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakā ca.
anya-e0101n0:1091_10: Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu niyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattasaṅkhātañca ariyamaggaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbāti attho.
anya-e0101n0:1091_12: aññesupi kammaṭṭhānesu etesamekassapi bhāvanā na ijjhati.
anya-e0101n0:1091_13: Tasmā vigatavipākāvaraṇenapi kulaputtena kammāvaraṇañca kilesāvaraṇañca ārakā parivajjetvā saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayādīhi
anya-e0101n0:1091_14: saddhañca chandañca paññañca vaḍḍhetvā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge yogo karaṇīyoti.
anya-e0101n0:1098_10: aṭṭhikanti dasasu aviññāṇakāsubhesu bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1099_3: Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n0:1102_0: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāditanti vikkhāyitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1103_3: Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ aññena sīsanti evaṃ tato tato khittassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1104_1: Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1105_0: Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1106_0: Puḷavā vuccanti kimayo, puḷave kiratīti puḷavakaṃ. Kimiparipuṇṇassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1107_3: Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi nimittesu paṭiladdhajjhānānampetāneva nāmāni.
anya-e0101n0:1109_1: Tattha uddhumātakasarīre uddhumātakanimittaṃ uppādetvā uddhumātakasaṅkhātaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena yoginā
anya-e0101n0:1109_2: pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1109_7: Tenāpi sabbaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā pubbe vuttappakāraṃ senāsanaṃ upagantvā uddhumātakanimittaṃ pariyesantena vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1110_1: Evaṃ viharantena ca asukasmiṃ nāma gāmadvāre vā aṭavimukhe vā panthe vā pabbatapāde vā rukkhamūle vā
anya-e0101n0:1110_2: susāne vā uddhumātakasarīraṃ nikkhittanti kathentānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāpi na tāvadeva atitthena pakkhandantena
anya-e0101n0:1110_4: Asubhaṃ hi nāmetaṃ vāḷamigādhiṭṭhitampi amanussādhiṭṭhitampi hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1110_6: Gamanamaggo vā panettha gāmadvārena vā nahānatitthena vā kedārakoṭiyā vā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1110_9: Purisassa hi itthisarīraṃ itthiyā ca purisasarīraṃ visabhāgaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1110_12: Sace pana “nayidaṃ mādisassa bhāriya”nti attānaṃ takkayati,
anya-e0101n0:1111_1: Gacchantena ca saṅghattherassa vā aññatarassa vā abhiññātassa bhikkhuno kathetvā gantabbaṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:1111_2: Sace hissa susāne amanussasīhabyagghādīnaṃ rūpasaddādianiṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassa aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā pavedhenti,
anya-e0101n0:1111_5: Athassa so vihāre pattacīvaraṃ surakkhitaṃ karissati.
anya-e0101n0:1111_6: Dahare vā sāmaṇere vā pahiṇitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭijaggissati.
anya-e0101n0:1111_7: Apica susānaṃ nāma nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānanti maññamānā katakammāpi akatakammāpi corā samosaranti.
anya-e0101n0:1111_8: Te manussehi anubaddhā bhikkhussa samīpe bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvāpi palāyanti.
anya-e0101n0:1111_9: Manussā “sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ addasāmā”ti bhikkhuṃ gahetvā viheṭhenti.
anya-e0101n0:1111_11: mamāyaṃ kathetvā iminā nāma kammena gato”ti te manusse saññāpetvā sotthibhāvaṃ karissati.
anya-e0101n0:1111_13: Tasmā vuttappakārassa bhikkhuno kathetvā asubhanimittadassane sañjātābhilāsena yathānāma khattiyo abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1111_15: adhano vā pana nidhiṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajāto gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1111_16: evaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttena vidhinā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1112_0: “Uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya antogatehi
anya-e0101n0:1112_2: Yasmiṃ padese uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1112_3: tasmiṃ padese pāsāṇaṃ vā vammikaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:1112_5: Sanimittaṃ katvā sārammaṇaṃ katvā uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ sabhāvabhāvato upalakkheti,
anya-e0101n0:1112_6: vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopi sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato samantato.
anya-e0101n0:1112_10: So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā eko adutiyo gacchati
anya-e0101n0:1112_11: upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena mānasena gatāgatamaggaṃ paccavekkhamāno.
anya-e0101n0:1114_0: “So ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati
anya-e0101n0:1114_4: Tassādhigataṃ hoti rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro bhāvanāmayañca puññakiriyavatthu”nti.
anya-e0101n0:1115_2: so ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā gaṇaṃ sannipātetvāpi gacchatu.
anya-e0101n0:1115_3: Kammaṭṭhānasīsena pana gacchantena ekakena adutiyena mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvā taṃ manasikaronteneva
anya-e0101n0:1115_4: susāne soṇādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā yaṭṭhiṃ vā gahetvā,
anya-e0101n0:1115_6: manacchaṭṭhānañca indriyānaṃ antogatabhāvasampādanato abahigatamanena hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1116_0: Vihārato nikkhamanteneva asukadisāya asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1116_14: Paṭivātaṃ gacchantassa hi kuṇapagandho ghānaṃ paharitvā matthaluṅgaṃ vā saṅkhobheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1116_16: vippaṭisāraṃ vā janeyya “īdisaṃ nāma kuṇapaṭṭhānaṃ āgatomhī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1116_18: Sace anuvātamaggena na sakkā hoti gantuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1116_19: antarā pabbato vā papāto vā pāsāṇo vā vati vā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ vā udakaṃ vā cikkhallaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1117_1: Evaṃ gatena pana na tāva asubhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1117_3: Ekasmiṃ hi disābhāge ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca na vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati,
anya-e0101n0:1117_5: Tasmā taṃ vajjetvā yattha ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati,
anya-e0101n0:1117_9: Paṭivāte ṭhitassa hi kuṇapagandhena ubbāḷhassa cittaṃ vidhāvati.
anya-e0101n0:1117_10: Anuvāte ṭhitassa sace tattha adhivatthā amanussā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1117_13: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānenāpi nātidūre nāccāsanne nānupādaṃ nānusīsaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1117_14: Atidūre ṭhitassa hi ārammaṇaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1117_16: Anupādaṃ vā anusīsaṃ vā ṭhitassa sabbaṃ asubhaṃ samaṃ na paññāyati.
anya-e0101n0:1117_17: Tasmā nātidūre nāccāsanne olokentassa phāsukaṭṭhāne sarīravemajjhabhāge ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1118_2: lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karotī”ti evaṃ vuttāni samantā nimittāni upalakkhetabbāni.
anya-e0101n0:1118_4: sace tassa nimittassa samantā cakkhupathe pāsāṇo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1118_5: so “ayaṃ pāsāṇo ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1118_6: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ pāsāṇo idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1118_9: sopi “ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1118_10: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ vammiko idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1118_12: sopi “assattho vā nigrodho vā kacchako vā kapītano vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1118_13: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ rukkho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1118_15: sopi “sindivā karamando vā kaṇavīro vā kuraṇḍako vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1118_16: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ gaccho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1118_18: sāpi “lābu vā kumbhaṇḍī vā sāmā vā kāḷavalli vā pūtilatā vā”ti vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1118_19: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ latā idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1119_1: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ sanimittaṃ karoti sārammaṇaṃ karotīti,
anya-e0101n0:1119_3: Punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:1119_5: idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ pāsāṇoti evaṃ dve dve samāsetvā samāsetvā vavatthapento sārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:1120_0: Evaṃ sanimittaṃ sārammaṇañca katvā pana sabhāvabhāvato vavatthapetīti vuttattā yvāssa sabhāvabhāvo anaññasādhāraṇo attaniyo uddhumātakabhāvo,
anya-e0101n0:1120_2: Vaṇitaṃ uddhumātakanti evaṃ sabhāvena sarasena vavatthapetabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n0:1121_1: Evaṃ vavatthapetvā vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopīti chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:1121_2: Tena hi yoginā idaṃ sarīraṃ kāḷassa vā odātassa vā maṅguracchavino vāti vaṇṇato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_3: Liṅgato pana itthiliṅgaṃ vā purisaliṅgaṃ vāti avavatthapetvā paṭhamavaye vā majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā ṭhitassa idaṃ sarīranti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_13: Disato pana imasmiṃ sarīre dve disā nābhiyā adho heṭṭhimadisā uddhaṃ uparimadisāti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_14: Atha vā ahaṃ imissā disāya ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imissāti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_15: Okāsato pana imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthā,
anya-e0101n0:1121_19: Atha vā ahaṃ imasmiṃ okāse ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imasminti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_20: Paricchedato idaṃ sarīraṃ adho pādatalena upari kesamatthakena tiriyaṃ tacena paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1121_28: Purisassa pana itthisarīraṃ itthiyā vā purisasarīraṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:1121_31: “Ugghāṭitāpi hi itthī purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1121_32: Tasmā sabhāgasarīreyeva evaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1122_1: Yo pana purimabuddhānaṃ santike āsevitakammaṭṭhāno parihatadhutaṅgo parimadditamahābhūto pariggahitasaṅkhāro
anya-e0101n0:1122_2: vavatthāpitanāmarūpo ugghāṭitasattasañño katasamaṇadhammo vāsitavāsano bhāvitabhāvano sabījo ñāṇuttaro
anya-e0101n0:1122_8: tena sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato samantatoti punapi pañcavidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1123_8: eko kaṭisandhīti evaṃ cuddasamahāsandhivasena sandhito vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1123_9: Vivaratoti vivaraṃ nāma hatthantaraṃ pādantaraṃ udarantaraṃ kaṇṇantaranti evaṃ vivarato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1123_10: Akkhīnampi nimmīlitabhāvo vā ummīlitabhāvo vā mukhassa ca pihitabhāvo vā vivaṭabhāvo vā vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1123_11: Ninnatoti yaṃ sarīre ninnaṭṭhānaṃ akkhikūpo vā antomukhaṃ vā galavāṭako vā,
anya-e0101n0:1123_13: Atha vā ahaṃ ninne ṭhito sarīraṃ unnateti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1123_14: Thalatoti yaṃ sarīre unnataṭṭhānaṃ jaṇṇukaṃ vā uro vā nalāṭaṃ vā,
anya-e0101n0:1123_16: Atha vā ahaṃ thale ṭhito sarīraṃ ninneti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1123_18: Sakalasarīre ñāṇaṃ cāretvā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1124_0: 113. Idāni “so taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotī”tiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayakathā –
anya-e0101n0:1125_0: Tena yoginā tasmiṃ sarīre yathāvuttanimittaggāhavasena suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1125_2: Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontena sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva vavatthapetabbañca.
anya-e0101n0:1125_3: Sarīrato nātidūre nāccāsanne padese ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā oloketvā nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1125_6: Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontassa uggahanimittaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1125_8: Yadā ummīletvā olokentassa nimmīletvā āvajjentassa ca ekasadisaṃ hutvā āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1126_0: So taṃ nimittaṃ evaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā sace tattheva bhāvanāpariyosānaṃ pattuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n0:1126_1: athānena āgamanakāle vuttanayeneva ekakena adutiyena tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontena sūpaṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1126_2: satiṃ katvā antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena mānasena attano senāsanameva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1127_11: imasmiṃ latāti evaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ vavatthapetvā āgatena caṅkamantenāpi tabbhāgiyova caṅkamo adhiṭṭhātabbo,
anya-e0101n0:1127_14: Sace pana tassaṃ disāyaṃ sobbho vā papāto vā rukkho vā vati vā kalalaṃ vā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1127_17: Taṃ disaṃ anapalokentenāpi okāsānurūpe ṭhāne caṅkamitabbañceva nisīditabbañca.
anya-e0101n0:1128_2: Yassa hi avelāyaṃ uddhumātakanimittaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samantā nimittupalakkhaṇaṃ katvā nimittaggahaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1128_3: cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokentasseva taṃ matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā ṭhitaṃ viya ajjhottharamānaṃ viya anubandhamānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1128_5: so taṃ bībhacchaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ disvā vikkhittacitto ummattako viya hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1128_7: Pāḷiyaṃ hi vibhattaaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu aññaṃ evarūpaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1128_8: Imasmiṃ hi kammaṭṭhāne jhānavibbhantako nāma hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:1128_10: Tasmā tena yoginā santhambhetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1128_11: Sace hi so “etassa samīpe ṭhito pāsāṇo vā latā vā āgaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1128_13: Yathā pana so pāsāṇo vā latā vā nāgacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1128_15: Ayaṃ pana tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhānākāro saññajo saññāsambhavo,
anya-e0101n0:1128_17: mā bhāyi bhikkhū”ti tāsaṃ vinodetvā hāsaṃ uppādetvā tasmiṃ nimitte cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1129_0: Ekādasavidhena pana nimittaggāhaṃ sampādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhati.
anya-e0101n0:1129_1: Tassa hi cakkhūni ummīletvā olokanapaccayā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1129_4: Appanāyaṃ ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattaṃ sacchikaroti.
anya-e0101n0:1130_1: Gatāgatamaggapaccavekkhaṇā vīthisampaṭipādanatthāti ettha pana yā gatamaggassa ca āgatamaggassa ca paccavekkhaṇā vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:1130_3: Sace hi imaṃ bhikkhuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgacchantaṃ antarāmagge keci ajja, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:1130_7: ahaṃ kammaṭṭhānikoti tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:1130_18: Āgantukaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ disvā āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbova.
anya-e0101n0:1130_21: Tassa tāni pūrentassāpi taṃ taruṇanimittaṃ nassati,
anya-e0101n0:1130_22: puna gantvā nimittaṃ gaṇhissāmīti gantukāmassāpi amanussehi vā vāḷamigehi vā adhiṭṭhitattā susānampi gantuṃ na sakkā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1130_24: Uddhumātakaṃ hi ekameva vā dve vā divase ṭhatvā vinīlakādibhāvaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1130_25: Sabbakammaṭṭhānesu etena samaṃ dullabhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1130_26: Tasmā evaṃ naṭṭhe nimitte tena bhikkhunā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭhāne vā nisīditvā ahaṃ iminā nāma dvārena
anya-e0101n0:1130_27: vihārā nikkhamitvā asukadisābhimukhaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne vāmaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e0101n0:1130_31: Sohaṃ tena maggena gantvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne asubhaṃ addasaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1130_32: Tattha asukadisābhimukho ṭhatvā evañcevañca samantā nimittāni sallakkhetvā evaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggahetvā
anya-e0101n0:1130_33: asukadisāya susānato nikkhamitvā evarūpena nāma maggena idañcidañca karonto āgantvā idha nisinnoti evaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1130_36: Tassevaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ nimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1131_1: Idāni ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1131_2: upanibandhatīti ettha uddhumātakapaṭikkūle mānasaṃ cāretvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1131_3: vaḍḍhento “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinā bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1132_0: Yathā pana duggato puriso mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ labhitvā dullabhaṃ vata me laddhanti tasmiṃ ratanasaññī
anya-e0101n0:1132_1: hutvā gāravaṃ janetvā vipulena pemena sampiyāyamāno taṃ rakkheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1132_2: evameva “dullabhaṃ me idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ duggatassa mahagghamaṇiratanasadisaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1132_3: Catudhātukammaṭṭhāniko hi attano cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1132_7: ‘Idaṃ pana ekameva vā dve vā divase tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1132_8: tato paraṃ vinīlakādibhāvaṃ pāpuṇātī’ti natthi ito dullabhatara”nti tasmiṃ ratanasaññinā hutvā cittīkāraṃ
anya-e0101n0:1132_10: Rattiṭṭhāne ca divāṭhāne ca “uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ uddhumātakapaṭikkūla”nti tattha punappunaṃ cittaṃ upanibandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1133_3: uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1133_4: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā nipanno thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya.
anya-e0101n0:1133_5: Tassa paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva bahiddhā kāmānaṃ amanasikārā vikkhambhanavasena kāmacchando pahīyati.
anya-e0101n0:1133_6: Anunayappahāneneva cassa lohitappahānena pubbo viya byāpādopi pahīyati.
anya-e0101n0:1133_9: adhigatavisesassa paccakkhatāya paṭipattidesake satthari paṭipattiyaṃ paṭipattiphale ca vicikicchā pahīyatīti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti.
anya-e0101n0:1133_10: Tasmiññeva ca nimitte cetaso abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko,
anya-e0101n0:1133_15: sukhitassa cittasamādhisambhavato sukhanimittā ekaggatā cāti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavanti.
anya-e0101n0:1133_17: Ito paraṃ yāva paṭhamajjhānassa appanā ceva vasippatti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1135_1: Ito paresu pana vinīlakādīsupi yaṃ taṃ “uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n0:1135_2: satiyā”tiādinā nayena gamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1135_4: vipubbakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto”ti evaṃ tassa tassa vasena tattha tattha uddhumātakapadamattaṃ parivattetvā
anya-e0101n0:1138_0: Vicchiddakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍale vā corāṭaviyaṃ vā susāne vā yattha rājāno core chindāpenti.
anya-e0101n0:1138_1: Araññe vā pana sīhabyagghehi chinnapurisaṭṭhāne labbhati.
anya-e0101n0:1138_2: Tasmā tathārūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā sace nānādisāyaṃ patitampi ekāvajjanena āpāthamāgacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1138_6: Tasmā ārāmikena vā samaṇuddesena vā aññena vā kenaci ekaṭṭhāne kāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1138_7: Alabhantena kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā ekaṅgulantaraṃ katvā upanāmetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1138_9: Tattha uggahanimittaṃ majjhe chiddaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1139_1: Uggahanimittaṃ panettha tahiṃ tahiṃ khāyitasadisameva upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1140_0: Vikkhittakampi vicchiddake vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “vikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1141_1: Tasmā tattha gantvā vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūla”nti
anya-e0101n0:1141_3: Uggahanimittaṃ panettha paññāyamānaṃ pahāramukhaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1142_0: Lohitakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍalādīsu laddhappahārānaṃ hatthapādādīsu vā chinnesu bhinnagaṇḍapīḷakādīnaṃ vā mukhato paggharamānakāle labbhati.
anya-e0101n0:1142_1: Tasmā taṃ disvā “lohitakapaṭikkūlaṃ lohitakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1142_2: Ettha uggahanimittaṃ vātappahatā viya rattapaṭākā calamānākāraṃ upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1143_0: Puḷavakaṃ dvīhatīhaccayena kuṇapassa navahi vaṇamukhehi kimirāsipaggharaṇakāle hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1143_1: Apica taṃ soṇasiṅgālamanussagomahiṃsahatthiassaajagarādīnaṃ sarīrappamāṇameva hutvā sālibhattarāsi viya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1143_2: Tesu yattha katthaci “puḷavakapaṭikkūlaṃ puḷavakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1143_3: Cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa hi kāḷadīghavāpiyā anto hatthikuṇape nimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:1143_5: Paṭibhāganimittaṃ sālibhattapiṇḍo viya sannisinnaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1144_0: Aṭṭhikaṃ “seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhisaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsalohitaṃ nahārusambandha”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1144_2: tattha purimanayeneva gantvā samantā pāsāṇādīnaṃ vasena sanimittaṃ sārammaṇaṃ katvā idaṃ aṭṭhikanti sabhāvabhāvato
anya-e0101n0:1145_1: Taṃ pana vaṇṇato setanti olokentassa na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1145_8: Tassa tassa aṭṭhino pariyantavasena paricchedato vavatthapetvā yadevettha pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1145_10: Tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasena pana ninnato ca thalato ca vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1145_15: Dvinnaṃ pana aṭṭhikānaṃ ghaṭitaghaṭitaṭṭhānavasena sandhito vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1145_17: Sabbattheva pana ñāṇaṃ cāretvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne idamaṭṭhīti samantato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1145_18: Evampi nimitte anupaṭṭhahante nalāṭaṭṭhimhi cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1146_2: evaṃ idaṃ ekādasavidhena nimittaggahaṇaṃ ito purimesu puḷavakādīsupi yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1146_3: Idañca pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ sakalāyapi aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāya ekasmimpi aṭṭhike sampajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1146_4: Tasmā tesu yatthakatthaci ekādasavidhena nimittaṃ uggahetvā “aṭṭhikapaṭikkūlaṃ aṭṭhikapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1146_5: Idha uggahanimittampi paṭibhāganimittampi ekasadisameva hotīti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1146_9: Ekaṭṭhikepi ca uggahanimittena bībhacchena bhayānakena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1147_0: Imasmiṃ hi okāse yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1147_2: Tathā hi tattha “catūsu brahmavihāresu dasasu ca asubhesu paṭibhāganimittaṃ natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1147_4: Dasasu ca asubhesu nibbikappaṃ katvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī”ti vatvāpi puna anantarameva
anya-e0101n0:1147_6: Uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1148_0: Apica mahātissattherassa dantaṭṭhikamattāvalokanena sakalitthisarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni cettha nidassanānīti.
anya-e0101n0:1151_0: Evaṃ tāni ca tesañca, bhāvanānayamimaṃ viditvāna;
anya-e0101n0:1154_1: Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya nilloluppacāro hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1154_3: so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1154_4: Chavasarīraṃ hi paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā,
anya-e0101n0:1154_6: Iti yādisaṃ yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1154_7: tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikkūlanti evaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena
anya-e0101n0:1155_0: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato saṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1155_2: Vipubbakaṃ kāyavaṇapaṭibaddhassa duggandhabhāvassa pakāsanato mālāgandhādivasena samuṭṭhāpitasarīragandharāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1155_4: Vikkhāyitakaṃ maṃsupacayasampattivināsappakāsanato thanādīsu sarīrappadesesu maṃsupacayarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1155_8: Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1155_9: Aṭṭhikaṃ sarīraṭṭhīnaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvappakāsanato dantasampattirāgino sappāyanti evaṃ rāgacaritabhedavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1156_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1156_2: evameva dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1157_0: Paṭikkūlepi ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti evamānisaṃsadassāvitāya
anya-e0101n0:1157_2: “bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī”ti ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi viya,
anya-e0101n0:1158_1: Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1158_3: Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīre,
anya-e0101n0:1158_5: hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ olokentassa saṅgharakkhitattherūpaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca jīvamānakasarīrepi upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1158_8: Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā na paññāyati.
anya-e0101n0:1158_9: Pakatiyā pana idaṃ sarīraṃ nāma atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussayaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ navanhārusatanibandhanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1158_10: navamaṃsapesisatānulittaṃ allacammapariyonaddhaṃ chaviyā paṭicchannaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ medakathālikā viya
anya-e0101n0:1158_11: niccuggharitapaggharitaṃ kimisaṅghanisevitaṃ rogānaṃ āyatanaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ vatthu paribhinnapurāṇagaṇḍo
anya-e0101n0:1158_21: hutvā gāmena gāmaṃ vicaranto rājāpi pupphachaḍḍakacaṇḍālādīsu aññataropi samasarīrapaṭikkūlatāya nibbiseso hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1158_22: evaṃ asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlatāya rañño vā caṇḍālassa vā sarīre vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1158_23: Dantakaṭṭhamukhadhovanādīhi panettha dantamalādīni pamajjitvā nānāvatthehi hirikopīnaṃ paṭicchādetvā
anya-e0101n0:1158_24: nānāvaṇṇena surabhivilepanena vilimpitvā pupphābharaṇādīhi alaṅkaritvā “ahaṃ mama”nti gahetabbākārappattaṃ karonti.
anya-e0101n0:1158_25: Tato iminā āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā tadassa yāthāvasarasaṃ asubhalakkhaṇaṃ asañjānantā purisā itthīsu,
anya-e0101n0:1158_27: Paramatthato panettha rajjitabbakayuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṇumattampi natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1158_28: Tathā hi kesalomanakhadantakheḷasiṅghāṇikauccārapassāvādīsu ekakoṭṭhāsampi sarīrato bahi patitaṃ sattā hatthena chupitumpi na icchanti,
anya-e0101n0:1158_31: taṃ taṃ evaṃ paṭikkūlampi samānaṃ avijjandhakārapariyonaddhā attasineharāgarattā “iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti gaṇhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1158_32: Te evaṃ gaṇhantā aṭaviyaṃ kiṃsukarukkhaṃ disvā rukkhato apatitapupphaṃ “ayaṃ maṃsapesī”ti vihaññamānena jarasiṅgālena samānataṃ āpajjanti. Tasmā –
anya-e0101n0:1159_0: Yathāpi pupphitaṃ disvā, siṅgālo kiṃsukaṃ vane;
anya-e0101n0:1160_0: Maṃsarukkho mayā laddho, iti gantvāna vegasā.
anya-e0101n0:1162_0: Nayidaṃ maṃsaṃ aduṃ maṃsaṃ, yaṃ rukkhasminti gaṇhati.
anya-e0101n0:1165_0: Imañhi subhato kāyaṃ, gahetvā tattha mucchitā;
anya-e0101n0:1166_0: Bālā karontā pāpāni, dukkhā na parimuccare.
anya-e0101n0:1167_0: Tasmā passeyya medhāvī, jīvato vā matassa vā;
anya-e0101n0:1174_0: Sace imassa kāyassa, anto bāhirako siyā;
anya-e0101n0:1175_0: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe nivārayeti.
anya-e0101n0:1176_0: Tasmā dabbajātikena bhikkhunā jīvamānasarīraṃ vā hotu
anya-e0101n0:1177_0: Matasarīraṃ vā yattha yattha asubhākāro paññāyati,

anya-e0101n0:1194_28: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa,

anya-e0101n0:1200_7: Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṃ,

anya-e0101n0:1220_1: Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno.
anya-e0101n0:1220_2: Tattha vijjāti tissopi vijjā aṭṭhapi vijjā.
anya-e0101n0:1220_5: Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā vuttā.
anya-e0101n0:1220_11: cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1220_12: Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1220_14: ariyasāvako sīlavā hotī”ti sabbaṃ majjhimapaṇṇāsake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1220_15: Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca caraṇena samannāgato.
anya-e0101n0:1221_0: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n0:1221_2: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojeti.
anya-e0101n0:1221_5: no duppaṭipannā vijjācaraṇavipannānaṃ sāvakā attantapādayo viya.
anya-e0101n0:1222_9: Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā sugato.
anya-e0101n0:1222_10: Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbānanti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattāpi sugato.
anya-e0101n0:1222_11: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto.

anya-e0101n0:1222_16: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”ti,

anya-e0101n0:1222_21: Tatridaṃ sādhakasuttaṃ “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ,

anya-e0101n0:1222_30: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ,

anya-e0101n0:1223_2: So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:1223_4: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1223_5: nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi, na cāhaṃ, āvuso,

anya-e0101n0:1223_8: imasmiññeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1225_0: Na ca apatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1230_1: Apica tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti.
anya-e0101n0:1230_2: Tattha eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1230_3: Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko.
anya-e0101n0:1231_0: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharanti, disā bhanti virocamānā;
anya-e0101n0:1232_0: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vasoti. –
anya-e0101n0:1233_2: Tathā hissa “eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā.
anya-e0101n0:1233_13: Aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito.

anya-e0101n0:1265_0: Kadambo kapparukkho ca, sirīsena bhavati sattamanti.
anya-e0101n0:1269_8: Taṃ sabbampi ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekā lokadhātu.
anya-e0101n0:1270_0: Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
anya-e0101n0:1271_1: Attanā pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.

anya-e0101n0:1272_3: Tattha purisadammāti adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi.

anya-e0101n0:1273_0: Apica bhagavā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttari maggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
anya-e0101n0:1274_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1274_2: yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti.
anya-e0101n0:1274_6: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1275_4: Yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti corakantāraṃ tāreti vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti
anya-e0101n0:1275_5: nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti uttāreti nittāreti patāreti khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpeti,
anya-e0101n0:1275_6: evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti,
anya-e0101n0:1275_12: Tepi hi bhagavato dhammassavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti.
anya-e0101n0:1276_0: Bhagavati kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desiyamāne eko maṇḍūko bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi,
anya-e0101n0:1276_1: taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍaṃ olubbha tiṭṭhanto sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:1276_2: So tāvadeva kālaṅkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.

anya-e0101n0:1276_5: So tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi.

anya-e0101n0:1300_0: Bhāgyavatāya cassa satapuññalakkhaṇadharassa rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1301_0: Yasmā ca loke issariyadhammayasasirikāmapayattesu chasu dhammesu bhagasaddo pavattati,
anya-e0101n0:1301_6: Yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā,
anya-e0101n0:1301_7: tassa tassa tatheva abhinipphannattā icchitatthanibbattisaññito kāmo.
anya-e0101n0:1301_9: Tasmā imehi bhagehi yuttattāpi bhagā assa santīti iminā atthena bhagavāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1303_0: Yasmā ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihāre kāyacittaupadhiviveke suññatappaṇihitānimittavimokkhe aññe ca lokiyalokuttare
anya-e0101n0:1304_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanaṃ anena vantaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1304_1: tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ gamanasaddato gakāraṃ vantasaddato vakārañca
anya-e0101n0:1304_2: dīghaṃ katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati yathā loke mehanassa khassa mālāti vattabbe mekhalāti.
anya-e0101n0:1305_1: Tassevaṃ iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena so bhagavā arahaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1305_2: iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena bhagavāti buddhaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1305_5: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgatamārabbha.
anya-e0101n0:1305_6: Iccassa evaṃ rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa kammaṭṭhānābhimukhatāya ujugatacittassa buddhaguṇapoṇā vitakkavicārā pavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1305_10: Sukhino buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā cittaṃ samādhiyatīti anukkamena ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1305_11: Buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1305_12: Tadetaṃ buddhaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā buddhānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1306_0: Imañca pana buddhānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso,
anya-e0101n0:1306_5: Buddhaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1306_7: Vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viya hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1311_1: Dhammānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpi rahogatena paṭisallīnena “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko
anya-e0101n0:1311_2: ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti evaṃ pariyattidhammassa ceva navavidhassa ca lokuttaradhammassa
anya-e0101n0:1312_1: Svākkhātoti imasmiṃ hi pade pariyattidhammopi saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1312_3: Tattha pariyattidhammo tāva svākkhāto ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇattā sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanattā ca.
anya-e0101n0:1312_15: veneyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1313_0: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n0:1313_9: Taṃ sutvā tathatthāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n0:1314_0: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n0:1314_1: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇaṃ āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n0:1314_2: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇaṃ āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇoti
anya-e0101n0:1315_0: Yaṃ panesa bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti nānānayehi dīpeti,
anya-e0101n0:1316_3: nirupakkilesato nittaraṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhanti evaṃ sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanato
anya-e0101n0:1317_1: Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1317_5: na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1317_7: ime dhammā niyyānikāti evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti.
anya-e0101n0:1318_0: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:1318_1: “supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca.
anya-e0101n0:1318_2: Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti,
anya-e0101n0:1318_3: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1318_4: Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadābhūtova “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti akkhātattā svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n0:1318_6: Nibbānaṃ sassatāmatatāṇaleṇādisabhāvameva sassatādisabhāvavasena akkhātattā svākkhātanti evaṃ lokuttaradhammopi svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n0:1319_1: Sandiṭṭhikoti ettha pana ariyamaggo tāva attano santāne rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n0:1319_13: Apica navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1319_14: tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n0:1319_21: evaṃ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n0:1320_4: Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0101n0:1321_1: Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo.
anya-e0101n0:1321_3: Na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti,
anya-e0101n0:1321_4: attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1321_5: Atha vā attano phaladāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko. Ko so?
anya-e0101n0:1321_7: Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphalattā na kālikoti akāliko.
anya-e0101n0:1322_1: “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n0:1322_4: Rittamuṭṭhiyaṃ hi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:1322_6: Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1322_7: Apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:1322_9: Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvatova vijjamāno vigatavalāhake ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1322_10: viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya ca parisuddho.
anya-e0101n0:1322_11: Tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n0:1323_4: ādittaṃ celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ arahatīti opanayiko.
anya-e0101n0:1323_7: Asaṅkhate pana attano cittena upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
anya-e0101n0:1324_0: Atha vā nibbānaṃ upanetīti ariyamaggo upaneyyo.
anya-e0101n0:1325_1: Paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti sabbehipi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi attani attani veditabbo “bhāvito me maggo,
anya-e0101n0:1325_4: Na hi upajjhāyena bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n0:1325_7: Tasmā na esa parassa sīse ābharaṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0101n0:1327_1: Tassevaṃ svākkhātatādibhede dhammaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1327_4: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti dhammaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1327_5: Dhammaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1327_6: Tadetaṃ dhammaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā dhammānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1328_0: Imañca pana dhammānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu evaṃ opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetāraṃ imināpaṅgena samannāgataṃ satthāraṃ neva atītaṃse samanupassāmi,
anya-e0101n0:1328_1: na panetarahi aññatra tena bhagavatāti evaṃ dhammaguṇadassaneneva satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso.
anya-e0101n0:1328_7: dhammaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1328_9: vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa dhammasudhammataṃ samanussarato hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1333_1: Saṅghānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpi rahogatena paṭisallīnena “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho,
anya-e0101n0:1333_10: anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti evaṃ ariyasaṅghaguṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1334_2: sammāpaṭipadaṃ anivattipaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1334_6: Yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā uju avaṅkā akuṭilā ajimhā,
anya-e0101n0:1334_9: Tasmā tampaṭipanno ariyasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno ñāyappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipannotipi vutto.
anya-e0101n0:1335_3: te sammāpaṭipadāya adhigantabbassa adhigatattā atītaṃ paṭipadaṃ sandhāya suppaṭipannāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1336_0: Apica svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattāpi apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāpi suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n0:1337_0: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayamanupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n0:1338_0: Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṃ. Tadatthāya paṭipannattā ñāyappaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n0:1339_0: Yathā paṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannārahā honti, tathā paṭipannattā sāmīcippaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n0:1340_2: Cattāri purisayugānīti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugaḷāni honti.
anya-e0101n0:1340_3: Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti.
anya-e0101n0:1340_4: Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni.
anya-e0101n0:1340_6: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni,
anya-e0101n0:1340_12: Taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto tassa mahapphalakaraṇatoti āhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n0:1340_13: Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo.
anya-e0101n0:1340_15: Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo nāma aggi,
anya-e0101n0:1341_0: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
anya-e0101n0:1343_0: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
anya-e0101n0:1344_0: Tadetaṃ nikāyantare āhavanīyoti padaṃ idha āhuneyyoti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1345_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānamatthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1345_1: Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1345_6: Evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti pāhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n0:1345_9: tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ ānetvā ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo.
anya-e0101n0:1346_0: Dakkhiṇāti pana paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1346_2: dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṃ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0101n0:1347_0: Ubho hatthe sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kayiramānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
anya-e0101n0:1348_0: Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1348_1: Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño sālikkhettaṃ rañño yavakkhettanti vuccati,
anya-e0101n0:1348_3: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni virūhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1349_1: Evaṃ suppaṭipannatādibhede saṅghaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1349_4: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti saṅghaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1349_5: Saṅghaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1349_6: Tadetaṃ saṅghaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā saṅghānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1350_0: Imañca pana saṅghānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu saṅghe sagāravo hoti sappatisso.
anya-e0101n0:1350_6: Saṅghaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīraṃ sannipatitasaṅghamiva uposathāgāraṃ pūjārahaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1350_8: vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā saṅghaṃ passato viya hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1355_1: Sīlānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena pana rahogatena paṭisallīnena “aho vata me sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni
anya-e0101n0:1355_2: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti evaṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena
anya-e0101n0:1356_1: yesaṃ ādimhi vā ante vā ekampi na bhinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1356_2: tāni pariyante chinnasāṭako viya na khaṇḍānīti akhaṇḍāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_4: tāni majjhe vinividdhasāṭako viya na chiddānīti acchiddāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_5: Yesaṃ paṭipāṭiyā dve vā tīṇi vā na bhinnāni,
anya-e0101n0:1356_6: tāni piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena dīghavaṭṭādisaṇṭhānena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya na sabalānīti asabalāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_8: tāni visabhāgabinduvicitrā gāvī viya na kammāsānīti akammāsāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_9: Avisesena vā sabbānipi sattavidhena methunasaṃyogena kodhupanāhādīhi ca pāpadhammehi anupahatattā akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_12: Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhatāya kenaci vā ayaṃ te sīlesu dosoti evaṃ parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya aparāmaṭṭhāni.
anya-e0101n0:1356_14: atha vā pana maggasamādhiṃ phalasamādhiñcāpi saṃvattentīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
anya-e0101n0:1357_1: Evaṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlāni anussarato nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1357_5: sīlaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1357_6: Sīlaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1357_7: Tadetaṃ sīlaguṇānussaraṇavasena uppannattā sīlānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1358_0: Imañca pana sīlānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu sikkhāya sagāravo hoti sabhāgavutti,
anya-e0101n0:1363_1: Cāgānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena pana pakatiyā cāgādhimuttena niccappavattadānasaṃvibhāgena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1363_2: Atha vā pana bhāvanaṃ ārabhantena ito dāni pabhuti sati paṭiggāhake antamaso ekālopamattampi dānaṃ adatvā
anya-e0101n0:1363_3: na bhuñjissāmīti samādānaṃ katvā taṃdivasaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhesu paṭiggāhakesu yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1363_4: datvā tattha nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā rahogatena paṭisallīnena “lābhā vata me suladdhaṃ vata me,
anya-e0101n0:1363_5: yohaṃ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā viharāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato
anya-e0101n0:1363_6: yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato”ti evaṃ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1364_0: Tattha lābhā vata meti mayhaṃ vata lābhā,
anya-e0101n0:1364_1: ye ime “āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā” iti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1364_2: “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū” iti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1364_4: sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkamaṃ” iti ca evamādīhi nayehi bhagavatā dāyakassa lābhā saṃvaṇṇitā,

anya-e0101n0:1396_1: Idāni ito anantarāya maraṇassatiyā bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto.

anya-e0101n0:1398_2: Yaṃ gatikālāhārādisampattiyā abhāvena ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ viya vassasatamattaparimāṇassa āyuno khayavasena maraṇaṃ hoti,

anya-e0101n0:1398_5: purimakammavasena vā satthaharaṇādīhi upakkamehi upacchijjamānasantānānaṃ maraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1399_4: Ayoniso pavattayato hi iṭṭhajanamaraṇānussaraṇe soko uppajjati vijātamātuyā piyaputtamaraṇānussaraṇe viya.
anya-e0101n0:1399_5: Aniṭṭhajanamaraṇānussaraṇe pāmojjaṃ uppajjati verīnaṃ verimaraṇānussaraṇe viya.
anya-e0101n0:1399_6: Majjhattajanamaraṇānussaraṇe saṃvego na uppajjati matakaḷevaradassane chavaḍāhakassa viya.
anya-e0101n0:1399_7: Attano maraṇānussaraṇe santāso uppajjati ukkhittāsikaṃ vadhakaṃ disvā bhīrukajātikassa viya.
anya-e0101n0:1399_9: Tasmā tattha tattha hatamatasatte oloketvā diṭṭhapubbasampattīnaṃ sattānaṃ matānaṃ maraṇaṃ āvajjetvā

anya-e0101n0:1399_13: Evaṃ pavattayatoyeva hi ekaccassa nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti,

anya-e0101n0:1401_7: Tathā hi nesaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppādānantarameva jaraṃ patvā pabbatasikharato patitasilā viya bhijjati saddhiṃ sampayuttakhandhehi.

anya-e0101n0:1401_10: Tasmā esa satto jātakālato paṭṭhāya yathā nāma uṭṭhito sūriyo atthābhimukho gacchateva,

anya-e0101n0:1410_0: Khuddakañca mahantañca, yaṃ pakkaṃ yañca āmakaṃ;
anya-e0101n0:1413_0: Evamāyu manussānaṃ, mā maṃ amma nivārayā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n0:1414_0: Evaṃ ukkhittāsiko vadhako viya saha jātiyā āgataṃ panetaṃ maraṇaṃ gīvāya asiṃ cārayamāno so vadhako viya jīvitaṃ haratiyeva,
