anya-e0101n0:1490_8: evaṃ anāpajjitvā abhayo asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n0:1495_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññatra buddhuppādā appavattapubbaṃ sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ tesu tesu suttantesu “ekadhammo,
anya-e0101n0:1495_28: yesaṃ kāyagatāsati āraddhāti evaṃ bhagavatā anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsitvā “kathaṃ bhāvitā,
anya-e0101n0:1495_30: kāyagatāsati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā? Idha,
anya-e0101n0:1495_37: navasivathikapabbānīti imesaṃ cuddasannaṃ pabbānaṃ vasena kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1496_0: Tattha yasmā iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ dhātumanasikārapabbanti imāni tīṇi vipassanāvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0101n0:1496_4: Ānāpānapabbaṃ pana paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbañca imānevettha dve samādhivasena vuttāni.
anya-e0101n0:1496_8: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1496_10: mutta”nti evaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā paṭikkūlamanasikāravasena desitaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1497_6: Pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhatīti nānappakārakesādiasucibharito ayaṃ kāyoti passati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:1498_1: Imasminti yvāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyanto pūro nānappakārassa asucinoti vuccati, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1498_3: Sarīraṃ hi asucisañcayato kucchitānaṃ kesādīnañceva cakkhurogādīnañca rogasatānaṃ āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1498_6: atthi imasmiṃ kāye lomāti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1499_2: tacato paṭṭhāya paritoti ettake byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ
anya-e0101n0:1499_3: vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappūraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati,
anya-e0101n0:1499_4: atha kho paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ asirikadassanaṃ nānappakāraṃ kesalomādibhedaṃ asuciṃyeva passati.
anya-e0101n0:1499_5: Tena vuttaṃ “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1500_1: Imaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1500_2: Tenāpissa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ dasadhā ca manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1500_3: Tattha vacasā manasā vaṇṇato saṇṭhānato disato okāsato paricchedatoti evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1501_0: Imasmiṃ hi paṭikkūlamanasikārakammaṭṭhāne yopi tipiṭako hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1501_1: tenāpi manasikārakāle paṭhamaṃ vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1501_2: Ekaccassa hi sajjhāyaṃ karontasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti malayavāsī mahādevattherassa santike uggahitakammaṭṭhānānaṃ dvinnaṃ therānaṃ viya.
anya-e0101n0:1501_3: Thero kira tehi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācito cattāro māse imaṃyeva sajjhāyaṃ karothāti dvattiṃsākārapāḷiṃ adāsi.
anya-e0101n0:1501_4: Te kiñcāpi nesaṃ dve tayo nikāyā paguṇā,
anya-e0101n0:1501_5: padakkhiṇaggāhitāya pana cattāro māse dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantāva sotāpannā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1501_6: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena ācariyena antevāsiko vattabbo “paṭhamaṃ tāva vācāya sajjhāyaṃ karohī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1502_0: Karontena ca tacapañcakādīni paricchinditvā anulomapaṭilomavasena sajjhāyo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1502_1: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā tacoti hi vatvā puna paṭilomato taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1503_0: Tadanantaraṃ vakkapañcake maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkanti vatvā puna paṭilomato vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ aṭṭhi nhāru maṃsaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1503_1: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1504_0: Tato papphāsapañcake hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsanti vatvā puna paṭilomato papphāsaṃ pihakaṃ kilomakaṃ yakanaṃ hadayaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1504_2: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1505_0: Tato matthaluṅgapañcake antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ matthaluṅganti vatvā puna paṭilomato matthaluṅgaṃ karīsaṃ udariyaṃ antaguṇaṃ antaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1505_3: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1506_0: Tato medachakke pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medoti vatvā puna paṭilomato medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1506_4: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1507_0: Tato muttachakke assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti vatvā puna paṭilomato muttaṃ lasikā siṅghāṇikā kheḷo vasā assu,
anya-e0101n0:1507_1: medo sedo lohitaṃ pubbo semhaṃ pittaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1507_5: taco dantā nakhā lomā kesāti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1508_0: Evaṃ kālasataṃ kālasahassaṃ kālasatasahassampi vācāya sajjhāyo kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1508_1: Vacasā sajjhāyena hi kammaṭṭhānatanti paguṇā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1508_2: na ito cito ca cittaṃ vidhāvati.
anya-e0101n0:1508_4: hatthasaṅkhalikā viya vatipādapanti viya ca khāyanti.
anya-e0101n0:1509_2: Vacasā sajjhāyo hi manasā sajjhāyassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1512_0: Disatoti imasmiṃ hi sarīre nābhito uddhaṃ uparimadisā,
anya-e0101n0:1512_2: tasmā ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imissā nāma disāyāti disā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1513_0: Okāsatoti ayaṃ koṭṭhāso imasmiṃ nāma okāse patiṭṭhitoti evaṃ tassa tassa okāso vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1514_1: Tattha ayaṃ koṭṭhāso heṭṭhā ca upari ca tiriyañca iminā nāma paricchinnoti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1514_3: lomāpi na kesāti evaṃ amissakatāvasena visabhāgaparicchedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1515_0: Evaṃ sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ ācikkhantena pana idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ asukasmiṃ sutte paṭikkūlavasena kathitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1516_7: tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1516_8: Tattha anupubbatoti idañhi sajjhāyakaraṇato paṭṭhāya anupaṭipāṭiyā manasikātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1516_10: Ekantarikāya hi manasikaronto yathā nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ ekantarikāya ārohanto kilantakāyo patati,
anya-e0101n0:1516_12: evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamā kilantacitto patati,
anya-e0101n0:1517_1: Atisīghato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tiyojanamaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā okkamanavissajjanaṃ asallakkhetvā sīghena
anya-e0101n0:1517_2: javena satakkhattumpi gamanāgamanaṃ karoto purisassa kiñcāpi addhānaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1518_2: Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma tadaheva tiyojanamaggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
anya-e0101n0:1519_0: Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1519_1: Appaṭibāhato hi yathā nāma ekapadikaṃ papātamaggaṃ paṭipannassa purisassa akkamanapadaṃ asallakkhetvā ito cito ca vilokayato padavāro virajjhati,
anya-e0101n0:1519_3: evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
anya-e0101n0:1520_2: Yathā hi udakadullabhakāle manussā araññe udapānaṃ disvā tattha tālapaṇṇādikaṃ kiñcideva saññāṇaṃ bandhitvā
anya-e0101n0:1520_3: tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca.
anya-e0101n0:1520_4: Yadā pana nesaṃ abhiṇhasañcārena āgatāgatapadaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1520_6: icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā nhāyanti ceva pivanti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1520_7: evameva pubbabhāge kesā lomātipaṇṇattivasena manasikaroto paṭikkūlabhāvo pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1520_8: Atha kesā lomātipaṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1521_0: Anupubbamuñcanatoti yo yo koṭṭhāso na upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1521_2: Ādikammikassa hi kesāti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā muttanti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1521_3: Muttanti ca manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā kesāti imaṃ ādikoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1521_4: Athassa manasikaroto manasikaroto keci koṭṭhāsā upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n0:1521_8: Yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu tesampi eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati,
anya-e0101n0:1521_9: evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ pana tameva punappunaṃ manasikarontena appanā uppādetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1522_1: yathā hi dvattiṃsatālake tālavane vasantaṃ makkaṭaṃ gahetukāmo luddo ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ kareyya,
anya-e0101n0:1522_2: atha kho so makkaṭo paṭipāṭiyā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā pariyantatālameva gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1522_3: tatthapi gantvā luddena tatheva kate puna teneva nayena āditālaṃ āgaccheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1522_4: so evaṃ punappunaṃ paripātiyamāno ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahitvā anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā
anya-e0101n0:1522_5: tassa vemajjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānopi na uṭṭhaheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1523_5: Makkaṭassa dvattiṃsatālake tālavane nivāso viya yogino cittassa dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake kāye ārammaṇavasena anusañcaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1523_6: Luddena ādimhi ṭhitatālassa paṇṇaṃ sarena vijjhitvā ukkuṭṭhiyā katāya makkaṭassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ tāle patitvā
anya-e0101n0:1523_7: pariyantatālagamanaṃ viya yogino kesāti manasikāre āraddhe paṭipāṭiyā gantvā pariyosānakoṭṭhāseyeva cittassa
anya-e0101n0:1523_10: Punappunaṃ paripātiyamānassa makkaṭassa ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāne uṭṭhānaṃ viya punappunaṃ manasikaroto kesuci
anya-e0101n0:1523_11: kesuci upaṭṭhitesu anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu parikammakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1523_12: Anukkamena ekasmiṃ tāle nipatitvā tassa majjhe makuḷatālapaṇṇasūciṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā vijjhiyamānassapi
anya-e0101n0:1523_13: anuṭṭhānaṃ viya avasāne dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1524_1: yathā nāma piṇḍapātiko bhikkhu dvattiṃsakulaṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vasanto paṭhamageheyeva dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekaṃ vissajjeyya.
anya-e0101n0:1524_2: Punadivase tisso labhitvā parato dve vissajjeyya.
anya-e0101n0:1524_3: Tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā paribhuñjeyya.
anya-e0101n0:1524_7: Tassa taṃ gāmaṃ upanissāya vāso viya yogino dvattiṃsākāre parikammakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1524_8: Paṭhamagehe dve bhikkhā labhitvā parato ekissā vissajjanaṃ viya dutiyadivase tisso labhitvā parato dvinnaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1524_9: vissajjanaṃ viya ca manasikaroto manasikaroto anupaṭṭhahante vissajjetvā upaṭṭhitesu yāva koṭṭhāsadvaye
anya-e0101n0:1524_11: Tatiyadivase ādimhiyeva pattapūraṃ labhitvā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā paribhogo viya dvīsu yo suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1525_0: Appanātoti appanākoṭṭhāsato kesādīsu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse appanā hotīti veditabbāti ayamevettha adhippāyo.
anya-e0101n0:1526_2: bojjhaṅgakosallanti ime tayo suttantā vīriyasamādhiyojanatthaṃ veditabbāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tattha –
anya-e0101n0:1527_8: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
anya-e0101n0:1527_11: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvatteyya. Sace,
anya-e0101n0:1527_14: ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na sammā samādhiyeyya āsavānaṃ khayāya.
anya-e0101n0:1527_17: adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kālenakālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ paggahanimittaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikaroti,
anya-e0101n0:1527_18: taṃ hoti cittaṃ muduñca kammaññañca pabhassarañca,
anya-e0101n0:1528_2: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā ukkaṃ bandhati,
anya-e0101n0:1528_4: ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpetvā saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipitvā kālenakālaṃ abhidhamati,
anya-e0101n0:1528_8: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ abhidhameyya,
anya-e0101n0:1528_11: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ udakena paripphoseyya,
anya-e0101n0:1528_14: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ ekantaṃ ajjhupekkheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1528_15: ṭhānaṃ taṃ jātarūpaṃ na sammā paripākaṃ gaccheyya.
anya-e0101n0:1528_18: suvaṇṇakāro vā suvaṇṇakārantevāsī vā taṃ jātarūpaṃ kālenakālaṃ abhidhamati,
anya-e0101n0:1528_21: taṃ hoti jātarūpaṃ muduñca kammaññañca pabhassarañca,
anya-e0101n0:1528_24: Yassā yassā ca piḷandhanavikatiyā ākaṅkhati yadi paṭikāya yadi kuṇḍalāya yadi gīveyyāya yadi suvaṇṇamālāya,
anya-e0101n0:1529_4: Yassa yassa ca abhiññā sacchi karaṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchi kiriyāya,
anya-e0101n0:1529_5: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1531_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1531_16: chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti.
anya-e0101n0:1533_3: akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti appanākosallakathāyaṃ dassitameva.
anya-e0101n0:1534_0: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā idañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā
anya-e0101n0:1534_1: tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1534_2: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1534_3: evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyujjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari kathāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1534_4: Aññattha vasitukāmena yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1534_5: chinditvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayeneva ananurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vasantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1535_0: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:1535_1: Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1535_3: Udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0101n0:1535_8: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1537_1: Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhaāsayokāsavasena
anya-e0101n0:1538_8: Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n0:1538_11: dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo.
anya-e0101n0:1538_13: lomā na kesāti evaṃ avasesaekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko ekakoṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo.
anya-e0101n0:1539_1: Idaṃ pana nesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1540_0: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā kesamissakamidaṃ haratha nanti jigucchanti.
anya-e0101n0:1540_2: Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti.
anya-e0101n0:1541_0: Telamakkhanapupphadhūpādi saṅkhāravirahitānañca kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1541_4: Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1541_8: Dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ gandhena pana paṭikkūlameva.
anya-e0101n0:1541_9: Evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlā gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyevāti.
anya-e0101n0:1542_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni honti aparibhogāni,
anya-e0101n0:1542_1: evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā jegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ āsayato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1543_0: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā.
anya-e0101n0:1543_1: Te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikkhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n0:1543_2: jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ okāsato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1544_1: evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1544_2: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ visuṃ vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1545_1: Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā,
anya-e0101n0:1545_5: Okāsato ṭhapetvā kesānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme jātā.
anya-e0101n0:1545_6: Paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n0:1547_4: Tesaṃ hi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā.
anya-e0101n0:1547_5: Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno.
anya-e0101n0:1547_12: Paricchedato heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena,
anya-e0101n0:1548_2: Tassa upari kāḷasāmapītādivaṇṇā chavi nāma yā sakalasarīratopi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1548_4: So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇappahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1550_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya uparimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1550_2: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa ca sīsacammassa ca
anya-e0101n0:1550_3: antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1550_7: Tato piṭṭhicammaṃ taṃ vavatthapetvā anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1550_10: Atha gīvacammānantaraṃ heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1550_11: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1551_10: Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1551_12: Okāsato vīsādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1552_4: Etesu hi gīvāya uparimabhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinandhamānā purimapassena otiṇṇā.
anya-e0101n0:1552_13: Tathā vāmapādaṃ vinandhamānāpīti evaṃ sarīradhārakā nāma saṭṭhimahānhārū kāyaṃ vinandhamānā otiṇṇā.
anya-e0101n0:1552_16: Aññe pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n0:1552_27: Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi,
anya-e0101n0:1553_1: Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni,
anya-e0101n0:1555_2: Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ ānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1555_6: Tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā honti.
anya-e0101n0:1557_0: Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīracakkalakasaṇṭhānāni.
anya-e0101n0:1559_1: Aṭṭhimiñjanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ miñjaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1559_3: Saṇṭhānato mahantamahantānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ veḷunāḷiyaṃ pakkhittaseditamahāvettaggasaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1560_6: Okāsato galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1561_10: yaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1561_16: paññācaritassa acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ niddhotajātimaṇi viya jutimantaṃ khāyati.
anya-e0101n0:1561_18: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1562_2: Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ paṇḍukadhātukaṃ nātirattakumudassa pattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1562_3: Saṇṭhānato mūle ekaṃ agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1562_5: paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni.
anya-e0101n0:1562_7: okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1563_7: appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1564_5: Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1564_6: yasmiṃ paharaṇappahārena bahinikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1565_4: Abbhantare asitapītānaṃ abhāve uggatena kammajatejusmānā abbhāhatattā saṃkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1565_6: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1566_1: Antanti purisassa dvattiṃsahatthā itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggā antavaṭṭi.
anya-e0101n0:1566_5: Okāsato upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1567_5: Okāsato kuddālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakāni antabhoge
anya-e0101n0:1567_6: ekato agaḷante ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā
anya-e0101n0:1569_0: Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ antapaṭalaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1569_4: yattha takkoṭakā gaṇḍuppādakā tālahīrakā sūcimukhakā paṭatantasuttakā iccevamādidvattiṃsakulappabhedā
anya-e0101n0:1569_6: ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhihananti,
anya-e0101n0:1569_7: pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇavelāyañca uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā viluppanti,
anya-e0101n0:1569_8: yaṃ tesaṃ kimīnaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1569_9: Yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya nidāghasamaye thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakena
anya-e0101n0:1569_11: dvīhatīhaccayena sañjātakimikulaṃ sūriyātapasantāpavegakuthitaṃ upari pheṇapupphuḷake muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1569_17: kimikulākulaṃ uparūpari pheṇapupphuḷakāni muñcantaṃ paramakasambuduggandhajegucchabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1569_20: Yattha ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vivekaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1569_25: eko bhāgo rasabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayati.
anya-e0101n0:1570_0: Paricchedato udarapaṭalena ceva udariyabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1571_7: piṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto veḷunāḷikasadiso,
anya-e0101n0:1571_8: yattha seyyathāpi nāma upari bhūmibhāge patitaṃ vassodakaṃ ogaḷitvā heṭṭhā bhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1571_9: evameva yaṃkiñci āmāsaye patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ nisadāya pisitamiva
anya-e0101n0:1571_10: saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā antabilena ogaḷitvā ogaḷitvā omadditvā veḷupabbe pakkhipamānapaṇḍumattikā viya
anya-e0101n0:1571_12: Paricchedato pakkāsayapaṭalena ceva karīsabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1572_6: Okāsato sīsakaṭāhabbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhānetvā ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍā viya samohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1572_7: Paricchedato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantaratalehi ceva matthaluṅgabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1573_7: Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca
anya-e0101n0:1573_9: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti, bhamanti,
anya-e0101n0:1573_12: Baddhapittaṃ hadayapapphāsānaṃ antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosakasadise pittakosake ṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1574_6: Yaṃ pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe vā kathale vā patante chijjitvā
anya-e0101n0:1574_8: evameva pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1574_9: yamhi ca mandībhūte pakkagaṇḍo viya pūtikukkuṭaṇḍamiva ca udaraṃ paramajegucchaṃ kuṇapagandhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1574_10: tato uggatena ca gandhena uddekopi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1574_11: So ca puriso apehi duggandhaṃ vāyasīti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1574_12: yañca vaḍḍhitvā bahalattamāpannaṃ pidhānaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyaṃ udarapaṭalassa abbhantareyeva kuṇapagandhaṃ sannirumbhitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1575_6: Okāsato pana pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi,
anya-e0101n0:1575_8: yatra yatra khāṇukaṇṭakapaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
anya-e0101n0:1576_7: Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca
anya-e0101n0:1576_9: Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapatthapūramattaṃ hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ upari
anya-e0101n0:1576_10: thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1576_11: Tasmiṃ hi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
anya-e0101n0:1577_6: yattha so lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0101n0:1577_9: tasmā tassa saṇṭhānampi kesalomakūpavivarānaññeva vasena veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1577_10: Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yoginā kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva sedo manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1578_2: Saṇṭhānato thūlasarīrassa tāva cammamaṃsantare ṭhapitahaliddivaṇṇadukūlapilotikasaṇṭhāno hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1578_3: Kisasarīrassa jaṅghamaṃsaṃ ūrumaṃsaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakanissitaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ udaravaṭṭimaṃsanti etāni nissāya
anya-e0101n0:1578_6: Okāsato thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito,
anya-e0101n0:1578_7: yaṃ sinehasaṅkhaṃ gatampi paramajegucchattā neva muddhani telatthāya,
anya-e0101n0:1579_6: Na cetaṃ pittakosake pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1579_7: Yadā pana sattā somanassajātā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti,
anya-e0101n0:1579_10: yadā ca nesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti.
anya-e0101n0:1579_11: Tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisabhāgāhārautūhi samuṭṭhahitvā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n0:1579_12: Assupariggaṇhakena ca yoginā akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1580_7: Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnāva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1580_8: Yadā pana aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi te padesā usmājātā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1580_9: tadā tattha nhānakāle pasannaudakūpari sinehabinduvisaṭo viya ito cito ca sañcarati.
anya-e0101n0:1581_6: Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya ṭhito.
anya-e0101n0:1581_7: Na cesa ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:1581_8: Yadā pana sattā tathārūpamāhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā,
anya-e0101n0:1581_12: tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi oruyha jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1581_15: mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ nadīpuline khatakūpakasalilaṃ viya
anya-e0101n0:1582_6: Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n0:1582_7: atha kho yathā nāma puriso paduminipatte dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā kaṇṭakena vijjheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1582_8: athānena chiddena dadhimuttaṃ gaḷitvā bahi pateyya,
anya-e0101n0:1582_11: tadā anto sīsato pūtisemhabhāvamāpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n0:1582_12: Siṅghāṇikā pariggaṇhakena ca yoginā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva pariggaṇhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1583_5: Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n0:1583_7: tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa samiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti,
anya-e0101n0:1583_13: dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati,
anya-e0101n0:1584_7: Yattha seyyathāpi candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe candanikāraso pavisati,
anya-e0101n0:1584_12: Yamhi ca muttassa bharite passāvaṃ karomāti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1584_13: Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1585_1: Evañhi kesādike koṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā anupubbato nātisīghatotiādinā
anya-e0101n0:1585_2: nayena vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlāti manasikaroto paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāne
anya-e0101n0:1585_3: seyyathāpi cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ kusumānaṃ ekasuttakaganthitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa sabbapupphāni
anya-e0101n0:1585_5: evameva atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesāti imaṃ kāyaṃ olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyāva pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0101n0:1585_6: Tena vuttaṃ manasikārakosallakathāyaṃ “ādikammikassa hi kesāti manasikaroto manasikāro gantvā muttanti imaṃ pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1586_1: athassa evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesu āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0101n0:1586_2: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhipamānamiva upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1587_0: Athassa anupubbamuñcanādivasena paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlāti punappunaṃ manasikaroto anukkamena appanā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1587_3: Taṃ āsevato bhāvayato vuttanayena asubhakammaṭṭhānesu viya paṭhamajjhānavaseneva appanā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1588_0: Sā yassa ekova koṭṭhāso pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1588_1: ekasmiṃ vā koṭṭhāse appanaṃ patvā puna aññasmiṃ yogaṃ na karoti,
anya-e0101n0:1588_3: Yassa pana aneke koṭṭhāsā pākaṭā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1588_4: ekasmiṃ vā jhānaṃ patvā puna aññasmiṃpi yogaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:1588_5: tassa mallakattherassa viya koṭṭhāsagaṇanāya paṭhamajjhānāni nibbattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1589_0: So kirāyasmā dīghabhāṇakaabhayattheraṃ hatthe gahetvā “āvuso abhaya,
anya-e0101n0:1589_1: imaṃ tāva pañhaṃ uggaṇhāhī”ti vatvā āha –
anya-e0101n0:1590_0: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena ijjhamānampi cetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu satibalena ijjhanato kāyagatāsatīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1591_8: Kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhedaṃ nissāya catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ lābhī hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1596_3: ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro,
anya-e0101n0:1596_4: uppannuppanne ca pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti evaṃ pasaṃsitvā –
anya-e0101n0:1597_2: ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro,
anya-e0101n0:1597_3: uppannuppanne ca pāpake akusale dhamme ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasameti? Idha,
anya-e0101n0:1597_5: bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0101n0:1597_7: Dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0101n0:1597_10: rassaṃ vā passasanto rassaṃ passasāmīti pajānāti.
anya-e0101n0:1598_2: So pana yasmā pāḷivaṇṇanānusāreneva vuccamāno sabbākāraparipūro hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1599_3: ānāpānassati samādhīti ettha tāva kathanti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanaṃ nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāpucchā.
anya-e0101n0:1599_4: Bhāvito ca bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhīti nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāya puṭṭhadhammanidassanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1599_8: Ānāpānassatisamādhīti ānāpānapariggāhikāya satiyā saddhiṃ sampayutto samādhi.
anya-e0101n0:1599_11: Santoceva paṇīto cāti santo ceva paṇīto ceva.
anya-e0101n0:1599_14: Ayañhi yathā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kevalaṃ paṭivedhavasena santañca paṇītañca,
anya-e0101n0:1599_15: oḷārikārammaṇattā pana paṭikkūlārammaṇattā ca ārammaṇavasena neva santaṃ na paṇītaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1599_16: na evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena asanto vā apaṇīto vā,
anya-e0101n0:1599_17: atha kho ārammaṇasantatāyapi santo vūpasanto nibbuto,
anya-e0101n0:1600_0: Asecanako ca sukho ca vihāroti ettha pana nāssa secananti asecanako,
anya-e0101n0:1600_2: Natthi ettha parikammena vā upacārena vā santatā.
anya-e0101n0:1600_3: Ādisamannāhārato pabhuti attano sabhāveneva santo ca paṇīto cāti attho.
anya-e0101n0:1600_4: Keci pana asecanakoti anāsittako ojavanto sabhāveneva madhuroti vadanti.
anya-e0101n0:1600_6: appitappitakkhaṇe kāyikacetasikasukhapaṭilābhāya saṃvattanato sukho ca vihāroti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1601_2: kena pakārena kenākārena kena vidhinā bhāvito ānāpānassatisamādhi kena pakārena bahulīkato santo ceva…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1602_5: Ayañhi ettha idhasaddo sabbappakāraānāpānassatisamādhinibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano ca.
anya-e0101n0:1603_2: Imassa hi bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu anuvisaṭaṃ cittaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhiārammaṇaṃ abhiruhituṃ na icchati,
anya-e0101n0:1603_4: Tasmā seyyathāpi nāma gopo kūṭadhenuyā sabbaṃ khīraṃ pivitvā vaḍḍhitaṃ kūṭavacchaṃ dametukāmo dhenuto
anya-e0101n0:1603_5: apanetvā ekamante mahantaṃ thambhaṃ nikhaṇitvā tattha yottena bandheyya,
anya-e0101n0:1603_6: athassa so vaccho ito cito ca vipphanditvā palāyituṃ asakkonto tameva thambhaṃ upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā,
anya-e0101n0:1603_7: evameva imināpi bhikkhunā dīgharattaṃ rūpārammaṇādirasapānavaḍḍhitaṃ duṭṭhacittaṃ dametukāmena rūpādiārammaṇato apanetvā araññaṃ vā…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1603_8: suññāgāraṃ vā pavesetvā tattha assāsapassāsathambhe satiyottena bandhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1603_9: Evamassa taṃ cittaṃ ito cito ca vipphanditvāpi pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇaṃ alabhamānaṃ satiyottaṃ chinditvā
anya-e0101n0:1603_10: palāyituṃ asakkontaṃ tamevārammaṇaṃ upacārappanāvasena upanisīdati ceva upanipajjati ca.
anya-e0101n0:1604_0: “Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e0101n0:1607_0: Atha vā yasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānappabhede muddhabhūtaṃ sabbaññubuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1607_1: ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ itthipurisahatthiassādisaddasamākulaṃ gāmantaṃ apariccajitvā na sukaraṃ bhāvetuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1607_3: Agāmake pana araññe sukaraṃ yogāvacarena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā
anya-e0101n0:1607_4: tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1608_1: so yathā vatthuvijjācariyo nagarabhūmiṃ passitvā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā “ettha nagaraṃ māpethā”ti upadisati,
anya-e0101n0:1608_2: sotthinā ca nagare niṭṭhite rājakulato mahāsakkāraṃ labhati,
anya-e0101n0:1608_3: evameva yogāvacarassa anurūpasenāsanaṃ upaparikkhitvā “ettha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabba”nti upadisati,
anya-e0101n0:1608_4: tato tattha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttena yoginā kamena arahatte patte “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n0:1609_1: Yathā hi mahādīpirājā araññe tiṇagahanaṃ vā vanagahanaṃ vā pabbatagahanaṃ vā nissāya nilīyitvā vanamahiṃsagokaṇṇasūkarādayo mige gaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n0:1609_2: evameva ayaṃ araññādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhikkhu yathākkamena sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamagge ceva ariyaphalañca gaṇhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1613_0: Tenassa parakkamajavayoggabhūmiṃ araññasenāsanaṃ dassento bhagavā “araññagato vā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0101n0:1614_1: Tattha araññagatoti “araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1614_2: “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti ca evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇesu araññesu yaṃkiñci pavivekasukhaṃ araññaṃ gato.
anya-e0101n0:1614_5: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā araññañca rukkhamūlañca avasesasattavidhasenāsanagatopi suññāgāragatoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:1615_0: Evamassa ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlañca ānāpānassatibhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upadisitvā alīnānuddhaccapakkhikaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1615_2: Athassa nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasukhataṃ ārammaṇapariggahūpāyañca dassento pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvātiādimāha.
anya-e0101n0:1615_5: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā.
anya-e0101n0:1615_8: Athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanappaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1615_13: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā.
anya-e0101n0:1615_17: Tena vuccati “parimukhaṃ sati”nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1616_1: So satova assasati sato passasatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ nisīditvā evañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā taṃ satiṃ avijahanto sato eva assasati sato passasati,
anya-e0101n0:1616_5: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “so satova assasati sato passasatī”ti etasseva vibhaṅge –
anya-e0101n0:1617_1: Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1617_2: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1617_5: Paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1617_6: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1618_0: Tattha dīghaṃ vā assasantoti dīghaṃ vā assāsaṃ pavattayanto.
anya-e0101n0:1618_4: Tattha sabbesampi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ mātukucchito nikkhamanakāle paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati.
anya-e0101n0:1618_5: Pacchā bāhiravāto sukhumarajaṃ gahetvā abbhantaraṃ pavisanto tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyati.
anya-e0101n0:1619_2: Yathā hi okāsaddhānaṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ vā vālikā vā “dīghamudakaṃ dīghā vālikā,
anya-e0101n0:1619_4: evaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi assāsapassāsā hatthisarīre ca ahisarīre ca tesaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dīghaṃ addhānaṃ saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti.
anya-e0101n0:1619_6: Sunakhasasādīnaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ rassaṃ addhānaṃ sīghaṃ pūretvā sīghameva nikkhamanti,
anya-e0101n0:1619_8: Manussesu pana keci hatthiahiādayo viya kāladdhānavasena dīghaṃ assasanti ca passasanti ca.
anya-e0101n0:1619_10: tasmā tesaṃ kālavasena dīghamaddhānaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca te “dīghā” ittaramaddhānaṃ nikkhamantā ca pavisantā ca “rassā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1620_0: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehi dīghaṃ assasanto passasanto ca “dīghaṃ assasāmi,
anya-e0101n0:1620_2: Evaṃ pajānato cassa ekenākārena kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1621_5: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi chando uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1621_6: Chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati.
anya-e0101n0:1621_9: Chandavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi pāmojjaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1621_10: Pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati.
anya-e0101n0:1621_13: Pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṃ dīghaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā cittaṃ vivattati,
anya-e0101n0:1621_15: Imehi navahi ākārehi dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyo.
anya-e0101n0:1621_20: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena taṃ kāyaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0101n0:1622_4: Tasmā rassavasena yāva “tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā”ti,
anya-e0101n0:1623_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ addhānavasena ittaravasena ca imehākārehi assāsapassāse pajānanto dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1623_1: rassaṃ vā passasanto rassaṃ passasāmīti pajānātīti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1628_2: passasissāmīti sikkhatīti sakalassa assāsakāyassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1628_3: Sakalassa passāsakāyassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1628_4: Evaṃ viditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttacittena assasati ceva passasati ca.
anya-e0101n0:1628_6: Ekassa hi bhikkhuno cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭe assāsakāye passāsakāye vā ādi pākaṭo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1629_6: ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhāti imā tisso sikkhāyo tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati
anya-e0101n0:1630_0: Tattha yasmā purimanaye kevalaṃ assasitabbaṃ passasitabbameva,
anya-e0101n0:1630_2: Ito paṭṭhāya pana ñāṇuppādanādīsu yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0101n0:1630_3: Tasmā tattha assasāmīti pajānāti passasāmīti pajānāticceva vattamānakālavasena pāḷiṃ vatvā ito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n0:1630_4: kattabbassa ñāṇuppādanādino ākārassa dassanatthaṃ sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmītiādinā nayena anāgatavacanavasena
anya-e0101n0:1631_1: passasissāmīti sikkhatīti oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento paṭippassambhento nirodhento vūpasamento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1631_2: Tatra evaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1631_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle kāyo ca cittañca sadarathā honti oḷārikā.
anya-e0101n0:1631_4: Kāyacittānaṃ oḷārikatte avūpasante assāsapassāsāpi oḷārikā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1631_8: Yadā panassa kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1631_10: Tesu vūpasantesu assāsapassāsā sukhumā hutvā pavattanti,
anya-e0101n0:1632_2: mahābhāraṃ vā sīsato oropetvā ṭhitassa oḷārikā assāsapassāsā honti,
anya-e0101n0:1632_5: Yadā panesa taṃ parissamaṃ vinodetvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca allasāṭakaṃ hadaye katvā sītāya chāyāya nipanno hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1632_6: athassa te assāsapassāsā sukhumā honti “atthi nu kho natthī”ti vicetabbatākārappattā,
anya-e0101n0:1632_7: evameva imassa bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle kāyo ca…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1632_10: Tathā hissa pubbe apariggahitakāle “oḷārikoḷārike kāyasaṅkhāre passambhemī”ti ābhogasamannāhāramanasikārapaccavekkhaṇā natthi,
anya-e0101n0:1632_12: Tenassa apariggahitakālato pariggahitakāle kāyasaṅkhāro sukhumo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1636_1: dutiyajjhānupacāre sukhumoti evaṃ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijjhānupacārepi sukhumataramicchanti.
anya-e0101n0:1636_2: Sabbesaññeva pana matena apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhati.
anya-e0101n0:1637_0: Vipassanāyaṃ pana apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro oḷāriko,
anya-e0101n0:1637_18: Tattha pubbe vuttanayeneva purimassa purimassa pacchimena pacchimena paṭippassaddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1637_19: Evamettha oḷārikasukhumatā ca passaddhi ca veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1638_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ panassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi evamattho vutto –
anya-e0101n0:1639_3: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyikā ete dhammā kāyapaṭibaddhā kāyasaṅkhārā.
anya-e0101n0:1639_4: Te kāyasaṅkhāre passambhento nirodhento vūpasamento sikkhati…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1639_14: akampanā santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1640_2: Evaṃ sante vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā na hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1640_6: na ca naṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā samāpajjantipi vuṭṭhahantipi.
anya-e0101n0:1641_0: “Iti kira passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1641_1: Evaṃ sante vātūpaladdhiyā ca pabhāvanā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1641_5: tañca naṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā samāpajjantipi vuṭṭhahantipi.
anya-e0101n0:1642_0: “Seyyathāpi kaṃse ākoṭite paṭhamaṃ oḷārikā saddā pavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1642_1: Oḷārikānaṃ saddānaṃ nimittaṃ sugahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi oḷārike sadde atha pacchā sukhumakā saddā pavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1642_2: Sukhumakānaṃ saddānaṃ nimittaṃ suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi sukhumake sadde
anya-e0101n0:1642_5: Oḷārikānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ nimittaṃ suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi oḷārike assāsapassāse
anya-e0101n0:1642_7: Sukhumakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ nimittaṃ suggahitattā sumanasikatattā sūpadhāritattā niruddhepi sukhumake
anya-e0101n0:1642_8: assāsapassāse atha pacchā sukhumaassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇatāpi cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:1643_4: tañca naṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā samāpajjantipi vuṭṭhahantipi.
anya-e0101n0:1643_10: tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena taṃ kāyaṃ anupassati.
anya-e0101n0:1644_0: Ayaṃ tāvettha kāyānupassanāvasena vuttassa paṭhamacatukkassa anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:1645_1: Yasmā panettha idameva catukkaṃ ādikammikassa kammaṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1645_2: Itarāni pana tīṇi catukkāni ettha pattajjhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena vuttāni.
anya-e0101n0:1645_3: Tasmā idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1645_4: pāpuṇitukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena pubbe vuttanayeneva sīlaparisodhanādīni sabbakiccāni katvā vuttappakārassa
anya-e0101n0:1647_0: Evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhanto attanāpi na kilamati,
anya-e0101n0:1647_2: Tasmā thokaṃ uddisāpetvā bahukālaṃ sajjhāyitvā evaṃ pañcasandhikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā ācariyassa
anya-e0101n0:1647_3: santike vā aññatra vā pubbe vuttappakāre senāsane vasantena upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena katabhattakiccena
anya-e0101n0:1647_4: bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā sukhanisinnena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā ācariyuggahato
anya-e0101n0:1647_5: ekapadampi asammuyhantena idaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:1653_0: Gaṇentena ca paṭhamaṃ dandhagaṇanāya dhaññamāpakagaṇanāya gaṇetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1653_1: Dhaññamāpako hi nāḷiṃ pūretvā “eka”nti vatvā okirati.

anya-e0101n0:1654_7: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañca cha satta…pe… aṭṭha, nava,
anya-e0101n0:1654_9: Gaṇanapaṭibaddhe hi kammaṭṭhāne gaṇanabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1655_0: Tassevaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1655_1: Atha nirantaraṃ pavattatīti ñatvā anto ca bahi ca vātaṃ apariggahetvā purimanayeneva vegena vegena gaṇetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1655_2: Anto pavisanavātena hi saddhiṃ cittaṃ pavesayato abbhantaraṃ vātabbhāhataṃ medapūritaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1655_3: Bahi nikkhamanavātena saddhiṃ cittaṃ nīharato bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati.

anya-e0101n0:1656_1: Yāva vinā gaṇanāya assāsapassāsārammaṇe sati santiṭṭhati.

anya-e0101n0:1657_1: Evaṃ gaṇanāya manasi katvā anubandhanāya manasi kātabbaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:1658_1: Passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1659_0: Tasmā anubandhanāya manasikarontena ādimajjhapariyosānavasena na manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1659_1: Apica kho phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1659_2: Gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1659_3: Phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva pana gaṇento gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karoti.

anya-e0101n0:1659_6: Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāsu vuttapaṅguḷadovārikūpamāhi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttakakacūpamāya ca veditabbo.

anya-e0101n0:1674_1: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci na cireneva nimittañca uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1674_3: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1674_5: Yathā sāraddhakāyassa mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, vikūjati,
anya-e0101n0:1674_7: Asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati,
anya-e0101n0:1674_12: Evameva gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1675_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n0:1675_1: Tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ pavattatiyeva. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0101n0:1675_2: Yathā puriso mahatiyā lohasalākāya kaṃsathālaṃ ākoṭeyya,
anya-e0101n0:1675_5: Niruddhe oḷārike sadde atha pacchā sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1675_6: tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ saddanimittārammaṇaṃ pavattateva,
anya-e0101n0:1676_1: Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti,
anya-e0101n0:1676_3: Idaṃ pana uparūpari bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1676_5: evaṃ anupaṭṭhahante pana tasmiṃ tena bhikkhunā uṭṭhāyāsanā cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā na gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1676_8: “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti vā na vuṭṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1676_9: Iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva hoti.

anya-e0101n0:1677_20: Athānena pakatiphuṭṭhavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.

anya-e0101n0:1677_24: Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “nāhaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1678_1: Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1678_2: Ito aññaṃ pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1678_3: Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ garukabhāvanaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ mahāpurisānaṃyeva manasikārabhūmibhūtaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1678_8: Tasmā ettha balavatī sati ca paññā ca icchitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1679_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1679_2: evameva maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi,
anya-e0101n0:1679_4: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1680_0: Yathā pana kassako kasiṃ kasitvā balībadde muñcitvā gocaramukhe katvā chāyāya nisinno vissameyya,
anya-e0101n0:1680_1: athassa te balībaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1680_3: so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍahi,
anya-e0101n0:1680_4: atha kho rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātanatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā,
anya-e0101n0:1680_5: atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātanatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā
anya-e0101n0:1680_6: rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā puna kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0101n0:1680_7: evameva tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1680_8: Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro pavattetabbo.

anya-e0101n0:1680_10: Tatonena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena vijjhantena punappunaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1681_2: Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ ekasadisaṃ hoti.

anya-e0101n0:1692_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti,
anya-e0101n0:1692_4: Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva vaṇṇato manasi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1692_6: Apica kho khattiyamahesiyā cakkavattigabbho viya kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca āvāsādīni satta asappāyāni
anya-e0101n0:1692_7: vajjetvā tāneva satta sappāyāni sevantena sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1692_8: Atha naṃ evaṃ rakkhitvā punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1692_10: Tassevaṃ ghaṭentassa pathavīkasiṇe vuttānukkameneva tasmiṃ nimitte catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1693_1: Evaṃ nibbattacatukkapañcakajjhāno panettha bhikkhu sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0101n0:1693_2: pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo tadeva jhānaṃ pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1693_4: So hi samāpattito vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati.
anya-e0101n0:1693_5: Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto sañcarati,
anya-e0101n0:1693_7: Tato assāsapassāse ca kāyañca rūpanti cittañca taṃsampayuttadhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n0:1694_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati.
anya-e0101n0:1694_1: Pariyesanto ca naṃ disvā tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati.
anya-e0101n0:1694_2: Vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne obhāsādayo
anya-e0101n0:1694_3: dasa vipassanupakkilese pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ maggoti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1694_4: patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena vayato upaṭṭhitesu sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto
anya-e0101n0:1694_5: yathākkamena cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāya ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa
anya-e0101n0:1694_6: pariyantaṃ patto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1695_0: Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti ayaṃ sabbākārato paṭhamacatukkavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:1696_1: Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n0:1696_2: Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva tesaṃ evaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1697_0: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1697_1: Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
anya-e0101n0:1698_2: Tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1698_5: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n0:1698_6: Tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1699_0: “Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1699_1: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1699_6: passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1699_7: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1699_9: Jānato passato paccavekkhato cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato saddhāya adhimuccato vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato satiṃ upaṭṭhāpayato
anya-e0101n0:1699_10: cittaṃ samādahato paññāya pajānato abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaroto
anya-e0101n0:1700_5: Sukhapaṭisaṃvedīpade cettha vipassanābhūmidassanatthaṃ “sukhanti dve sukhāni kāyikañca sukhaṃ cetasikañcā”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1700_6: Passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento,
anya-e0101n0:1701_2: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato
anya-e0101n0:1701_3: saññāsampayuttā vedanāti evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1702_1: Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1702_2: Abhippamodayaṃ cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n0:1702_3: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
anya-e0101n0:1703_2: So samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttapītiyā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
anya-e0101n0:1703_4: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttapītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n0:1703_5: Evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti.
anya-e0101n0:1703_6: Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1704_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento.
anya-e0101n0:1704_1: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sampassato vipassanākkhaṇe
anya-e0101n0:1704_3: Evaṃ uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento “samādahaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1705_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento,
anya-e0101n0:1705_4: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato sammasati.
anya-e0101n0:1705_5: So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento,
anya-e0101n0:1705_11: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento assasati ceva passasati ca.
anya-e0101n0:1705_12: Tena vuccati “vimocayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1705_13: Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1706_1: Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1707_4: nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena bhedoti attho.
anya-e0101n0:1707_5: Aniccānupassanāti tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu aniccanti anupassanā.
anya-e0101n0:1707_7: Tasmā evaṃbhūto assasanto passasanto ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1708_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca.
anya-e0101n0:1708_3: Virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassanavasena pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca.
anya-e0101n0:1708_4: Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1709_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo ca.
anya-e0101n0:1710_0: Vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0101n0:1710_1: saṅkhatadosadassanena ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1710_2: Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0101n0:1710_3: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1710_4: Ubhayampi pana purimapurimaññāṇānaṃ anuanupassanato anupassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1710_5: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca “paṭinissaggānupassī
anya-e0101n0:1711_2: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1711_3: Evaṃ soḷasavatthuvasena ca pana ayaṃ ānāpānassati mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā.
anya-e0101n0:1712_3: ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo ceva paṇīto cā”tiādivacanato santabhāvādivasenāpi mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā,
anya-e0101n0:1712_5: Ayañhi santapaṇītaasecanakasukhavihārattā samādhiantarāyakarānaṃ vitakkānaṃ vasena ito cito ca cittassa
anya-e0101n0:1713_5: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti,
anya-e0101n0:1713_6: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1714_0: Apica carimakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ viditabhāvakaraṇatopissā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1714_3: ānāpānassatiyā evaṃ bahulīkatāya yepi te carimakā assāsapassāsā,
anya-e0101n0:1715_10: Ye pana cuticittassa purato soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā cuticittena saha nirujjhanti,
anya-e0101n0:1716_0: Imaṃ kira kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā cuticittassa purato
anya-e0101n0:1716_1: soḷasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppādaṃ āvajjayato uppādopi nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1716_2: Ṭhitiṃ āvajjayato ṭhitipi nesaṃ pākaṭā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1716_3: Bhaṅgaṃ āvajjayato ca bhaṅgo nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1717_0: Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pattassa bhikkhuno hi āyuantaraṃ paricchinnaṃ vā hoti aparicchinnaṃ vā.
anya-e0101n0:1717_1: Idaṃ pana soḷasavatthukaṃ ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pattassa āyuantaraṃ paricchinnameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1717_3: na ito para”nti ñatvā attano dhammatāya eva sarīrapaṭijaggananivāsanapārupanādīni sabbakiccāni katvā
anya-e0101n0:1717_4: akkhīni nimīleti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero viya mahākarañjiyavihāravāsīmahātissatthero viya devaputtamahāraṭṭhe
anya-e0101n0:1717_5: piṇḍapātikatissatthero viya cittalapabbatavihāravāsino dve bhātiyattherā viya ca.
anya-e0101n0:1718_1: Dvebhātiyattherānaṃ kireko puṇṇamuposathadivase pātimokkhaṃ osāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1718_2: gantvā caṅkame ṭhito candālokaṃ oloketvā attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā bhikkhusaṅghamāha –
anya-e0101n0:1718_4: Tatra keci āhaṃsu “amhehi āsane nisinnakāva parinibbāyantā diṭṭhapubbā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1718_7: “ahaṃ dāni vo caṅkamantameva parinibbāyamānaṃ dassessāmī”ti tato caṅkame lekhaṃ katvā “ahaṃ ito caṅkamakoṭito
anya-e0101n0:1718_8: parakoṭiṃ gantvā nivattamāno imaṃ lekhaṃ patvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti vatvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha parabhāgaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1718_9: gantvā nivattamāno ekena pādena lekhaṃ akkantakkhaṇeyeva parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n0:1723_1: Ānāpānassatiyā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ pana upasamānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena rahogatena paṭisallīnena – “yāvatā,

anya-e0101n0:1723_4: yadidaṃ madanimmadano pipāsavinayo ālayasamugghāto vaṭṭupacchedo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti
anya-e0101n0:1724_2: Saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vāti saṅgamma samāgamma paccayehi katā vā akatā vā.
anya-e0101n0:1724_3: Virāgo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ virāgo aggamakkhāyati seṭṭho uttamoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:1724_6: nibbānanti yo so madanimmadanotiādīni nāmāni asaṅkhatadhammo labhati,
anya-e0101n0:1724_8: So hi yasmā tamāgamma sabbepi mānamadapurisamadādayo madā nimmadā amadā honti vinassanti,
anya-e0101n0:1724_10: Yasmā ca tamāgamma sabbāpi kāmapipāsā vinayaṃ abbhatthaṃ yāti,
anya-e0101n0:1724_12: Yasmā pana tamāgamma pañcakāmaguṇālayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n0:1724_14: Yasmā ca tamāgamma tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ upacchijjati,
anya-e0101n0:1724_16: Yasmā pana tamāgamma sabbaso taṇhā khayaṃ gacchati virajjati nirujjhati ca,
anya-e0101n0:1724_18: Yasmā panesa catasso yoniyo pañca gatiyo satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava ca sattāvāse aparāparabhāvāya vinanato
anya-e0101n0:1724_19: ābandhanato saṃsibbanato vānanti laddhavohārāya taṇhāya nikkhanto nissaṭo visaṃyutto,
anya-e0101n0:1725_0: Evametesaṃ madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasena nibbānasaṅkhāto upasamo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1726_0: Tassevaṃ madanimmadanatādiguṇavasena upasamaṃ anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosa…
anya-e0101n0:1726_2: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti upasamaṃ ārabbhāti buddhānussatiādīsu vuttanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1726_3: Upasamaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1727_0: Cha anussatiyo viya ca ayampi ariyasāvakasseva ijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:1727_1: evaṃ santepi upasamagarukena puthujjanenāpi manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1727_3: Imañca pana upasamānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu sukhaṃ supati,
anya-e0101n0:1727_5: santindriyo hoti santamānaso hirottappasamannāgato pāsādiko paṇītādhimuttiko sabrahmacārīnaṃ garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
anya-e0101n0:1737_1: Anussatikammaṭṭhānānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhesu pana mettā, karuṇā, muditā,
anya-e0101n0:1737_2: upekkhāti imesu catūsu brahmavihāresu mettaṃ bhāvetukāmena tāva ādikammikena yogāvacarena upacchinnapalibodhena
anya-e0101n0:1737_3: gahitakammaṭṭhānena bhattakiccaṃ katvā bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā vivitte padese supaññatte āsane sukhanisinnena
anya-e0101n0:1738_3: Na ca sakkā kiñci adiṭṭhādīnavaṃ pahātuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1738_6: dosena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto pāṇampi hanatī”tiādīnaṃ vasena dose ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo.

anya-e0101n0:1743_9: appamattakepi cassa dukkhe uppanne ārodanākārappatto viya hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1743_10: Majjhattaṃ garuṭṭhāne ca piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati.
anya-e0101n0:1744_0: Liṅgavisabhāge pana tameva ārabbha odhiso bhāventassa rāgo uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:1744_5: So tassā mettaṃ bhāvento sabbarattiṃ bhittiyuddhamakāsi.

anya-e0101n0:1745_10: So gavesanto ācariyassa matabhāvaṃ ñatvā aññaṃ ārabbha mettāyanto samāpattiṃ appesi.
anya-e0101n0:1746_1: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana “ahaṃ sukhito homi niddukkho”ti vā,

anya-e0101n0:1761_3: piyamanāpattakāraṇāni sīlasutādīni garubhāvanīyattakāraṇāni ca anussaritvā “esa sappuriso sukhī hotu
anya-e0101n0:1762_0: Evarūpe ca puggale kāmaṃ appanā sampajjati,

anya-e0101n0:1762_4: Bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:1892_2: Iti sabbānipi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttāni aṭṭhavīsādhikāni pañca appanāsatānīti.
anya-e0101n0:1893_0: Iti etāsu appanāsu yassa kassaci vasena mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ bhāvetvā ayaṃ yogāvacaro “sukhaṃ supatī”tiādinā nayena vutte ekādasānisaṃse paṭilabhati.

anya-e0101n0:1894_3: Niddaṃ okkantopi samāpattiṃ samāpanno viya hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1895_0: Sukhaṃ paṭibujjhatīti yathā aññe nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhanti,
anya-e0101n0:1895_1: evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā vikasamānamiva padumaṃ sukhaṃ nibbikāraṃ paṭibujjhati.
anya-e0101n0:1896_0: Na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passatīti supinaṃ passantopi bhaddakameva supinaṃ passati,
anya-e0101n0:1896_1: cetiyaṃ vandanto viya pūjaṃ karonto viya dhammaṃ suṇanto viya ca hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1896_2: Yathā pana aññe attānaṃ corehi samparivāritaṃ viya vāḷehi upaddutaṃ viya papāte patantaṃ viya ca passanti,
anya-e0101n0:1897_0: Manussānaṃ piyo hotīti ure āmuttamuttāhāro viya sīse piḷandhamālā viya ca manussānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo.
anya-e0101n0:1898_0: Amanussānaṃ piyo hotīti yatheva manussānaṃ, evaṃ amanussānampi piyo hoti visākhatthero viya.
anya-e0101n0:1899_1: So tattheva vasamāno assosi “tambapaṇṇidīpo kira cetiyamālālaṅkato kāsāvapajjoto icchiticchitaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0101n0:1899_2: ettha sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā utusappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti
anya-e0101n0:1900_0: So attano bhogakkhandhaṃ puttadārassa niyyādetvā dussante baddhena ekakahāpaṇeneva gharā nikkhamitvā samuddatīre nāvaṃ udikkhamāno ekamāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e0101n0:1900_1: So vohārakusalatāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇitvā asukasmiṃ vikkiṇanto dhammikāya vaṇijjāya tenevantaramāsena sahassaṃ abhisaṃhari.
anya-e0101n0:1901_0: So pabbājanatthāya sīmaṃ nīto taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikantarena bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
anya-e0101n0:1901_4: idānevetaṃ vicārehī”ti vutte “visākhassa pabbajjaṭṭhānamāgatā mā rittahatthā gamiṃsū”ti muñcitvā sīmāmāḷake vippakiritvā pabbajitvā upasampanno.
anya-e0101n0:1902_0: So pañcavasso hutvā dvemātikā paguṇā katvā pavāretvā attano sappāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekekasmiṃ vihāre
anya-e0101n0:1902_1: cattāro māse katvā samappavattavāsaṃ vasamāno cari.
anya-e0101n0:1906_0: Etthantare khalitaṃ natthi, aho lābhā te mārisā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1907_0: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gacchanto dvedhā pathaṃ patvā “ayaṃ nu kho maggo udāhu aya”nti cintayanto aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:1907_1: Athassa pabbate adhivatthā devatā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “esa maggo”ti vatvā dasseti.
anya-e0101n0:1907_2: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cattāro māse vasitvā paccūse gamissāmīti cintetvā nipajji.
anya-e0101n0:1907_3: Caṅkamasīse maṇilarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sopānaphalake nisīditvā parodi.
anya-e0101n0:1908_4: Mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ ko guṇoti? Tumhesu, bhante,
anya-e0101n0:1908_5: idha vasantesu amanussā aññamaññaṃ mettaṃ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e0101n0:1908_6: te dāni tumhesu gatesu kalahaṃ karissanti,
anya-e0101n0:1908_8: Thero “sace mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1908_9: sundara”nti vatvā aññepi cattāro māse tattheva vasitvā puna tatheva gamanacittaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0101n0:1908_11: Etenevupāyena thero tattheva vasitvā tattheva parinibbāyīti evaṃ mettāvihārī bhikkhu amanussānaṃ piyo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1909_0: Devatā rakkhantīti puttamiva mātāpitaro devatā rakkhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1910_0: Nāssa aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamatīti mettāvihārissa kāye uttarāya upāsikāya viya aggi vā,
anya-e0101n0:1910_6: Ekā kira dhenu vacchakassa khīradhāraṃ muñcamānā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0101n0:1910_7: Eko luddako taṃ vijjhissāmīti hatthena samparivattetvā dīghadaṇḍasattiṃ muñci.
anya-e0101n0:1910_8: Sā tassā sarīraṃ āhacca tālapaṇṇaṃ viya pavaṭṭamānā gatā,
anya-e0101n0:1911_0: Tuvaṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyatīti mettāvihārino khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati,
anya-e0101n0:1912_0: Mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdatīti bandhanā pavuttaṃ tālapakkaṃ viya cassa vippasannavaṇṇaṃ mukhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1913_0: Asammūḷho kālaṅkarotīti mettāvihārino sammohamaraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0101n0:1913_1: asammūḷhova niddaṃ okkamanto viya kālaṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n0:1914_0: Uttarimappaṭivijjhantoti mettāsamāpattito uttariṃ arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ asakkonto ito cavitvā suttappabuddho viya brahmalokamupapajjatīti.
anya-e0101n0:1917_1: Karuṇaṃ bhāvetukāmena pana nikkaruṇatāya ādīnavaṃ karuṇāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā karuṇābhāvanā ārabhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1917_2: Tañca pana ārabhantena paṭhamaṃ piyapuggalādīsu na ārabhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1918_0: “Kathañca bhikkhu karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati?
anya-e0101n0:1918_1: Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṃ puggalaṃ duggataṃ durūpetaṃ disvā karuṇāyeyya,
anya-e0101n0:1918_2: evameva sabbasatte karuṇāya pharatī”ti vibhaṅge pana vuttattā sabbapaṭhamaṃ tāva kiñcideva karuṇāyitabbarūpaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1918_3: paramakicchappattaṃ duggataṃ durūpetaṃ kapaṇapurisaṃ chinnāhāraṃ kapālaṃ purato ṭhapetvā anāthasālāya
anya-e0101n0:1918_4: nisinnaṃ hatthapādehi paggharantakimigaṇaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karontaṃ disvā “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ satto āpanno,
anya-e0101n0:1918_5: appeva nāma imamhā dukkhā mucceyyā”ti karuṇā pavattetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1918_6: Taṃ alabhantena sukhitopi pāpakārī puggalo vajjhena upametvā karuṇāyitabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1919_1: Seyyathāpi saha bhaṇḍena gahitacoraṃ “vadhetha na”nti rañño āṇāya rājapurisā bandhitvā catukke catukke pahārasatāni dentā āghātanaṃ nenti.
anya-e0101n0:1919_2: Tassa manussā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi mālāgandhavilepanatambulānipi denti.
anya-e0101n0:1919_3: Kiñcāpi so tāni khādanto ceva paribhuñjanto ca sukhito bhogasamappito viya gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:1919_4: atha kho taṃ neva koci “sukhito ayaṃ mahābhogo”ti maññati,
anya-e0101n0:1919_6: yaṃ yadeva hi ayaṃ padaṃ nikkhipati,
anya-e0101n0:1919_7: tena tena santike maraṇassa hotī”ti taṃ jano karuṇāyati.
anya-e0101n0:1919_8: Evameva karuṇākammaṭṭhānikena bhikkhunā sukhitopi puggalo evaṃ karuṇāyitabbo “ayaṃ varāko kiñcāpi idāni sukhito susajjito bhoge paribhuñjati,
anya-e0101n0:1919_9: atha kho tīsu dvāresu ekenāpi katassa kalyāṇakammassa abhāvā idāni apāyesu anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedissatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:1920_0: Evaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ karuṇāyitvā tato paraṃ eteneva upāyena piyapuggale,
anya-e0101n0:1920_3: Sace panassa pubbe vuttanayeneva verimhi paṭighaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n0:1920_6: tampi ñātirogabhogabyasanādīnaṃ aññatarena byasanena samannāgataṃ disvā vā sutvā vā tesaṃ abhāvepi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1920_7: anatikkantattā “dukkhitova aya”nti evaṃ sabbathāpi karuṇāyitvā vuttanayeneva attani piyapuggale majjhatte
anya-e0101n0:1920_8: verimhīti catūsu janesu sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā taṃ nimittaṃ āsevantena bhāventena bahulīkarontena mettāya
anya-e0101n0:1921_5: tasmā vuttanayenevettha bhāvanamārabhitvā sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā appanā vaḍḍhetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1921_6: Tato paraṃ “pañcahākārehi anodhisopharaṇā sattahākārehi odhisopharaṇā dasahākārehi disāpharaṇā”ti ayaṃ vikubbanā,
anya-e0101n0:1921_7: “sukhaṃ supatī”tiādayo ānisaṃsā ca mettāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.

anya-e0101n0:1924_2: Na hi piyo piyabhāvamatteneva muditāya padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,

anya-e0101n0:1925_5: Piyapuggalaṃ vā sukhitaṃ sajjitaṃ modamānaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā “modati vatāyaṃ satto,

anya-e0101n0:1925_7: Imameva hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vibhaṅge vuttaṃ “kathañca bhikkhu muditāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati?
anya-e0101n0:1925_8: Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṃ puggalaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ disvā mudito assa,
anya-e0101n0:1926_0: Sacepissa so soṇḍasahāyo vā piyapuggalo vā atīte sukhito ahosi,
anya-e0101n0:1926_2: atītameva cassa sukhitabhāvaṃ anussaritvā “esa atīte evaṃ mahābhogo mahāparivāro niccappamudito ahosī”ti
anya-e0101n0:1926_3: tamevassa muditākāraṃ gahetvā muditā uppādetabbā “anāgate vā pana puna taṃ sampattiṃ labhitvā hatthikkhandhaassapiṭṭhisuvaṇṇasivikādīhi
anya-e0101n0:1926_4: vicarissatī”ti anāgatampissa muditākāraṃ gahetvā muditā uppādetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1927_0: Evaṃ piyapuggale muditaṃ uppādetvā atha majjhatte tato verimhīti anukkamena muditā pavattetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1927_2: Sace panassa pubbe vuttanayeneva verimhi paṭighaṃ uppajjati,

anya-e0101n0:1927_4: katvā taṃ nimittaṃ āsevantena bhāventena bahulīkarontena mettāyaṃ vuttanayeneva tikacatukkajjhānavaseneva
anya-e0101n0:1927_6: Tato paraṃ “pañcahākārehi anodhisopharaṇā sattahākārehi odhisopharaṇā dasahākārehi disāpharaṇā”ti ayaṃ vikubbanā,
anya-e0101n0:1927_7: “sukhaṃ supatī”tiādayo ānisaṃsā ca mettāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.

anya-e0101n0:1930_5: santasabhāvattā upekkhāya ānisaṃsañca disvā yvāssa pakatimajjhatto puggalo,

anya-e0101n0:1931_3: Tassevaṃ karoto pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva catutthajjhānaṃ uppajjati.

anya-e0101n0:1939_23: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissanti,

anya-e0101n0:1943_4: idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ domanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehasitaṃ domanassaṃ vipattidassanasabhāgatāya āsannapaccatthikaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:1946_1: Sabbesampi ca etesaṃ kattukāmatā chando ādi,
anya-e0101n0:1946_4: Paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto aneke vā sattā ārammaṇaṃ.

anya-e0101n0:1947_3: Tattha cittaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1947_4: Tato anukkamena tayo, cattāro, pañca, cha, satta, aṭṭha, nava, dasa,
