anya-e0101n0:1948_6: Yathā hi thambhe anussāpetvā tulāsaṅghāṭaṃ anāropetvā na sakkā ākāse kūṭagopānasiyo ṭhapetuṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1948_7: evaṃ purimesu tatiyajjhānaṃ vinā na sakkā catutthaṃ bhāvetunti.
anya-e0101n0:1949_5: abhidhamme ca kasmā appamaññāti vuttāti? Vuccate,
anya-e0101n0:1949_6: seṭṭhaṭṭhena tāva niddosabhāvena cettha brahmavihāratā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1949_7: Sattesu sammāpaṭipattibhāvena hi seṭṭhā ete vihārā.
anya-e0101n0:1949_9: evaṃ etehi sampayuttā yogino brahmasamā hutvā viharantīti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca brahmavihārāti vuccanti.
anya-e0101n0:1950_0: 269. Kasmā ca catassovātiādi pañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1955_5: Yasmā ca yathā mātā daharagilānayobbanappattasakiccapasutesu catūsu puttesu daharassa abhivuḍḍhikāmā hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1956_0: Yasmā catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1956_2: Tato evaṃ patthitahitānaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhābhibhavaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā sambhāvetvā vā dukkhāpanayanākārappavattivasena,
anya-e0101n0:1956_4: Athevaṃ patthitahitānaṃ patthitadukkhāpagamānañca nesaṃ sampattiṃ disvā sampattipamodanavasena,
anya-e0101n0:1956_6: Tato paraṃ pana kattabbābhāvato ajjhupekkhakattasaṅkhātena majjhattākārena paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1956_8: Tasmā ito hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ mettā vuttā,
anya-e0101n0:1956_9: atha karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ayaṃ kamo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1957_0: Yasmā pana sabbāpetā appamāṇe gocare pavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:1957_2: Ekasattassāpi ca ettake padese mettādayo bhāvetabbāti evaṃ pamāṇaṃ agahetvā sakalapharaṇavaseneva pavattāti.
anya-e0101n0:1962_1: Evaṃ appamāṇagocaratāya ekalakkhaṇāsu cāpi etāsu purimā tisso tikacatukkajjhānikāva honti. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n0:1962_7: Na hi sattesu majjhattākārappavattā brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattatīti.
anya-e0101n0:1963_1: Yo panevaṃ vadeyya “yasmā bhagavatā aṭṭhakanipāte catūsupi appamaññāsu avisesena vuttaṃ ‘tato tvaṃ bhikkhu
anya-e0101n0:1963_14: Tasmā byañjanacchāyāmattaṃ gahetvā mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi,
anya-e0101n0:1964_4: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti evaṃ āyācitadhammadesanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1964_5: kira taṃ bhikkhuṃ yasmā so pubbepi dhammaṃ sutvā tattheva vasati,
anya-e0101n0:1964_7: tasmā naṃ bhagavā “evameva panidhekacce moghapurisā mamaññeva ajjhesanti,
anya-e0101n0:1964_8: dhamme ca bhāsite mamaññeva anubandhitabbaṃ maññantī”ti apasādetvā puna yasmā so arahattassa upanissayasampanno,
anya-e0101n0:1964_11: ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissati susaṇṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1964_12: na cuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantīti.
anya-e0101n0:1965_0: Iminā panassa ovādena niyakajjhattavasena cittekaggatāmatto mūlasamādhi vutto.
anya-e0101n0:1965_1: Tato “ettakeneva santuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā evaṃ so eva samādhi vaḍḍhetabbo”ti dassetuṃ “yato kho te bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1965_2: na cuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0101n0:1965_3: Tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhāti.
anya-e0101n0:1965_4: Evañhi te bhikkhu sikkhitabba”nti evamassa mettāvasena bhāvanaṃ vatvā puna “yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
anya-e0101n0:1965_5: tato tvaṃ bhikkhu imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ savitakkampi savicāraṃ bhāveyyāsi…pe…
anya-e0101n0:1966_1: yadā te bhikkhu ayaṃ mūlasamādhi evaṃ mettāvasena bhāvito hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1966_2: tadā tvaṃ tāvatakenāpi tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvāva imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ aññesupi ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānāni
anya-e0101n0:1967_0: Evaṃ vatvā ca puna karuṇādiavasesabrahmavihārapubbaṅgamampissa aññesu ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānavasena
anya-e0101n0:1967_1: bhāvanaṃ kareyyāsīti dassento “yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato.
anya-e0101n0:1967_2: Tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ karuṇā me cetovimuttī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0101n0:1968_0: Evaṃ mettādipubbaṅgamaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānavasena bhāvanaṃ dassetvā puna kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1968_1: dassetuṃ “yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato,
anya-e0101n0:1968_2: tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmī”ti ādiṃ vatvā “yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito bhavissati subhāvito,
anya-e0101n0:1968_3: tato tvaṃ bhikkhu yena yeneva gagghasi,
anya-e0101n0:1968_10: phāsuññeva seyyaṃ kappessasī”ti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesi.
anya-e0101n0:1969_1: Evaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena ceva avasesaekajjhānavasena ca dvidhā ṭhitānampi etāsaṃ subhaparamādivasena aññamaññaṃ asadiso ānubhāvaviseso veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1969_2: Haliddavasanasuttasmiṃ hi etā subhaparamādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n0:1970_3: Athassa appaṭikkūlaparicayā appaṭikkūlesu parisuddhavaṇṇesu nīlādīsu cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
anya-e0101n0:1971_0: Karuṇāvihārissa pana daṇḍābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ pattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassa karuṇāya pavattisambhavato rūpe ādīnavo parividito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1971_1: Athassa parividitarūpādīnavattā pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññataraṃ ugghāṭetvā rūpanissaraṇe ākāse cittaṃ upasaṃharato
anya-e0101n0:1972_0: Muditāvihārissa pana tena tena pāmojjakāraṇena uppannapāmojjasattānaṃ viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa muditāya
anya-e0101n0:1972_2: Athassa anukkamādhigataṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ atikkamma ākāsanimittagocare viññāṇe cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva
anya-e0101n0:1972_3: tattha cittaṃ pakkhandatīti muditā viññāṇañcāyatanassa upanissayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1973_0: Upekkhāvihārissa pana “sattā sukhitā vā hontu dukkhato vā vimuccantu,
anya-e0101n0:1973_1: sampattasukhato vā mā vimuccantū”ti ābhogābhāvato sukhadukkhādiparamatthagāhavimukhabhāvato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1973_2: Athassa paramatthagāhato vimukhabhāvaparicitacittassa paramatthato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittassa ca
anya-e0101n0:1973_3: anukkamādhigataṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma sabhāvato avijjamāne paramatthabhūtassa viññāṇassa abhāve
anya-e0101n0:1973_4: cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
anya-e0101n0:1974_1: Evaṃ subhaparamādivasena etāsaṃ ānubhāvaṃ viditvā puna sabbāpetā dānādīnaṃ sabbakalyāṇadhammānaṃ paripūrikāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1974_4: sabbasattesu ca pakkhapātābhāvena samappavattacittā mahāsattā “imassa dātabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1974_5: imassa na dātabba”nti vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ denti.
anya-e0101n0:1974_10: Uttamavīriyavasena vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpi ca sattānaṃ nānappakārakaṃ aparādhaṃ khamanti.
anya-e0101n0:1974_11: “Idaṃ vo dassāma karissāmā”ti kataṃ paṭiññaṃ na visaṃvādenti.
anya-e0101n0:1974_14: Upekkhāya paccupakāraṃ nāsīsantīti evaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā yāva dasabalacatuvesārajjachaasādhāraṇañāṇaaṭṭhārasabuddhadhammappabhede
anya-e0101n0:1974_15: sabbepi kalyāṇadhamme paripūrentīti evaṃ dānādisabbakalyāṇadhammaparipūrikā etāva hontīti.
anya-e0101n0:1981_1: Brahmavihārānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhesu pana catūsu āruppesu ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ tāva bhāvetukāmo “dissante kho
anya-e0101n0:1981_4: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya rūpānaṃyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti vacanato etesaṃ daṇḍādānādīnañceva
anya-e0101n0:1981_5: cakkhusotarogādīnañca ābādhasahassānaṃ vasena karajarūpe ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa samatikkamāya ṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n0:1981_6: paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasu pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarasmiṃ catutthajjhānaṃ uppādeti.
anya-e0101n0:1982_0: Tassa kiñcāpi rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānavasena karajarūpaṃ atikkantaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1982_3: Yathā ahibhīruko puriso araññe sappena anubaddho vegena palāyitvā palātaṭṭhāne lekhācittaṃ tālapaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1982_4: vā valliṃ vā rajjuṃ vā phalitāya vā pana pathaviyā phalitantaraṃ disvā bhāyateva uttasateva,
anya-e0101n0:1982_6: Yathā ca anatthakārinā veripurisena saddhiṃ ekagāme vasamāno puriso tena vadhabandhagehajhāpanādīhi upadduto
anya-e0101n0:1982_7: aññaṃ gāmaṃ vasanatthāya gantvā tatrāpi verinā samānarūpasaddasamudācāraṃ purisaṃ disvā bhāyateva uttasateva,
anya-e0101n0:1983_1: tesaṃ hi purisānaṃ ahinā verinā vā upaddutakālo viya bhikkhuno ārammaṇavasena karajarūpasamaṅgikālo.
anya-e0101n0:1983_2: Tesaṃ vegena palāyanaaññagāmagamanāni viya bhikkhuno rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānavasena karajarūpasamatikkamanakālo.
anya-e0101n0:1983_3: Tesaṃ palātaṭṭhāne ca aññagāme ca lekhācittatālapaṇṇādīni ceva verisadisaṃ purisañca disvā bhayasantāsaadassanakāmatā
anya-e0101n0:1983_4: viya bhikkhuno kasiṇarūpampi tappaṭibhāgameva idanti sallakkhetvā tampi samatikkamitukāmatā.
anya-e0101n0:1984_1: Evaṃ so tasmā catutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtā kasiṇarūpā nibbijja pakkamitukāmo pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasī
anya-e0101n0:1984_2: hutvā paguṇarūpāvacaracatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya tasmiṃ jhāne “imaṃ mayā nibbiṇṇaṃ rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotī”ti ca,
anya-e0101n0:1985_0: So tattha evaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā nikantiṃ pariyādāya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ santato anantato manasikaritvā cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ
anya-e0101n0:1985_1: vā yattakaṃ icchati tattakaṃ vā kasiṇaṃ pattharitvā tena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti vā,
anya-e0101n0:1985_3: Ugghāṭento hi neva kilañjaṃ viya saṃvelleti,
anya-e0101n0:1985_8: anāvajjento amanasikaronto apaccavekkhanto ca aññadatthu tena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasikaronto kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭeti nāma.
anya-e0101n0:1985_9: Kasiṇampi ugghāṭiyamānaṃ neva ubbaṭṭati na vivaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n0:1985_10: kevalaṃ imassa amanasikārañca “ākāso ākāso”ti manasikārañca paṭicca ugghāṭitaṃ nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1985_12: Kasiṇugghāṭimākāsanti vā kasiṇaphuṭṭhokāsoti vā kasiṇavivittākāsanti vā sabbametaṃ ekameva.
anya-e0101n0:1986_0: So taṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsanimittaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti punappunaṃ āvajjeti,
anya-e0101n0:1986_2: Tassevaṃ punappunaṃ āvajjayato takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karoto nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti,
anya-e0101n0:1986_5: So taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ āsevati, bhāveti,
anya-e0101n0:1986_7: Tassevaṃ punappunaṃ āvajjayato manasikaroto pathavīkasiṇādīsu rūpāvacaracittaṃ viya ākāse ākāsānañcāyatanacittaṃ appeti.
anya-e0101n0:1986_8: Idhāpi hi purimabhāge tīṇi cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti.
anya-e0101n0:1987_1: evaṃ uppanne arūpāvacaracitte so bhikkhu yathā nāma yānapputoḷi kumbhimukhādīnaṃ aññataraṃ nīlapilotikāya
anya-e0101n0:1987_2: vā pītalohitodātādīnaṃ vā aññatarāya pilotikāya bandhitvā pekkhamāno puriso vātavegena vā aññena vā kenaci
anya-e0101n0:1987_4: evameva pubbe kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ jhānacakkhunā pekkhamāno viharitvā “ākāso ākāso”ti iminā parikammamanasikārena
anya-e0101n0:1987_5: sahasā apanīte tasmiṃ nimitte ākāsaññeva pekkhamāno viharati.
anya-e0101n0:1987_6: Ettāvatā cesa “sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā
anya-e0101n0:1988_4: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi rūpanti vuccati “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu,
anya-e0101n0:1988_6: tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1988_13: etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena navannaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā
anya-e0101n0:1988_14: virāgā ca nirodhā ca virāgahetuñceva nirodhahetuñca ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0101n0:1988_15: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena etaṃ upasampajja viharitunti.
anya-e0101n0:1989_0: Tattha yasmā ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hoti,
anya-e0101n0:1989_1: samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1989_3: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1989_5: Imā rūpasaññāyo atikkanto hoti vītikkanto samatikkanto.
anya-e0101n0:1989_6: Tena vuccati sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge saññānaṃyeva samatikkamo vutto.
anya-e0101n0:1989_7: Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā etā samāpattiyo,
anya-e0101n0:1989_9: Tasmā ayaṃ ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:1990_1: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena samuppannā saññā paṭighasaññā.
anya-e0101n0:1990_7: akusalavipākānaṃ pañcannanti sabbaso dasannampi paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā appavattiṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:1991_1: Na hi tasmiṃ samaye pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n0:1991_2: Evaṃ santepi aññattha pahīnānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne viya,
anya-e0101n0:1991_3: sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ tatiyamagge viya ca imasmiṃ jhāne ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsamettha vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1992_0: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacaraṃ samāpannassāpi na santi,
anya-e0101n0:1992_1: atha kho na pahīnattā na santi.
anya-e0101n0:1992_5: Tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:1992_8: Tāsañhi ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo “kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
anya-e0101n0:1992_9: Idha ca pahīnattāyeva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjatā santavimokkhatā ca vuttā.
anya-e0101n0:1992_10: Āḷāro ca kālāmo arūpasamāpanno pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya atikkamantāni neva addasa,
anya-e0101n0:1993_1: Nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti nānatte vā gocare pavattānaṃ saññānaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1993_4: Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1993_5: imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā vuttā idha adhippetā asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā
anya-e0101n0:1993_6: saññā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti,
anya-e0101n0:1993_11: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ asadisā,
anya-e0101n0:1993_13: Tāsaṃ sabbaso nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇā.
anya-e0101n0:1994_0: Yasmā cettha purimā rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbatte bhavepi na vijjanti.
anya-e0101n0:1994_1: Pageva tasmiṃ bhave imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharaṇakāle,
anya-e0101n0:1994_2: tasmā tāsaṃ samatikkamā atthaṅgamāti dvedhāpi abhāvoyeva vutto.
anya-e0101n0:1994_5: dasākusalasaññāti imā sattavīsatisaññā iminā jhānena nibbatte bhave vijjanti,
anya-e0101n0:1994_7: Tatrāpi hi imaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanto tāsaṃ amanasikārāyeva upasampajja viharati,
anya-e0101n0:1995_0: Saṅkhepato cettha rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamāti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1995_1: Paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārāti iminā sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānaṃ pahānañca amanasikāro ca vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n0:1996_1: Ananto ākāsoti ettha nāssa uppādanto vā vayanto vā paññāyatīti ananto.
anya-e0101n0:1996_4: Teneva vibhaṅge vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ ākāse cittaṃ ṭhapeti,
anya-e0101n0:1997_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharatīti ettha pana nāssa antoti anantaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:1997_3: taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa devānaṃ devāyatanamivāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:1998_0: Upasampajja viharatīti tamākāsānañcāyatanaṃ patvā nipphādetvā tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena viharatīti.
anya-e0101n0:2001_1: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ bhāvetukāmena pana pañcahākārehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ ciṇṇavasībhāvena “āsannarūpāvacarajjhānapaccatthikā ayaṃ samāpatti,
anya-e0101n0:2001_2: no ca viññāṇañcāyatanamiva santā”ti ākāsānañcāyatane ādīnavaṃ disvā tattha nikantiṃ pariyādāya viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ
anya-e0101n0:2001_3: santato manasikaritvā taṃ ākāsaṃ pharitvā pavattaviññāṇaṃ “viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa”nti punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2002_0: Tassevaṃ tasmiṃ nimitte punappunaṃ cittaṃ cārentassa nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2002_3: So taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ āsevati, bhāveti,
anya-e0101n0:2002_5: Tassevaṃ karoto ākāse ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viya ākāsaphuṭe viññāṇe viññāṇañcāyatanacittaṃ appeti.
anya-e0101n0:2002_7: Ettāvatā cesa “sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:2003_2: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammāti ettha pana pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ,

anya-e0101n0:2071_0: Tato gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādentena viya nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā vaṇacoḷakaṃ bandhantena viya kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
anya-e0101n0:2071_1: aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ paṭicchādentena viya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhesajjakapālaṃ nīharantena viya pattaṃ nīharitvā
anya-e0101n0:2071_5: gandhopi nesaṃ ghānaṃ paṭihanamāno adhivāsetabbo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2071_6: Tato gāmadvāre ṭhatvā caṇḍahatthiassādiparissayaparivajjanatthaṃ gāmaracchā oloketabbā honti.
anya-e0101n0:2072_0: Iccetaṃ paccattharaṇādianekakuṇapapariyosānaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ āhārahetu akkamitabbañca daṭṭhabbañca ghāyitabbañca hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2072_1: Aho vata bho paṭikkūlo āhāroti evaṃ gamanato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2073_2: Evaṃ gamanapaṭikkūlaṃ adhivāsetvāpi gāmaṃ paviṭṭhena saṅghāṭipārutena kapaṇamanussena viya kapālahatthena gharapaṭipāṭiyā gāmavīthīsu caritabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2073_3: Yattha vassakāle akkantaakkantaṭṭhāne yāva piṇḍikamaṃsāpi udakacikkhalle pādā pavisanti,
anya-e0101n0:2073_6: Gimhakāle vātavegena samuṭṭhitehi paṃsutiṇarajehi okiṇṇasarīrena caritabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2073_8: sammissāni kimikulākulāni nīlamakkhikaparikiṇṇāni oḷigallāni ceva candanikaṭṭhānāni ca daṭṭhabbāni honti
anya-e0101n0:2073_10: Yato tā makkhikā uṭṭhahitvā saṅghāṭiyampi pattepi sīsepi nilīyanti.
anya-e0101n0:2074_2: Dadamānāpi ekacce hiyyo pakkabhattampi purāṇakhajjakampi pūtikummāsapūpādīnipi dadanti.
anya-e0101n0:2074_5: keci pana apassamānā viya tuṇhī honti,
anya-e0101n0:2074_9: Evaṃ kapaṇamanussena viya gāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhamitabbanti.
anya-e0101n0:2075_0: Iccetaṃ gāmappavesanato paṭṭhāya yāva nikkhamanā udakacikkhallādipaṭikkūlaṃ āhārahetu akkamitabbañceva daṭṭhabbañca adhivāsetabbañca hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2075_1: Aho vata bho paṭikkūlo āhāroti evaṃ pariyesanato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2076_2: Evaṃ pariyiṭṭhāhārena pana bahigāme phāsukaṭṭhāne sukhanisinnena yāva tattha hatthaṃ na otāreti,
anya-e0101n0:2076_3: tāva tathārūpaṃ garuṭṭhāniyaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā lajjimanussaṃ vā disvā nimantetumpi sakkā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2076_4: Bhuñjitukāmatāya panettha hatthe otāritamatte “gaṇhathā”ti vadantena lajjitabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2076_5: Hatthaṃ pana otāretvā maddantassa pañcaṅgulianusārena sedo paggharamāno sukkhathaddhabhattampi temento muduṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n0:2077_0: Atha tasmiṃ parimaddanamattenāpi sambhinnasobhe ālopaṃ katvā mukhe ṭhapite heṭṭhimadantā udukkhalakiccaṃ sādhenti,
anya-e0101n0:2077_3: Taṃ tattha suvānadoṇiyaṃ suvānapiṇḍamiva dantamusalehi koṭṭetvā jivhāya samparivattiyamānaṃ jivhāgge tanupasannakheḷo makkheti,
anya-e0101n0:2077_6: So evaṃ vicuṇṇitamakkhito taṅkhaṇaññeva antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitasuvānavamathu viya paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2077_7: Evarūpopi samāno cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti evaṃ paribhogato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2078_2: Evaṃ paribhogaṃ upagato ca panesa anto pavisamāno yasmā buddhapaccekabuddhānampi raññopi cakkavattissa
anya-e0101n0:2078_12: tassa rajanamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2079_2: So imesu catūsu āsayesu aññatarena āsayena makkhito antoudaraṃ pavisitvā neva suvaṇṇabhājane na maṇirajatādibhājanesu nidhānaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2079_3: Sace pana dasavassikena ajjhohariyati dasa vassāni adhotavaccakūpasadise okāse patiṭṭhahati.
anya-e0101n0:2079_8: Vassasataṃ adhotavaccakūpasadise okāse patiṭṭhahatīti evaṃ nidhānato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2080_2: So panāyamāhāro evarūpe okāse nidhānamupagato yāva aparipakko hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2080_3: tāva tasmiññeva yathāvuttappakāre paramandhakāratimise nānākuṇapagandhavāsitapavanavicarite atiduggandhajegucche
anya-e0101n0:2080_4: padese yathā nāma nidāghe akālameghena abhivuṭṭhamhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe patitāni tiṇapaṇṇakilañjakhaṇḍaahikukkuramanussakuṇapādīni
anya-e0101n0:2080_6: evameva taṃdivasampi hiyyopi tato purime divasepi ajjhohato sabbo ekato hutvā semhapaṭalapariyonaddho
anya-e0101n0:2081_2: So tattakāyagginā paripakko samāno na suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādibhāvaṃ upagacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2081_3: Pheṇapupphuḷake pana muñcanto saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ pisitvā nāḷike pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakkāsayaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2081_4: muttabhāvaṃ upagantvā muttavatthiñca pūretīti evaṃ paripakkato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2082_2: Sammā paripaccamāno ca panāyaṃ kesalomanakhadantādīni nānākuṇapāni nipphādeti asammāparipaccamāno daddukaṇḍukacchukuṭṭhakilāsasosakāsātisārappabhutīni
anya-e0101n0:2082_4: idamassa phalanti evaṃ phalato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2083_2: Ajjhohariyamāno cesa ekena dvārena pavisitvā nissandamāno akkhimhā akkhigūthako kaṇṇamhā kaṇṇagūthakotiādinā pakārena anekehi dvārehi nissandati.
anya-e0101n0:2083_4: Nissandanasamaye pana uccārapassāvādibhāvaṃ upagato ekakeneva nīhariyati.
anya-e0101n0:2083_5: Paṭhamadivase ca naṃ paribhuñjanto haṭṭhapahaṭṭhopi hoti udaggudaggo pītisomanassajāto.
anya-e0101n0:2083_6: Dutiyadivase nissandento pihitanāsiko hoti vikuṇitamukho jegucchī maṅkubhūto.
anya-e0101n0:2083_7: Paṭhamadivase ca naṃ ratto giddho gadhito mucchitopi ajjhoharitvā dutiyadivase ekarattivāsena viratto aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno nīharati.
anya-e0101n0:2093_4: yāni dhotānipi gandhaharaṇatthaṃ punappunaṃ dhovitabbāni honti.
anya-e0101n0:2093_5: Paribhutto samāno yathā nāma odane paccamāne thusakaṇakuṇḍakādīni uttaritvā ukkhalimukhavaṭṭipidhāniyo makkhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2093_6: evameva sakalasarīrānugatena kāyagginā pheṇuddehakaṃ paccitvā uttaramāno dante dantamalabhāvena sammakkheti.
anya-e0101n0:2093_9: Yena sammakkhitāni imāni dvārāni divase divase dhoviyamānānipi neva sucīni,
anya-e0101n0:2093_11: Yesu ekaccaṃ dhovitvā hattho puna udakena dhovitabbo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2093_12: Ekaccaṃ dhovitvā dvattikkhattuṃ gomayenapi mattikāyapi gandhacuṇṇenapi dhovato pāṭikulyatā vigacchatīti
anya-e0101n0:2094_1: Tassevaṃ dasahākārehi paṭikkūlataṃ paccavekkhato takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena kabaḷīkārāhāro pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2094_2: So taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
anya-e0101n0:2094_4: Kabaḷīkārāhārassa sabhāvadhammatāya gambhīrattā appanaṃ appattena upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati.
anya-e0101n0:2094_6: Tasmā imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā icceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2095_0: Imañca pana āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno rasataṇhāya cittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n0:2095_1: So kantāranittharaṇatthiko viya puttamaṃsaṃ vigatamado āhāraṃ āhāreti yāvadeva dukkhassa nittharaṇatthāya.
anya-e0101n0:2095_2: Athassa appakasireneva kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2095_6: Imaṃ pana paṭipattiṃ nissāya diṭṭheva dhamme amatapariyosānataṃ anabhisambhuṇanto sugatiparāyano hotīti.
anya-e0101n0:2098_1: Idāni āhāre paṭikkūlasaññānantaraṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto.
anya-e0101n0:2098_7: Tayidaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca.
anya-e0101n0:2098_9: Vitthārato mahāhatthipadūpame rāhulovāde dhātuvibhaṅge ca. Tañhi –
anya-e0101n0:2099_2: dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṃ vadhitvā catumahāpathe bilaso vibhajitvā nisinno assa,
anya-e0101n0:2099_5: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati,
anya-e0101n0:2099_6: atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti –
anya-e0101n0:2100_0: Evaṃ tikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena mahāsatipaṭṭhāne saṅkhepato āgataṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2101_1: yathā cheko goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ vadhitvā vinivijjhitvā catasso
anya-e0101n0:2101_2: disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa,
anya-e0101n0:2101_3: evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2101_4: Yathāṭhitattāva yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu…pe…
anya-e0101n0:2102_1: Yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassapi āghātanaṃ āharantassapi āharitvā tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassapi
anya-e0101n0:2102_2: vadhantassapi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassapi tāvadeva gāvītisaññā na antaradhāyati,
anya-e0101n0:2102_3: yāva naṃ padāletvā bilaso na vibhajati.
anya-e0101n0:2102_10: evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle gihibhūtassapi pabbajitassapi tāvadeva sattoti vā posoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
anya-e0101n0:2102_11: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
anya-e0101n0:2103_4: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2103_8: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ upādinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2104_2: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ āpo āpogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2104_5: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ āpo āpogataṃ upādinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2105_2: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2105_7: yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:2105_8: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ upādinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2106_2: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2106_10: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ upādinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2107_0: Evaṃ nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgataṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2108_1: ajjhattaṃ paccattanti idaṃ tāva ubhayampi niyakassa adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2108_2: Niyakaṃ nāma attani jātaṃ sasantānapariyāpannanti attho.
anya-e0101n0:2108_3: Tayidaṃ yathā loke itthīsu kathā adhitthīti vuccati,
anya-e0101n0:2108_5: attānaṃ paṭicca paṭicca pavattattā paccattantipi vuccati.
anya-e0101n0:2108_19: Ettha ca matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2108_20: Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātu saṅgahitā.
anya-e0101n0:2109_0: Vissandanabhāvena taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ appotīti āpo.
anya-e0101n0:2109_1: Kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena nānāvidhesu āpesu gatanti āpogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
anya-e0101n0:2110_1: vuttanayeneva tejesu gatanti tejogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
anya-e0101n0:2110_3: Yena cāti yena tejodhātugatena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo santappati,
anya-e0101n0:2110_5: Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati,
anya-e0101n0:2110_7: Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati.
anya-e0101n0:2110_8: So ca puggalo “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti kandanto satadhotasappigosīsacandanādilepañceva tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati.
anya-e0101n0:2110_9: Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti yenetaṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi pītaṃ vā pānakādi
anya-e0101n0:2110_10: khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi sāyitaṃ vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0101n0:2111_1: vuttanayeneva vāyesu gatanti vāyogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
anya-e0101n0:2111_7: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā vātā.
anya-e0101n0:2111_12: Sabbattha yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti iminā padena avasesakoṭṭhāsesu āpodhātuādayo saṅgahitā.
anya-e0101n0:2112_3: chahi vāyodhātūti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi catasso dhātuyo vitthāritā hontīti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n0:2113_1: Bhāvanānaye panettha tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno kesā pathavīdhātu,
anya-e0101n0:2113_2: lomā pathavīdhātūti evaṃ vitthārato dhātupariggaho papañcato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:2113_10: ayaṃ vāyodhātūti evaṃ manasikaroto panassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2113_11: Nātitikkhapaññassa pana evaṃ manasikaroto andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_1: Yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsu bahupeyyālaṃ tantiṃ sajjhāyantesu tikkhapañño bhikkhu sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā peyyālamukhaṃ
anya-e0101n0:2114_2: vitthāretvā tato paraṃ ubhatokoṭivaseneva sajjhāyaṃ karonto gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2114_3: Tatra nātitikkhapañño evaṃ vattā hoti “kiṃ sajjhāyo nāmesa oṭṭhapariyāhatamattaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
anya-e0101n0:2114_4: evaṃ sajjhāye kariyamāne kadā tanti paguṇā bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_5: So āgatāgataṃ peyyālamukhaṃ vitthāretvāva sajjhāyaṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_7: “kiṃ sajjhāyo nāmesa pariyosānaṃ gantuṃ na deti,
anya-e0101n0:2114_8: evaṃ sajjhāye kariyamāne kadā tanti pariyosānaṃ gamissatī”ti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_9: Evameva tikkhapaññassa kesādivasena vitthārato dhātupariggaho papañcato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_11: ayaṃ pathavīdhātūtiādinā nayena saṅkhepato manasikaroto kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2114_12: Itarassa tathā manasikaroto andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2115_0: Tasmā imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena tikkhapaññena tāva rahogatena paṭisallīnena sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ
anya-e0101n0:2115_1: āvajjetvā yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0101n0:2115_8: ayaṃ vāyodhātūti evaṃ saṃkhittena dhātuyo pariggahetvā punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dhātumattato
anya-e0101n0:2115_10: Tassevaṃ vāyamamānassa nacireneva dhātuppabhedāvabhāsanapaññāpariggahito sabhāvadhammārammaṇattā appanaṃ appatto upacāramatto samādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2116_0: Atha vā pana ye ime catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissattabhāvadassanatthaṃ dhammasenāpatinā “aṭṭhiñca paṭicca
anya-e0101n0:2116_1: nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti cattāro
anya-e0101n0:2116_3: Tesu taṃ taṃ antarānusārinā ñāṇahatthena vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā yo etesu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0101n0:2116_4: ayaṃ pathavīdhātūti purimanayeneva dhātuyo pariggahetvā punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dhātumattato
anya-e0101n0:2116_6: Tassevaṃ vāyamamānassa nacireneva dhātuppabhedāvabhāsanapaññāpariggahito sabhāvadhammārammaṇattā appanaṃ appatto upacāramatto samādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2117_2: Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena hi nātitikkhapaññena yoginā ācariyasantike dvācattālīsāya ākārehi vitthārato
anya-e0101n0:2117_3: dhātuyo uggaṇhitvā vuttappakāre senāsane viharantena katasabbakiccena rahogatena paṭisallīnena sasambhārasaṅkhepato,
anya-e0101n0:2118_1: Idha bhikkhu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākāraṃ pathavīdhātūti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n0:2118_2: Dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu yūsagataṃ udakasaṅkhātaṃ ābandhanākāraṃ āpodhātūti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n0:2118_3: Catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanakaṃ tejaṃ tejodhātūti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n0:2118_6: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2119_1: Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:2119_3: Tena hi bhikkhunā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaniddese sattadhā uggahakosallaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallañca vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2119_4: Dvattiṃsākāre tāva taṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā tacapañcakādīnaṃ anulomapaṭilomato vacasā sajjhāyaṃ ādiṃkatvā sabbaṃ tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2119_6: tattha vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena kesādayo manasikaritvāpi paṭikkūlavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n0:2119_8: Tasmā vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā pañcadhā kesādayo manasikaritvā avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:2120_2: Tattha yathāvammikamatthake jātesu kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2120_3: napi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jānanti mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2120_4: evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti mayi kesā jātāti,
anya-e0101n0:2120_5: napi kesā jānanti mayaṃ sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanacamme jātāti,
anya-e0101n0:2120_7: Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2121_2: Tattha yathā suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabbatiṇakesu na suññagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti mayi dabbatiṇakāni jātānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2121_3: napi dabbatiṇakāni jānanti mayaṃ suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2121_4: evameva na sarīraveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti mayi lomā jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2121_5: Napi lomā jānanti mayaṃ sarīraveṭhanacamme jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2121_7: Iti lomā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2122_2: Tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike vijjhitvā kīḷantesu na daṇḍakā jānanti amhesu madhukaṭṭhikā ṭhapitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2122_3: napi madhukaṭṭhikā jānanti mayaṃ daṇḍakesu ṭhapitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2122_4: evameva na aṅguliyo jānanti amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2122_5: Napi nakhā jānanti mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2122_7: Iti nakhā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2123_2: Tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇaudukkhalakesu kenacideva silesajātena bandhitvā ṭhapitathambhesu na udukkhalā jānanti amhesu thambhā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2123_3: Napi thambhā jānanti mayaṃ udukkhalesu ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2123_4: evameva na hanukaṭṭhīni jānanti amhesu dantā jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2123_5: Napi dantā jānanti mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhīsu jātāti.
anya-e0101n0:2123_7: Iti dantā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2124_2: Tattha yathā allagocammapariyonaddhāya mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti ahaṃ allagocammena pariyonaddhāti.
anya-e0101n0:2124_3: Napi allagocammaṃ jānāti mayā mahāvīṇā pariyonaddhāti,
anya-e0101n0:2124_4: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddhanti.
anya-e0101n0:2124_5: Napi taco jānāti mayā sarīraṃ pariyonaddhanti.
anya-e0101n0:2124_7: Iti taco nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2125_2: Tattha yathā mahāmattikalittāya bhittiyā na bhitti jānāti ahaṃ mahāmattikāya littāti.
anya-e0101n0:2125_3: Napi mahāmattikā jānāti mayā bhitti littāti,
anya-e0101n0:2125_4: evameva na aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo jānāti ahaṃ navapesisatappabhedena maṃsena littoti.
anya-e0101n0:2125_5: Napi maṃsaṃ jānāti mayā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo littoti.
anya-e0101n0:2125_7: Iti maṃsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2126_2: Tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti mayaṃ vallīhi vinaddhānīti.
anya-e0101n0:2126_3: Napi valliyo jānanti amhehi kuṭṭadārūni vinaddhānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2126_4: evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānīti.
anya-e0101n0:2126_5: Napi nhārū jānanti amhehi aṭṭhīni ābaddhānīti.
anya-e0101n0:2126_7: Iti nhāru nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakadārugomayādisañcayesu na heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā jānanti mayaṃ uparime uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_1: Napi uparimā uparimā jānanti mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu patiṭṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2128_2: evameva na paṇhikaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_3: Na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_4: Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_5: Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_6: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_7: Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_8: Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_9: Na sīsaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_10: Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_11: Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_12: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ ūruṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_13: Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_14: Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_15: Na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ paṇhikaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2128_17: Iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2129_1: Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2129_2: Tattha yathā veḷupabbādīnaṃ anto pakkhittachinnavettaggādīsu na veḷupabbādīni jānanti amhesu vettaggādīni pakkhittānīti.
anya-e0101n0:2129_3: Napi vettaggādīni jānanti mayaṃ veḷupabbādīsu ṭhitānīti,
anya-e0101n0:2129_4: evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti amhākaṃ anto miñjaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2129_5: Nāpi miñjaṃ jānāti ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ anto ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2129_7: Iti aṭṭhimiñjaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2130_1: Vakkaṃ galavāṭakato nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2130_2: Tattha yathā vaṇṭupanibaddhe ambaphaladvaye na vaṇṭaṃ jānāti mayā ambaphaladvayaṃ upanibaddhanti.
anya-e0101n0:2130_3: Napi ambaphaladvayaṃ jānāti ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2130_4: evameva na thūlanhāru jānāti mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddhanti.
anya-e0101n0:2130_5: Napi vakkaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddhanti.
anya-e0101n0:2130_7: Iti vakkaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2131_2: Tattha yathā jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na sandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya maṃsapesi ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2131_3: Napi maṃsapesi jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2131_4: evameva na uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya hadayaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2131_5: Napi hadayaṃ jānāti ahaṃ uraṭṭhipañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2131_7: Iti hadayaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2132_1: Yakanaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2132_2: Tattha yathā ukkhalikapālapassamhi lagge yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe na ukkhalikapālapassaṃ jānāti mayi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo laggoti.
anya-e0101n0:2132_3: Napi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo jānāti ahaṃ ukkhalikapālapasse laggoti,
anya-e0101n0:2132_4: evameva na thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2132_5: Napi yakanaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2132_7: Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2133_1: Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2133_2: Appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2133_3: Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2133_4: Napi pilotikā jānāti mayā maṃsaṃ paliveṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2133_5: evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kilomakena paṭicchannanti.
anya-e0101n0:2133_6: Napi kilomakaṃ jānāti mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ paṭicchannanti.
anya-e0101n0:2133_8: Iti kilomakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2134_1: Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2134_2: Tattha yathā koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ jānāti gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2134_3: Napi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ahaṃ koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2134_4: evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2134_5: Napi pihakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2134_7: Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2135_1: Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānamantare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2135_2: Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi sakuṇakulāvako lambamāno ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2135_3: Napi sakuṇakulāvako jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno ṭhitoti,
anya-e0101n0:2135_4: evameva na taṃ sarīrabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi papphāsaṃ lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2135_5: Napi papphāsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ evarūpe sarīrabbhantare lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2135_7: Iti papphāsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2136_2: Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhammanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti mayi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2136_3: Napi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ jānāti ahaṃ lohitadoṇiyā ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2136_4: evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi antaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2136_5: Napi antaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2136_7: Iti antaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2137_2: Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti rajjukā maṃ sibbitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2137_3: Napi rajjukā jānanti mayaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2137_4: evameva na antaṃ jānāti antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2137_5: Napi antaguṇaṃ jānāti ahaṃ antaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2137_7: Iti antaguṇaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2138_2: Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite suvānavamathumhi na suvānadoṇi jānāti mayi suvānavamathu ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2138_3: Napi suvānavamathu jānāti ahaṃ suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitoti,
anya-e0101n0:2138_4: evameva na udaraṃ jānāti mayi udariyaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2138_5: Napi udariyaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udare ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2138_7: Iti udariyaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2139_2: Tattha yathā veḷupabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇhapaṇḍumattikāya na veḷupabbaṃ jānāti mayi paṇḍumattikā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2139_3: Napi paṇḍumattikā jānāti ahaṃ veḷupabbe ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2139_4: evameva na pakkāsayo jānāti mayi karīsaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2139_5: Napi karīsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pakkāsaye ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2139_7: Iti karīsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2140_2: Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2140_3: Napi piṭṭhapiṇḍi jānāti ahaṃ lābukaṭāhe ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2140_4: evameva na sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi matthaluṅgaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2140_5: Napi matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2140_7: Iti matthaluṅgaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_1: Pittesu abaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2141_3: Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na pūvaṃ jānāti telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_4: Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2141_5: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_6: Napi abaddhapittaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_7: Yathā vassodakena puṇṇe kosātakikosake na kosātakikosako jānāti mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_8: Napi vassodakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kosātakikosake ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2141_9: evameva na pittakosako jānāti mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_10: Napi baddhapittaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2141_12: Iti pittaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2142_2: Tattha yathā upari sañjātapheṇapaṭalāya candanikāya na candanikā jānāti mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2142_3: Napi pheṇapaṭalaṃ jānāti ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2142_4: evameva na udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti mayi semhaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2142_5: Napi semhaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2142_7: Iti semhaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2143_1: Pubbo anibaddhokāso yattha yattheva khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
anya-e0101n0:2143_4: Tattha yathā pharasuppahārādivasena paggharitaniyyāse rukkhe na rukkhassa pahārādippadesā jānanti amhesu niyyāso ṭhitoti,
anya-e0101n0:2143_5: napi niyyāso jānāti ahaṃ rukkhassa pahārādippadesesu ṭhitoti,
anya-e0101n0:2143_6: evameva na sarīrassa khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadesā jānanti amhesu pubbo ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2143_7: Napi pubbo jānāti ahaṃ tesu padesesu ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2143_9: Iti pubbo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2144_1: Lohitesu saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ pittaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2144_2: Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapatthapūramattaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2144_4: Itaraṃ pana yathā jajjarakapāle ovaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāne na leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni jānanti mayaṃ udakena temiyamānāti.
anya-e0101n0:2144_5: Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememīti,
anya-e0101n0:2144_6: evameva na yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkādīni vā jānanti mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ amhe vā temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2144_7: Napi lohitaṃ jānāti ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā vakkādīni temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2144_9: Iti lohitaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2145_1: Sedo aggisantāpādikālesu kesalomakūpavivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ceva paggharati ca.
anya-e0101n0:2145_2: Tattha yathā udakā abbūḷhamattesu bhisamuḷālakumudanāḷakalāpesu na bhisādikalāpavivarāni jānanti amhehi udakaṃ paggharatīti.
anya-e0101n0:2145_3: Napi bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharāmīti,
anya-e0101n0:2145_4: evameva na kesalomakūpavivarāni jānanti amhehi sedo paggharatīti.
anya-e0101n0:2145_5: Napi sedo jānāti ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi paggharāmīti.
anya-e0101n0:2145_7: Iti sedo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2146_1: Medo thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho.
anya-e0101n0:2146_2: Tattha yathā haliddipilotikapaṭicchanne maṃsapuñje na maṃsapuñjo jānāti maṃ nissāya haliddipilotikā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2146_3: Napi haliddipilotikā jānāti ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n0:2146_4: evameva na sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya medo ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2146_5: Napi medo jānāti ahaṃ sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2146_7: Iti medo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto patthinnayūso ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2147_1: Assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n0:2147_2: Tattha yathā udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu na taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakā jānanti amhesu udakaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2147_3: Napi taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2147_4: evameva na akkhikūpakā jānanti amhesu assu ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2147_5: Napi assu jānāti ahaṃ akkhikūpakesu ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2147_7: Iti assu nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2148_2: Tattha yathā pakkhittatele ācāme na ācāmo jānāti maṃ telaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2148_3: Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ ācāmaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2148_4: evameva na hatthatalādippadeso jānāti maṃ vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2148_5: Napi vasā jānāti ahaṃ hatthatalādippadesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2148_7: Iti vasā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2149_1: Kheḷo tathārūpe kheḷuppattipaccaye sati ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n0:2149_2: Tattha yathā abbocchinnaudakanissande nadītīrakūpake na kūpatalaṃ jānāti mayi udakaṃ santiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0101n0:2149_3: Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kūpatale santiṭṭhāmīti,
anya-e0101n0:2149_4: evameva na jivhātalaṃ jānāti mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2149_5: Napi kheḷo jānāti ahaṃ ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2149_7: Iti kheḷo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2150_2: tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n0:2150_3: Tattha yathā pūtidadhibharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti mayi pūtidadhi ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2150_4: Napi pūtidadhi jānāti ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2150_5: evameva na nāsāpuṭā jānanti amhesu siṅghāṇikā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2150_6: Napi siṅghāṇikā jānāti ahaṃ nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2150_8: Iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2151_1: Lasikā aṭṭhikasandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīsu ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n0:2151_2: Tattha yathā telabbhañjite akkhe na akkho jānāti maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2151_3: Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n0:2151_4: evameva na asītisatasandhayo jānanti lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2151_5: Napi lasikā jānāti ahaṃ asītisatasandhayo abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n0:2151_7: Iti lasikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2152_2: Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti mayi candanikāraso ṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n0:2152_3: Napi candanikāraso jānāti ahaṃ ravaṇaghaṭe ṭhitoti,
anya-e0101n0:2152_4: evameva na vatthi jānāti mayi muttaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2152_5: Napi muttaṃ jānāti ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n0:2152_7: Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2153_1: Evaṃ kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā yena santappati,
anya-e0101n0:2153_2: ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti,
anya-e0101n0:2153_6: ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti evaṃ tejokoṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n0:2154_1: Tato uddhaṅgame vāte uddhaṅgamavasena pariggahetvā adhogame adhogamavasena,
anya-e0101n0:2154_5: assāsapassāse assāsapassāsavasena pariggahetvā uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
anya-e0101n0:2154_6: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātūti,
anya-e0101n0:2154_11: assāsapassāsā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro
anya-e0101n0:2154_14: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2155_1: Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:2158_5: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2159_1: Yassa pana evampi bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati,
anya-e0101n0:2159_3: Pubbe vuttanayeneva kesādayo pariggahetvā kesamhi thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n0:2159_7: Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse catasso catasso dhātuyo vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2159_9: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2160_0: Apica kho pana vacanatthato, kalāpato, cuṇṇato,
anya-e0101n0:2161_5: Avisesena pana salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhādānato dukkhādhānato ca dhātūti.
anya-e0101n0:2162_1: Kalāpatoti yā ayaṃ kesā lomātiādinā nayena vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu,
anya-e0101n0:2162_2: pittaṃ semhanti ca ādinā nayena dvādasahākārehi āpodhātu niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0101n0:2163_0: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, catasso cāpi dhātuyo;
anya-e0101n0:2166_3: so jīvitindriyena ca bhāvena ca saddhiṃ dasadhammakalāpopi hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2166_4: Ussadavasena pana pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti saṅkhaṃ gato.
anya-e0101n0:2167_1: Cuṇṇatoti imasmiṃ hi sarīre majjhimena pamāṇena pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā.
anya-e0101n0:2167_3: tejodhātuyā anupālitā vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā na vikiriyati na viddhaṃsiyati,
anya-e0101n0:2168_0: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā na paggharati na parissavati,
anya-e0101n0:2169_0: Asitapītādipācakā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti,
anya-e0101n0:2169_2: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0101n0:2170_0: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā tejānupālitā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti.
anya-e0101n0:2170_1: Tāya ca pana vitthambhito ayaṃ kāyo na paripatati,
anya-e0101n0:2170_3: Aparāya vāyodhātuyā samabbhāhato gamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsayanairiyāpathesu viññattiṃ dasseti,
anya-e0101n0:2170_7: Evametaṃ itthipurisādibhāvena bālajanavañcanaṃ māyārūpasadisaṃ dhātuyantaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ cuṇṇato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2171_1: Lakkhaṇāditoti pathavīdhātu kiṃ lakkhaṇā, kiṃ rasā,
anya-e0101n0:2171_2: kiṃ paccupaṭṭhānāti evaṃ catassopi dhātuyo āvajjetvā pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0101n0:2172_1: Samuṭṭhānatoti ye ime pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ vitthārato dassanavasena kesādayo dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsā dassitā.
anya-e0101n0:2172_2: Tesu udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā utusamuṭṭhānāva.
anya-e0101n0:2172_3: Assu sedo kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime cattāro utucittasamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0101n0:2172_6: Avasesā sabbepi catusamuṭṭhānāti evaṃ samuṭṭhānato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2173_4: Evaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena pana kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena ca nānattabhūtānampi etāsaṃ rūpamahābhūtadhātudhammaaniccādivasena ekattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2173_5: Sabbāpi hi dhātuyo ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā rūpāni.
anya-e0101n0:2174_4: mahattā bhūtattā cāti imehi kāraṇehi mahābhūtānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0101n0:2175_0: Tattha mahantapātubhāvatoti etāni hi anupādinnasantānepi upādinnasantānepi mahantāni pātubhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2180_0: Mahābhūtasāmaññatoti etāni hi yathā māyākāro amaṇiṃyeva udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dasseti,
anya-e0101n0:2181_0: Yathā ca sayaṃ neva yakkho na yakkhī samāno yakkhabhāvampi yakkhibhāvampi dasseti,
anya-e0101n0:2181_1: evameva sayaṃ anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassenti,
anya-e0101n0:2181_2: apītāni alohitāni anodātāneva hutvā odātaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2182_0: Yathā ca yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṃ gaṇhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2182_1: neva nesaṃ tassa anto na bahi ṭhānaṃ upalabbhati,
anya-e0101n0:2182_2: na ca taṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2182_3: evameva tānipi neva aññamaññassa anto na bahi ṭhitāni hutvā upalabbhanti,
anya-e0101n0:2182_4: na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantīti acinteyyaṭṭhānatāya yakkhādimahābhūtasāmaññatopi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2182_5: Yathā ca yakkhinīsaṅkhātāni mahābhūtāni manāpehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavikkhepehi attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti,
anya-e0101n0:2182_6: evameva etānipi itthipurisasarīrādīsu manāpena chavivaṇṇena manāpena attano aṅgapaccaṅgasaṇṭhānena manāpena
anya-e0101n0:2182_7: ca hatthapādaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷattādibhedaṃ sarasalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicchādetvā bālajanaṃ vañcenti,
anya-e0101n0:2182_8: attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentīti vañcakattena yakkhinīmahābhūtasāmaññatopi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2183_1: Etāni hi divase divase upanetabbattā mahantehi ghāsacchādanādīhi bhūtāni pavattānīti mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2184_0: Mahāvikāratoti etāni hi anupādinnānipi upādinnānipi mahāvikārāni honti.
anya-e0101n0:2184_1: Tattha anupādinnānaṃ kappavuṭṭhāne vikāramahattaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2191_0: Patthaddho bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho kaṭṭhamukhena vā;
anya-e0101n0:2193_0: Pūtiyo bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho pūtimukhena vā;
anya-e0101n0:2195_0: Santatto bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho aggimukhena vā;
anya-e0101n0:2197_0: Sañchinno bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho satthamukhena vā;
anya-e0101n0:2200_0: Mahattā bhūtattā cāti etāni hi mahantāni mahatā vāyāmena pariggahetabbattā bhūtāni vijjamānattāti mahattā bhūtattā ca mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2201_0: Evaṃ sabbāpetā dhātuyo mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n0:2202_0: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇato pana dukkhādānato ca dukkhādhānato ca sabbāpi dhātulakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā dhātuyo.
anya-e0101n0:2202_1: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇena ca attano khaṇānurūpadhāraṇena ca dhammā.
anya-e0101n0:2203_0: Iti sabbāsampi rūpamahābhūtadhātudhammaaniccādivasena ekattanti evaṃ nānattekattato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2204_1: Vinibbhogāvinibbhogatoti sahuppannāva etā ekekasmiṃ sabbapariyantime suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā.
anya-e0101n0:2204_2: Lakkhaṇena pana vinibbhuttāti evaṃ vinibbhogāvinibbhogato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2205_1: Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti evaṃ avinibbhuttāsu cāpi etāsu purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā.
anya-e0101n0:2205_3: Purimā pana pacchimāhi pacchimā ca purimāhi visabhāgāti evaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2206_1: Ajjhattikabāhiravisesatoti ajjhattikā dhātuyo viññāṇavatthuviññattiindriyānaṃ nissayā honti,
anya-e0101n0:2207_1: Saṅgahatoti kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu kammasamuṭṭhānāhi itarāhi ekasaṅgahā hoti samuṭṭhānanānattābhāvato.
anya-e0101n0:2207_2: Tathā cittādisamuṭṭhānā cittādisamuṭṭhānāhīti evaṃ saṅgahato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2208_1: Paccayatoti pathavīdhātu āposaṅgahitā tejoanupālitā vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2208_2: Āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejoanupālitā vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ābandhanaṃ hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2208_3: Tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ paripācanaṃ hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2208_4: Vāyodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā tejoparipācitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ vitthambhanaṃ hutvā paccayo hotīti evaṃ paccayato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2209_2: “tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo homī”ti vā na jānāti.
anya-e0101n0:2209_3: Itarānipi tīṇi “amhākaṃ pathavīdhātu patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotī”ti na jānanti.
anya-e0101n0:2209_4: Esa nayo sabbatthāti evaṃ asamannāhārato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2210_1: Paccayavibhāgatoti dhātūnaṃ hi kammaṃ, cittaṃ, āhāro,
anya-e0101n0:2210_5: Cittādisamuṭṭhānānampi cittādayova paccayā honti, na itare.
anya-e0101n0:2210_14: Kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūtaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānampi mahābhūtānaṃ paccayo hoti cittādisamuṭṭhānānampi.
anya-e0101n0:2210_17: Utusamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūtaṃ utusamuṭṭhānānampi mahābhūtānaṃ paccayo hoti kammādisamuṭṭhānānampi.
anya-e0101n0:2211_0: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayaatthiavigatavasena ceva patiṭṭhāvasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2211_4: Āpodhātu cettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena ceva ābandhanavasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2211_8: Tejodhātupettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena ceva paripācanavasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2211_13: Vāyodhātupettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena ceva vitthambhanavasena ca paccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2213_0: Ekaṃ paṭicca tisso, catudhā tisso paṭicca eko ca;
anya-e0101n0:2214_0: Dve dhātuyo paṭicca, dve chaddhā sampavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:2215_0: Pathavīādīsu hi ekekaṃ paṭicca itarā tisso tissoti evaṃ ekaṃ paṭicca tisso catudhā sampavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:2215_1: Tathā pathavīdhātuādīsu ekekā itarā tisso tisso paṭiccāti evaṃ tisso paṭicca ekā catudhā sampavattati.
anya-e0101n0:2215_7: dutiyatatiyā paṭicca paṭhamacatutthāti evaṃ dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve chadhā sampavattanti.
anya-e0101n0:2216_0: Tāsu pathavīdhātu abhikkamapaṭikkamādikāle uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2216_4: Tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo hotīti evaṃ paccayavibhāgato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n0:2217_0: Evaṃ vacanatthādivasena manasi karontassāpi hi ekekena mukhena dhātuyo pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0101n0:2217_1: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n0:2217_2: Svāyaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vavatthāpakassa ñāṇassānubhāvena uppajjanato catudhātuvavatthānantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n0:2218_1: Idañca pana catudhātuvavatthānaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu suññataṃ avagāhati,
anya-e0101n0:2218_3: So sattasaññāya samūhatattā vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamāno bhayabheravasaho hoti,
anya-e0101n0:2218_6: Mahāpañño ca pana hoti amatapariyosāno vā sugatiparāyano vāti.
anya-e0101n0:2222_1: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ “ko samādhi,
anya-e0101n0:2222_3: tattha “kathaṃ bhāvetabbo”ti imassa padassa sabbappakārato atthavaṇṇanā samattā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2223_0: Duvidhoyeva hayaṃ idha adhippeto upacārasamādhi ceva appanāsamādhi ca.
anya-e0101n0:2223_4: So duvidhopi tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bhāvito hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2223_5: Tena vuttaṃ “kathaṃ bhāvetabboti imassa padassa sabbappakārato atthavaṇṇanā samattā”ti.
anya-e0101n0:2225_3: Tathā hi ye arahanto khīṇāsavā samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmāti samādhiṃ bhāventi,
anya-e0101n0:2226_0: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti bhāvayataṃ vipassanāya padaṭṭhānattā
anya-e0101n0:2226_1: appanāsamādhibhāvanāpi sambādhe okāsādhigamanayena upacārasamādhibhāvanāpi vipassanānisaṃsā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2227_0: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ekopi hutvā
anya-e0101n0:2227_1: bahudhā hotīti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthento nibbattenti,
anya-e0101n0:2227_2: tesaṃ sati sati āyatane abhiññāpadaṭṭhānattā appanāsamādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsā hoti.
anya-e0101n0:2227_4: “so yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
anya-e0101n0:2227_5: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
anya-e0101n0:2228_0: Ye aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke nibbattissāmāti brahmalokūpapattiṃ patthentā apatthayamānā vāpi puthujjanā samādhito na parihāyanti,
anya-e0101n0:2230_0: Ye pana ariyā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā satta divasāni acittā hutvā
anya-e0101n0:2230_1: diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmāti samādhiṃ bhāventi,
anya-e0101n0:2230_3: “soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0101n0:2234_1: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge samādhipi paridīpito hoti.
